<div>
<hr style="BORDER-TOP: black 4px solid; HEIGHT: 10px; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px

</div>
<div style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: right">Exhibit 99.1</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">US $550,000,000</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">EXTENDIBLE REVOLVING 
TERM CREDIT FACILITY</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED 
CREDIT AGREEMENT</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">BETWEEN:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">PRECISION DRILLING 
CORPORATION</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">(as Borrower)</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#8209; 
and &#8209;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 
12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">THE 
FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS SIGNATORY HERETO</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">(as 
Lenders)</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 
12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#8211; 
and &#8211;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 
12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">ROYAL 
BANK OF CANADA</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">(as 
Administration Agent for the Lenders)</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 
12.55pt">&#160;</div>

with &#8211;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-

12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">RBC CAPITAL MARKETS and 
CREDIT SUISSE SECURITIES (USA) LLC</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-

Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">1</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">THIS 
AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT</font> is dated as of the 15<sup 
style="vertical-align: text-top; line-height: 1; font-size: 
smaller">th</sup><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>day of April, 2016.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">BETWEEN:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
36pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
36pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">PRECISION DRILLING CORPORATION</font>, as 
Borrower</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">AND:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
36pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
36pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">EACH OF THE FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS NAMED HEREIN OR IN 
LENDER TRANSFER AGREEMENTS</font>, in their capacities as Lenders</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">AND:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
36pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
36pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ROYAL BANK OF CANADA</font>, a Canadian chartered bank
having its head office in the City of Toronto, Ontario, Canada, in its capacity 
as Agent</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">WHEREAS</font> the Borrower, the Existing Lenders and the Agent are 
parties to the Existing Credit Agreement and the parties hereto have agreed to 
amend and restate the Existing Credit Agreement on the terms and conditions set 
forth herein;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">AND 
WHEREAS </font>the amendments to the Existing Credit Agreement contemplated by 
this Agreement have been approved by the Agent and the Majority Lenders as 
evidenced by their execution hereof and shall bind all of the Secured 
Lenders;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NOW 
THEREFORE</font>, in consideration of the premises, the covenants herein 
contained and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and 
sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged by each of the parties hereto, the 
parties agree as follows:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">ARTICLE&#160;1<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><br>
</font> INTERPRETATION</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z1eabf54057c248ebb7fca775c64c8a02" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">1.1</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Definitions</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">In this Agreement, 
including the recitals and the Schedules&#160;hereto and in all notices pursuant
to this Agreement, unless something in the subject matter or context is 
inconsistent therewith, the following words and phrases shall have the following
meanings:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">2019 Notes</font>" 
means the Cdn.&#160;$200,000,000 6.50% senior unsecured notes due March&#160;15,
2019 issued by the Borrower under the 2019&#160;Note Indenture;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">2019 Note 
Indenture</font>" means the trust indenture dated as of March&#160;15, 2011 
entered into by the Borrower, as note issuer, and Valiant Trust Company, as 
trustee;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">2020 Notes</font>" 
means the U.S.&#160;$650,000,000 6.625% senior unsecured notes due November 15, 
2020 issued by the Borrower under the 2020 Note Indenture;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">2020 Note 
Indenture</font>" means the trust indenture dated as of November&#160;17, 2010
entered into by the Borrower, as note issuer, and The Bank of New York Mellon, 
as trustee, and Valiant Trust Company, as Canadian co-trustee;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

10pt">

ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

means the U.S.&#160;$400,000,000 6.50% senior unsecured notes due 
December&#160;15, 2021 issued by the Borrower under the 2021 Note 
Indenture;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

Indenture</font>" means the trust indenture dated as of July&#160;29, 2011 
entered into by the Borrower, as note issuer, and The Bank of New York Mellon, 
as trustee, and Valiant Trust Company, as Canadian co-trustee;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">2024 Notes</font>" 
means the U.S.$400,000,000 senior unsecured notes due November 15, 2024 issued 
by the Borrower under the 2024 Note Indenture;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">2024 Note 
Indenture</font>" means the trust indenture dated as of June 3, 2014 entered 
into by the Borrower, as note issuer, and The Bank of New York Mellon, as 
trustee, and Valiant Trust Company, as Canadian co-trustee;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acceleration 
Notice</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;10.2(b);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acceptable Foreign 
Jurisdiction</font>" means a Foreign Jurisdiction which, in the opinion of the 
Agent, acting reasonably, is acceptable in all respects, including, without 
limiting the foregoing, as to location, political system and legal system;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acceptable Foreign 
Material Subsidiary</font>" means each Material Subsidiary that is incorporated 
or formed under the laws of an Acceptable Foreign Jurisdiction;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Accommodations</font>" means the advance of Loans by the Lenders, the 
acceptance and purchase of Bankers' Acceptances or, if applicable, the advance 
of BA Equivalent Advances by the Lenders and the issuing of Letters of Credit by
the Fronting Lender for the account of the Lenders;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Accounting 
Change</font>" has the meaning ascribed thereto in Section&#160;1.5(b);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Accounting Change 
Notice</font>" has the meaning ascribed thereto in Section&#160;1.5(b);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Accounts</font>" 
means the accounts and records established by the Agent pursuant to 
Section&#160;4.6;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acquisition</font>" 
means any acquisition or series of related acquisitions by the Borrower or any 
of its Subsidiaries, whether by purchase, merger or otherwise, of all or a 
portion of the assets or shares or other ownership interests of any Person or of
all or a portion of the assets constituting a business line or unit or a
division of any Person;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Additional 
Compensation</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;11.2;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Adjustment 
Time</font>" means the time of occurrence of the last event necessary to ensure 
that all Secured Obligations are thereafter due and payable and such time shall 
conclusively be:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4f57623a05db4c389446ef3e77e1f53c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>in the case where such last event is the delivery of a Demand for 
Repayment, the date on which the obligations thereunder are due and payable; 
and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd0215ad2939b49c9b23167b38472c15f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">in the case where such 
last event is the occurrence of a Termination Event, the time of occurrence of 
such Termination Event determined pursuant to the provisions of the Secured 
Documents giving rise to such Termination Event;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

Lender</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;11.7;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">3</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Affiliate</font>" 
means any Person which, directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by, or is
under common control with another Person, and for the purpose of this 
definition, "control" (including with correlative meanings, the terms 
"controlled by" or "under common control") means the power to direct or cause 
the direction of the management and policies of any Person, whether through the 
ownership of Voting Shares, by contract or otherwise, provided that, for all 
purposes of this Agreement, each of the Loan Parties shall be deemed to be 
Affiliates of each other;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Agent</font>" means 
RBC and any successor entity to RBC when acting in its capacity as 
administration agent hereunder and includes any successor agent appointed 
pursuant to Section&#160;12.16;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Agent's Account for 
Payments</font>" means, with respect to payments made by the Borrower or a 
Lender, those accounts maintained by the Agent at the Agent's Branch of Account 
referred to in the definition thereof or such other places or accounts as the 
Agent may from time to time advise the Borrower or the Lenders, as applicable, 
in writing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Agent's Branch of 
Account</font>" means, the office of the Agent located at 4th Floor, 20 King 
Street West, Toronto, Ontario M5H&#160;1C4 (Telecopy No. 
416&#8209;842&#8209;4023) or such other office or branch of the Agent in Canada 
as the Agent may from time to time advise the Borrower and the Lenders in 
writing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Agreement</font>" 
means this amended and restated credit agreement, all Schedules attached hereto 
and any future amendments, amendments and restatements, replacements or 
supplements hereto or thereto;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">AML 
Legislation</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in 
Section&#160;14.12(a);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Anti-Corruption 
Laws</font>" means all laws, rules, and regulations of Sanctions Authorities 
that apply to the Borrower and its Subsidiaries from time to time concerning or 
relating to bribery of government officials or public corruption;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Anti-Money 
Laundering/Anti-Terrorist Financing Laws</font>" means the AML Legislation and 
all other laws, rules of any jurisdiction applicable to the Borrower or its 
Subsidiaries from time to time concerning or relating to money laundering or 
terrorist financing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Applicable 
Law</font>" means, in relation to any Person, property, transaction or event, 
all applicable provisions (or mandatory applicable provisions, if so specified) 
of federal, provincial, state or local laws, statutes, rules, regulations, 
official directives and orders of all Governmental Authorities and Governmental 
Actions in actions or proceedings in which the Person in question is a party or 
by which it is bound or having application to the Person, property, transaction 
or event;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Applicable 
Margin</font>" means a margin, expressed as a rate per annum, payable to the 
Agent on behalf of all of the Lenders, with respect to Borrowings, as set forth 
in the table below for the applicable Consolidated Total Debt to Adjusted EBITDA
Ratio:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

</td>
</tr>
</table>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">4</font></div>
</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">provided that changes in the Applicable 
Margin shall be effective and adjusted in accordance with Section 5.11.&#160; 
The Applicable Margin for Letters of Credit that are not Financial Letters of 
Credit (as determined by the Fronting Lender issuing such Letter of Credit in 
its discretion) will be two thirds (2/3) of the Applicable Margin for Financial 
Letters of Credit.&#160; For the purposes of calculating the Applicable Margins 
for Prime Loans, U.S. Base Rate Loans and Bankers' Acceptances, the per annum 
rate is expressed on the basis of a 365 day year, as applicable, and the 
Applicable Margin for Libor Loans is calculated as a per annum rate expressed on
the basis of a 360 day year;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Approved 
Fund</font>" means a Person (other than a natural person) that is (or will be) 
engaged in making, purchasing, holding or otherwise investing in commercial 
loans and similar extensions of credit in the ordinary course of business and 
that is administered or managed by a Lender, an affiliate of a Lender or a 
Person or an affiliate of a Person that administers or manages a Lender;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">BA Acceptance 
Fee</font>" means, with respect to Bankers' Acceptances, the fee, expressed as a
rate per annum, payable to each Lender or retained by each Lender, in each case 
with respect to Bankers' Acceptances to be accepted and purchased by such Lender
as set forth in the table in the definition of "Applicable Margin" for Bankers' 
Acceptances;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0.5pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0.5pt">"<font style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">BA 
Equivalent Advance</font>" means an advance made in Canadian Dollars by a Non-
Acceptance Lender as part of an Accommodation by way of Bankers' 
Acceptances;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0.5pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bail-In
Action</font>" means the exercise of any Write-Down and Conversion Powers by the
applicable EEA Resolution Authority in respect of any liability of an EEA 
Financial Institution;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bail-In 
Legislation</font>" means, with respect to any EEA Member Country implementing 
Article 55 of Directive 2014/59/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council
of the European Union, the implementing law for such EEA Member Country from 
time to time which is described in the EU Bail-In Legislation Schedule;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bankers' 
Acceptances</font>" means bankers' acceptances denominated in Cdn. Dollars which
are issued by the Borrower pursuant to Sections&#160;3.7, 3.14 or 3.15 and 
accepted and if applicable, purchased by a Lender pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.9(i);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Board</font>" means 
the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System of the United States of 
America (or any successor);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Borrower</font>" 
means Precision Drilling Corporation and its successors and permitted 
assigns;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Borrowing 
Notice</font>" means a notice to effect an Accommodation delivered under 
Section&#160;3.7 and substantially in the form of Schedule B with all applicable
blanks completed;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Borrowings</font>" 
means, at any time, the principal amount outstanding by way of Loans made by the
Lenders together with the face amount of Bankers' Acceptances outstanding (and, 
if applicable, any related BA Equivalent Advances) accepted and, if applicable, 
purchased by the Lenders and the undrawn amount of all outstanding Letters of
Credit issued by the Fronting Lenders;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">bps</font>" means 
1/100th of one percent;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">5</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Branch of 
Account</font>" means, with respect to each Lender, the branch or office of such
Lender located at the address set forth opposite such Lender's name on Schedule 
A to this Agreement or in its Lender Transfer Agreement or such other branch or 
office as such Lender may from time to time advise the Borrower and the Agent in
writing; provided that, for purposes of delivering any notice required to be 
delivered by the Agent to a Lender pursuant to Section&#160;12.6 and for 
purposes of effecting any payments to a Lender in connection with this 
Agreement, a Lender may specify in writing to the Agent any other branch or 
office of such Lender in Canada or the United States and such branch or office 
shall thereafter be the Branch of Account of such Lender for such purpose;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Business Day</font>"
means a day, excluding Saturday and Sunday, on which banking institutions are 
open for the transaction of commercial business in Toronto, Ontario, Calgary, 
Alberta, and New York, New York and also, if such term is considered in the 
context of a Libor Loan or determination of Libor, London, England;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Canadian 
Dollars</font>", "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cdn. Dollars</font>" and the symbol "<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Cdn.&#160;$</font>" each mean lawful money of Canada;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Canadian Loan 
Parties</font>" means those Loan Parties which are incorporated or formed under 
the laws of Canada or a province or territory thereof, and "<font style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Canadian Loan Party</font>" means any of them;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Capital 
Lease</font>" means, with respect to any Person, any lease or other arrangement 
relating to real or personal property which should, in accordance with GAAP, be 
accounted for as a capital lease on a balance sheet of such Person, provided 
that any lease, whether entered into before or after December&#160;31, 2010, 
which would have been accounted for as an operating lease under GAAP as in 
effect on December&#160;31, 2010 shall be deemed to not constitute a Capital 
Lease;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Capitalized Lease 
Obligations</font>" means, at any time, the amount of any obligation which 
would, in accordance with GAAP, be required to be classified and accounted for 
as a Capital Lease on the consolidated balance sheet of the Borrower;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Collateral 
Account</font>" means an account with the Agent, or such other financial 
institution as designated by the Agent, from which the Borrower does not have 
any withdrawal rights or privileges until repayment of the Borrowings in full, 
termination of the Total Commitment and termination of this Agreement, except to
apply the amount represented thereby to the Borrowings or a portion thereof, 
which account and all funds credited thereto and interest earned thereon (which 
interest shall be at the prevailing rate of the Agent or such other financial 
institution, as the case may be, for demand deposits of comparable amounts) 
shall be the subject of a Security Interest in favour of the Agent on behalf of 
the Lenders;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Management 
Facilities</font>" means any cash management, treasury, depository, purchasing 
card or similar facilities provided for under any Cash Management Facility 
Agreements;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Management 
Facility Agreements</font>" means any agreements (including for certainty the 
centralized banking agreement dated December 23, 2008, as amended April 6, 2009,
March 21, 2012 and January 25, 2016, as further amended from time to time, 
entered into between RBC, the Borrower and certain of its Subsidiaries) 
providing for treasury, depository, purchasing card or cash management services,
including in connection with any automated clearing house transfers of funds or 
any similar transactions between a Loan Party and any Lender or Affiliate 
thereof;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Management 
Facility Demand for Repayment</font>" means a demand made by a Cash Management 
Facility Provider pursuant to a Cash Management Facility Agreement demanding 
repayment of all obligations thereunder;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">6</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Management 
Facility Indebtedness</font>" means, as at any time, the aggregate amount owing 
by the Loan Parties under any and all Cash Management Facility Agreements;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Management 
Facility Providers</font>" means any Lender (or its Affiliate) providing Cash 
Management Facilities;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CDOR Rate</font>" 
means on any day:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6b58afef4db74ef6919e4bac5afa3582" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>with respect to Bankers' Acceptances having a Standard Term which are 
required to be accepted and, if applicable, purchased on any day, the 
arithmetical average of the percentage discount rates (expressed to three (3) 
decimal places) for Canadian Dollar bankers' acceptances in comparable amounts 
having an identical issue and maturity date which are quoted on the "Reuters' 
Screen CDOR CAD&#8209;BA Page" (as defined in the International Swaps and 
Derivatives Association, Inc. definitions, as modified and amended from time to 
time) (or if such screen shall not be available any successor or similar service
selected by the Agent) as at approximately 10:00&#160;a.m. (Toronto time) on 
such day, or if such day is not a Business Day, then on the immediately 
preceding Business Day (as adjusted by the Agent in good faith after 
10&#160;a.m. (Toronto time) or as soon thereafter as practicable to reflect any 
error in a posted rate of interest or in the posted average annual rate of 
interest); and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z9c828bbda8fa4d7e9aed6b415bd9f085" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">with respect to Bankers' 
Acceptances which do not have a Standard Term or if the rate referred to in 
paragraph (a) of this definition does not appear on such "Reuters Screen CDOR 
Page" (or a successor service as referred to in paragraph (a) of this 
definition), then the CDOR Rate, on any day, shall be the arithmetic average of 
the percentage discount rate (expressed to three (3) decimal places) quoted by 
each Schedule&#160;I Reference Lender (determined by such Lender as of 10 a.m. 
(Toronto time) on such day), which would be applicable in respect of an issue of
bankers' acceptances in a comparable amount and with identical maturity dates to
the Bankers' Acceptances proposed to be issued by the Borrower on such day or if
such day is not a Business Day, then on the immediately preceding Business 
Day;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">provided that if the rate determined above
shall ever be less than zero, such rate shall be deemed to be zero for the 
purposes of this Agreement. If any Schedule&#160;I Reference Lender does not 
furnish a timely quotation, the Agent shall determine the relevant discount rate
on the basis of the quotation or quotations furnished by the remaining 
Schedule&#160;I Reference Lenders.&#160; Each determination of the CDOR Rate 
shall be conclusive and binding, absent manifest error, and be computed using
any reasonable averaging and attribution method;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Certificated Service
Rigs</font>" means a service rig, including a truck-mounted service rig, which 
is subject to a certificate of title statute of a state of the United States for
the purposes of the Uniform Commercial Code;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Change of 
Control</font>" means the occurrence of either of the following events:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2907a3efc56c4a32afa3c04da4bb108e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>a Person or combination of Persons acting jointly or in concert (within the
meaning of the <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Securities Act</font> (Alberta)) becomes the 
beneficial owner of or controls, directly or indirectly, Voting Shares of the 
Borrower which, together with all other Voting Shares of the Borrower held by 
such Persons, represent fifty percent (50%) or more of all outstanding Voting 
Shares of the Borrower on a fully diluted basis, provided that a Person shall be
deemed to have beneficial ownership of Voting Shares if it has the right to 
acquire such Voting Shares, whether such right is exercisable immediately or 
only after the passage of time; or</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">7</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb3ee058920ed4ee4876504cccadd6ca5" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">a Specified Change of 
Control;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Circumstance</font>"
has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;11.2;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Code</font>" means 
the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 of the United States of America, as amended 
from time to time;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Collateral</font>" 
is a collective reference to all present and after-acquired property, assets, 
rights and things (whether real, personal or mixed), tangible and intangible, 
and the proceeds and products thereof, subjected or intended to be subjected 
from time to time to any Security Interest under any of the Security;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Collateral 
Agent</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;6.11;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Commitment</font>" 
means, with respect to each Lender, such Lender's obligation to make Loans under
the Credit Facility available to, and accept and purchase Bankers' Acceptances 
from (or, if applicable, make BA Equivalent Advances to) and issue Letters of 
Credit through the Fronting Lender for the account of, the Borrower, subject to 
the terms of this Agreement, in an aggregate amount not at any time in excess of
the amount set forth opposite such Lender's name on Schedule A hereto (or in any
Lender Transfer Agreement executed hereafter) as such Lender's Commitment, as 
such amount may hereafter be cancelled, reduced, increased or terminated from 
time to time pursuant to the provisions of this Agreement;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Compliance 
Certificate</font>" means a compliance certificate substantially in the form 
attached hereto as Schedule F executed by a senior officer (including for 
certainty the chief financial officer or vice president finance) of the 
Borrower;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Consenting</font>&#160;<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times 
New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender</font>" has the meaning 
ascribed to it in Section&#160;3.6(b);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated 
Adjusted EBITDA</font>" means, for any period, Consolidated EBITDA for such 
period after excluding therefrom (without duplication) any net income of (and 
not adding back or deducting any amounts related to) an Excluded Subsidiary for 
such period to the extent such net income has been distributed to such Excluded 
Subsidiary directly or indirectly by a Material Subsidiary and remains in such 
Excluded Subsidiary and has not been distributed to, or invested (by way of 
loan, equity investment or otherwise) in, the Borrower or a Material 
Subsidiary;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated 
EBITDA</font>" means, for any period, Consolidated Net Income for such period 
<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif"><u>plus</u></font>, without duplication and to the extent reflected as a 
charge in the determination of such Consolidated Net Income for such period, the
sum of:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4307ba8a1bae40e9b1d03ff9f6ad23f1" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>income tax expense, including interest and penalties thereon;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z233fd5b4c7c440fbb97f18db5ecac6b7" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>interest expense, amortization or writeoff of debt discount (including 
original issue discount) and debt issuance costs and commissions, discounts, 
prepayment premiums and other fees and charges associated with Debt;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zefaf06edea5b46cbbfda9d2ff5d3dbe2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>depreciation, non-cash depletion and amortization expense;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7364f5f3287e4404be1aa04b5d7fff4c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">amortization of 
intangibles (including, but not limited to, goodwill) and organization costs and
any other non-cash expenses and charges in the period (including non-cash 
foreign exchange expenses);</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-

</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">8</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7f4d1eba441046bd9b1004098a62bb70" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
