cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any extraordinary non-cash expenses or losses (including, whether or not 
otherwise includable as a separate item in the statement of such Consolidated 
Net Income for such period, losses on the sale of assets outside of the ordinary
course of business), all in the case of clauses (a)&#160;through (e)&#160;above,
as determined on a consolidated basis; and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf00dfe7fb0534615b980118371734885" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(f)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>for purposes of any determination of Consolidated EBITDA for any 
four&#160;Fiscal Quarter period, the amount of any documented extraordinary, 
non-recurring or unusual restructuring charges incurred during any such period, 
to the extent reasonable back-up is provided to support such costs upon request 
by the Agent; provided, that the aggregate amount of such costs that relate to 
acquisitions that may be added to Consolidated EBITDA for any such four Fiscal 
Quarter period pursuant to this clause (f)&#160;shall not exceed 
U.S.&#160;$50,000,000;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">and <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><u>minus</u></font>:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd79030736f1445d187723ed5e405ef41" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(g)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>to the extent included in the determination of such Consolidated Net Income
for such period, the sum of (i)&#160;interest income, (ii)&#160;any 
extraordinary income or gains (including, whether or not otherwise includable as
a separate item in the statement of such Consolidated Net Income for such 
period, gains on the sales of assets outside of the ordinary course of 
business), (iii)&#160;income tax credits (to the extent not netted from income 
tax expense) and (iv)&#160;any other non-cash income (including non-cash foreign
exchange income), all, in the case of clauses (i)&#160;through (iv)&#160;above, 
as determined on a consolidated basis; and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8af7d565168f4770a5ccafcb43fa2ad2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(h)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any cash payments made during such period in respect of items described in 
clause (e)&#160;above subsequent to the fiscal quarter in which the relevant 
non-cash expenses or losses were reflected as a charge in the statement of 
Consolidated Net Income, all as determined on a consolidated basis.</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">For the purposes of calculating 
Consolidated EBITDA for any period of four&#160;consecutive Fiscal Quarters, 
(i)&#160;if at any time during such period the Borrower or any Subsidiary shall 
have made any Material Disposition, the Consolidated EBITDA for such period 
shall be reduced after giving <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times 
New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">pro forma</font> effect thereto by
an amount equal to the Consolidated EBITDA (if positive) attributable to the 
property that is the subject of such Material Disposition for such period or 
increased by an amount equal to the Consolidated EBITDA (if negative) 
attributable thereto for such period and (ii)&#160;if during such period the 
Borrower or any Subsidiary shall have made a Material Acquisition, Consolidated 
EBITDA for such period shall be calculated after giving <font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic"><u>pro 
forma</u></font> effect thereto as if such Material Acquisition occurred on the 
first day of such period;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated 
Interest Coverage Ratio</font>" means, as at the end of a Fiscal Quarter, the
ratio of Consolidated Adjusted EBITDA for the four Fiscal Quarters ending at the
end of such Fiscal Quarter to Consolidated Interest Expense for the four Fiscal 
Quarters ending at the end of such Fiscal Quarter;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated 
Interest Expense</font>" means, for any period, total cash interest expense 
(including that attributable to Capital Lease Obligations) of the Borrower and 
its Subsidiaries for such period with respect to all outstanding Debt of the 
Borrower and its Subsidiaries (including all cash commissions, discounts in 
respect of bankers' acceptances and other fees and charges owed with respect to 
letters of credit and bankers' acceptance financing and net costs under Swaps in
respect of interest rates to the extent such net costs are allocable to such 
period in accordance with GAAP and, for the avoidance of doubt, excluding any 
debt discount (including original issue discount), debt issuance costs and 
commissions, brokerage fees, underwriter fees and other upfront fees and other 
fees associated with Debt) <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New
Roman', Times, serif"><u>minus</u></font> total cash interest income of the 
Borrower and its Subsidiaries, in each case determined on a consolidated 
basis;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">9</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated Net 
Income</font>" means, for any period, the consolidated net income (or loss) of 
the Borrower and its Subsidiaries, determined on a consolidated basis in 
accordance with GAAP; <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif"><u>provided</u></font> that there shall be excluded:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z76cde57a31014cdfa0b1fc282e4e005e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the income (or deficit) of any Person accrued prior to the date it becomes 
a Subsidiary or is merged into or consolidated with the Borrower or any of its 
Subsidiaries;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z22e493dacaac4cadbf038927cdca4b81" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the income (or deficit) of any Person (other than a Subsidiary of the 
Borrower) in which the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries has an ownership 
interest, except to the extent that any such income is actually received by the 
Borrower or such Subsidiary in the form of dividends or similar distributions; 
and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z349ae4ef77964fc496a0aacddf465867" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the undistributed earnings of any Subsidiary of the Borrower to the extent 
that the declaration or payment of dividends or similar distributions by such 
Subsidiary is not at the time permitted by the terms of any contractual 
obligation (other than under any Loan Document) or requirement of law applicable
to such Subsidiary;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated Net 
Tangible Assets</font>" means, at any time, the total assets of the Borrower and
its Subsidiaries properly classified as such on a consolidated balance sheet of 
the Borrower in accordance with GAAP but without giving effect to the IFRS 
PP&amp;E Adjustment, less, to the extent included in a determination of total 
assets, and without duplication:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za11b9bb8bce843bda773d8710147383f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%"
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any Intangible Assets of the Borrower and its Subsidiaries;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z52c25296cec145e0a28ffbd253900c51" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any minority interests in Subsidiaries;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated Senior 
Debt</font>" means, as at any time, and as determined in accordance with GAAP 
for the Borrower on a consolidated basis and without duplication (with any 
amounts owing in a currency other than Cdn. Dollars being calculated at the 
Equivalent Amount in Cdn. Dollars), all Debt but excluding in any event (without
duplication), Second Lien Debt, Convertible Debt and Specified Unsecured 
Debt;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated Senior 
Debt to Adjusted EBITDA Ratio</font>" means, as at the end of a Fiscal Quarter, 
the ratio of Consolidated Senior Debt as at the end of such Fiscal Quarter to 
Consolidated Adjusted EBITDA for the four Fiscal Quarters ending at the end of 
such Fiscal Quarter;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated Total 
Debt</font>" means, as at any time, and as determined in accordance with GAAP 
for the Borrower on a consolidated basis and without duplication (with any 
amounts owing in a currency other than Cdn. Dollars being calculated at the 
Equivalent Amount in Cdn. Dollars), all Debt but excluding in any event (without
duplication) Convertible Debt;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated 
Total</font>&#160;<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Debt to Adjusted EBITDA Ratio</font>" means, as
at the end of a Fiscal Quarter, the ratio of Consolidated Total Debt as at the 
end of such Fiscal Quarter to Consolidated Adjusted EBITDA for the <font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif">four 
Fiscal Quarters</font> ending at the end of such Fiscal Quarter;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Conversion</font>" 
means a conversion of a Borrowing (other than a Letter of Credit) or part 
thereof from one basis of Borrowing to another (other than a Letter of Credit) 
and, where applicable, such term shall include the issuance of new Bankers' 
Acceptances in respect of converted or unconverted portions of a 
Borrowing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">10</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Conversion 
Date</font>" means each Business Day that the Borrower has notified the Agent as
the date on which the conversion of a Borrowing or a portion thereof is to be 
made pursuant to a request from the Borrower under Section&#160;3.14;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Conversion 
Notice</font>" means a notice to effect a Conversion delivered under 
Section&#160;3.14 and substantially in the form of Schedule D with all 
applicable blanks completed;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Convertible
Debt</font>" means any convertible subordinated debentures or notes created, 
issued or assumed by the Borrower which have all of the following 
characteristics:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zde25712d50fd411d997b03a17bafff99" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>an initial final maturity or due date in respect of repayment of principal 
extending beyond the latest Maturity Date of any Lender under this Agreement in 
effect at the time such debentures or notes are created, issued or 
assumed;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd1e1bac8f193488987c59f237af17416" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>no scheduled or mandatory payment or repurchase of principal thereunder 
(other than acceleration following an event of default in regard thereto or 
payment which can be satisfied by the delivery of shares as contemplated in 
paragraph (f)&#160;of this definition and other than on a change of control of 
the Borrower where a Change of Control also occurs under this Agreement) prior 
to the latest Maturity Date of any Lender under this Agreement in effect at the 
time such debentures or notes are created, issued or assumed;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zfee4a506a71745b28ff5e4487f7ae2c4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>upon and during the continuance of a Default, an Event of Default or 
acceleration of the time for repayment of any Secured Obligations which has not 
been rescinded, (1) all amounts payable in respect of principal, premium (if 
any) or interest under such debentures or notes are subordinate and junior in 
right of payment to all such obligations and no payments shall be made under
such debentures or notes and (2) no enforcement steps or enforcement proceedings
may be commenced in respect of such debentures or notes;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z52e8ced84e89453da5e783b3435dfadf" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>upon distribution of the assets of the Borrower on any dissolution, winding
up, total liquidation or reorganization of the Borrower (whether in bankruptcy, 
insolvency or receivership proceedings or upon an assignment for the benefit of 
creditors or any other marshalling of the assets and liabilities of such person,
or otherwise), all Secured Obligations shall first be paid in full, or 
provisions made for such payment, before any payment is made on account of 
principal, premium (if any) or interest payable in regard to such debentures or 
notes;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<div>the occurrence of a Default or Event of Default under this Agreement or the
acceleration of the time for repayment of any of the Secured Obligations or 
enforcement of the rights and remedies of the Agent and the Lenders hereunder or
under any other Loan Document shall not in and of themselves:</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4de43bba691646dca2edb189614e0fc8" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>cause a default or event of default (with the passage of time or otherwise)
under such debentures or notes or the indenture governing the same; or</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zcbae39c7f11346968c5484772a49b078" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>cause or permit the obligations under such debentures or notes to be due 
and payable prior to the stated maturity thereof; and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z645d2f27302a4dfca7e9c48e8eb94078" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>payments of interest or principal due and payable under such debentures or 
notes can be satisfied, at the option of the Borrower, by delivering shares of 
the Borrower in accordance with the indenture or agreement governing such 
debentures or notes (whether such shares are received by the holders of such 
debentures or notes as payment or are sold by a trustee or representative under 
such indenture or agreement to provide cash for payment to holders of such 
debentures or notes);</div>

id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman',

</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Covenant Relief 
Period</font>" means the period comprised of nine (9) consecutive Fiscal 
Quarters commencing with the Fiscal Quarter ending on March 31, 2016 up to and 
including the Fiscal Quarter ending on March 31, 2018;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Credit 
Facility</font>" has the meaning set forth in Section&#160;3.2;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CS</font>" means Credit 
Suisse AG, Toronto Branch;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Debt</font>" means, of any 
Person at any date, without duplication:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z28bd6a923c664214b437248dcf134107" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<div>all indebtedness of such Person for borrowed money;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>all obligations of such Person for the deferred purchase price of property 
or services (other than (i)&#160;current trade payables incurred in the ordinary
course of such Person's business and (ii)&#160;any earn-out obligation until 
such obligation becomes a liability on the balance sheet of such Person in
accordance with GAAP and if not paid after becoming due and payable);</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

other similar instruments;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>

title retention agreement with respect to property acquired by such Person (even
though the rights and remedies of the seller or lender under such agreement in 
the event of default are limited to repossession or sale of such 
property);</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

<div>&#160;</div>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>all obligations of such Person, contingent or otherwise, in respect of 
bankers' acceptances or as an account party or applicant under or in respect of 
letters of credit<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>or letters of guarantee;</div>

</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

securitization program (which shall be deemed to be equal to the net proceeds 
received by such Person thereunder);</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

is, or upon the happening of any event or the passage of time would be, required
to be redeemed by such Person, at the option of the holder thereof, or matures 
or is mandatorily redeemable, in whole or in part, on or prior to the latest 
Maturity Date of any Lender then in effect under this Agreement;</div>

</td>
</tr>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Default</font>" 
shall mean the occurrence of any of the events specified in Section&#160;10.1, 
whether or not any requirement for notice or lapse of time or other condition 
precedent has been satisfied;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Defaulting 
Lender</font>" means any Lender:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">

be purchased by it hereunder and under the other Loan Documents;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>

Repayment</font>" means delivery of an Acceleration Notice, a Swap Demand for 
Payment, an Operating Facility Demand for Repayment or a Cash Management 
Facility Demand for Repayment;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Deposit Account 
Control Agreement</font>" means a deposit account control agreement or other 
similar agreement in respect of deposit accounts, such agreement to be in such 
form as may be required, pursuant to Applicable Law in the jurisdiction 
governing the creation and perfection of a Security Interest over such accounts,
to create a valid and perfected Security Interest over such accounts and 
otherwise in form and substance satisfactory to the Agent, acting 
reasonably;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

10pt">

</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Deposited 
Cash</font>" means unrestricted cash on hand held on deposit with any Lender (or
an Affiliate of any Lender) and:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z22a018f912af48709e09db98d908e08d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>for the period commencing on May<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>16, 2016 and 
ending on June 15, 2016, that is held in (i) Canada or the United States 
provided it is subject to a perfected Security Interest in favour of the Agent, 
including, without limitation, pursuant to a Deposit Account Control Agreement 
and (ii) Mexico, Kuwait or the United Arab Emirates; and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z06da19727a5543e9bd373e5046dcad7e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>after June 16, 2016, that is subject to a perfected Security Interest in 
favour of the Agent, including, without limitation, pursuant to a Deposit 
Account Control Agreement;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Discount 
Proceeds</font>" means, in respect of any Bankers' Acceptance required to be 
purchased by a Lender hereunder, an amount (rounded to the nearest whole cent 
with one-half of one cent being rounded up) determined as of the applicable 
Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover Date which is equal to:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">Face Amount&#160; x&#160; Price</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">where "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Face 
Amount</font>"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>is the face amount of such 
bankers' acceptance and "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Price</font>"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">&#160;</font>is equal to:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<table id="z0856239f6c91458ca49706c514f7e933" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; BORDER-COLLAPSE: collapse; WIDTH: 20%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" border="0">
<tr>
<td style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">1</div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="BORDER-TOP-COLOR: ; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM-COLOR: ; 
WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">1&#160; +&#160; (Rate&#160; x&#160; <font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
VARIANT: normal; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: 
normal"><u>Term</u></font>)</div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; 
WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 365</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">where the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Rate</font>" is
the applicable Discount Rate expressed as a decimal on the day of purchase; the 
"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Term</font>" is the term of such Bankers' Acceptance 
expressed as a number of days; and the Price as so determined is rounded up or 
down to the fifth decimal place with .000005 being rounded up;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Discount 
Rate</font>" means:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd857cd1d9ccd4c21b3526ac2565c2516" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>with respect to an issue of Bankers' Acceptances having the same maturity 
date accepted by a Schedule&#160;I Lender, Alberta Treasury Branches or Export 
Development Canada, the CDOR Rate; and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8d4c8ceba73f400286b7a8534a2a0fb0" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>with respect to an issue of Bankers' Acceptances having the same maturity 
date accepted by a Schedule&#160;II Lender or a Non-Acceptance Lender, the 
lesser of:</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd1a8d08af20c43d286426d66e4bdc44e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the CDOR Rate plus 10&#160;bps; and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z18b850e0f9b34816aec27ba633c2e9dc" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the annual rate determined by the Agent to be the arithmetical average of 
the percentage discount rates (expressed to three (3) decimal places) for 
Canadian dollar bankers' acceptances in comparable amounts and having comparable
issue and maturity dates as quoted to the Agent by the Schedule&#160;II 
Reference Lenders at or about 10 a.m. (Toronto time) on the applicable Drawdown 
Date, Conversion Date or Rollover Date;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Disposition</font>" 
means, with respect to any property or asset, any sale, lease, sale and 
leaseback, assignment, conveyance, transfer or other disposition, whether direct
or indirect, and "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Dispose</font>" has a similar meaning;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">14</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Distribution</font>"
means:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3915d084a7e4459e86ef67a75a2b1ad6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any declaration, payment or setting aside for payment of any dividend, 
return of capital or other distribution on or in respect of any of the share, 
partnership or trust capital of the Borrower;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z9bfe21ff56db427d933de1f1bce8b58e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any redemption, retraction, purchase, retirement or other acquisition, in 
whole or in part, of any of the share, partnership or trust capital of the 
Borrower or any securities, instruments or contractual rights capable of being 
converted into, exchanged or exercised for share, partnership or trust capital 
of the Borrower, including options, warrants, conversion or exchange privileges 
and similar rights; or</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0583145f30cf42629621d663720cce17" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any payment of principal, interest or otherwise on any Convertible 
Debt;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">whether any of the foregoing is made, paid
or satisfied in or for cash, property or both, but excluding in all cases any 
Distribution to the extent payable in common shares of the Borrower;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Drawdown</font>" 
means the advance of a Borrowing other than as a result of a Conversion, 
Rollover or a drawing under a Letter of Credit;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Drawdown 
Date</font>" means each Business Day on which Borrowings are to be made pursuant
to a request from the Borrower under Section&#160;3.7;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">EEA Financial 
Institution</font>" means (a) any credit institution or investment firm 
established in any EEA Member Country which is subject to the supervision of an 
EEA Resolution Authority, (b) any entity established in an EEA Member Country 
which is a Lender Parent of an institution described in clause (a) of this 
definition, or (c) any institution established in an EEA Member Country which is
a subsidiary of an institution described in clauses (a) or (b) of this 
definition and is subject to consolidated supervision with its Lender 
Parent;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">EEA Member 
Country</font>" means any of the member states of the European Union, Iceland, 
Liechtenstein and Norway;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">EEA Resolution 
Authority</font>" means any public administrative authority or any person 
entrusted with public administrative authority of any EEA Member Country 
(including any delegee) having responsibility for the resolution of any EEA 
Financial Institution;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Effective 
Date</font>" means the date on which the conditions precedent under 
Section&#160;8.1 have been satisfied;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Environmental 
Laws</font>" means all Applicable Laws and Governmental Actions regarding the 
environment or pursuant to which Environmental Liabilities could arise or have 
arisen, including, without limitation, all Applicable Laws and Governmental 
Actions relating to the Release or threatened Release of any contaminant or the 
generation, use, storage or transportation of any contaminant;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Environmental 
Liabilities</font>" means any and all liabilities for any Release, any 
environmental damage, any contamination or any other environmental problem 
caused or alleged to have been caused to any Person, property or the environment
as a result of any Release or the condition of any property or asset, whether or
not caused by a breach of Applicable Laws, including, without limitation, all 
liabilities arising from or related to: any surface, underground, air, 
groundwater, or surface water contamination; the abandonment or plugging of any 
well; restorations and reclamations; the removal of or failure to remove any 
foundations, structures or equipment; the cleaning up or reclamation of storage 
sites; any Release; violation of pollution standards; and personal injury 
(including sickness, disease or death) and property damage arising from the 
foregoing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">15</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Equivalent 
Amount</font>" in one currency (the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">First Currency</font>") of 
an amount in another currency (the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Other Currency</font>") 
means, as of the date of determination, the amount of the First Currency which 
would be required to purchase such amount of the Other Currency at the Bank of 
Canada noon (Toronto time) mid-point spot rate for such currencies on such date 
of determination (as quoted or published from time to time by the Bank of 
Canada) or, if such date of determination is not a Business Day, on the Business
Day immediately preceding such date of determination, or at such other rate as 
may have been agreed to by the Borrower and the Agent;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ERISA</font>" means 
the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 of the United States of 
America, as amended from time to time;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ERISA 
Affiliate</font>" means, any trade or business (whether or not incorporated) 
that, together with the Borrower or any Subsidiary of the Borrower, is treated
as a single employer under Section 414 of the Code;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ERISA Event</font>" 
means:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za4cb9f33f08d4917bb369ed8edb92afa" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any of the events set forth in Section 4043(c) of ERISA or the regulations 
issued thereunder, other than those events for which the 30 day notice period 
has been waived;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z1da07401d13c49ae82b686ef492f9117" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any failure by any Pension Plan to satisfy the minimum funding standards 
(within the meaning of Section 412 or 430 of the Code or Section 303 of ERISA) 
applicable to such Pension Plan;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z52db18a2661b45b08eb94a8206210183" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the filing pursuant to Section 412 of the Code or Section 303 of ERISA of 
an application for a waiver of the minimum funding standard with respect to any 
Pension Plan, the failure to make by its due date (including extensions thereof)
a required payment under Section 430(j) of the Code with respect to any Pension
Plan or the failure by the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries or any ERISA 
Affiliate to make any required contribution to a Multiemployer Plan;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb9abafd2d4cc41f09bdad7f49c110708" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the incurrence by the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries or any&#160; 
ERISA Affiliate of any material liability under Title IV of ERISA including but 
not limited to the imposition of any material Security Interest in favor of the 
Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation (or any Successor) or any Pension 
Plan;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8495aef5cf7f4eaa8e665efb9296bede" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>a determination that any Pension Plan is, or is expected to be, in "at 
risk" status (within the meaning of Section 430(i) of the Code);</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="ze227cd740e884737a4f67212397cd989" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

4042 of ERISA;</div>

</td>

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the incurrence by the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries or any ERISA 
Affiliate of any material liability with respect to the withdrawal or partial 
withdrawal from any Pension Plan or Multiemployer Plan or a determination that a
Multiemployer Plan is, or is reasonably expected to be, insolvent, in 
reorganization or in endangered or critical status, within the meaning of 
Section 432 of the Code or Section 305 of ERISA; or</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

has the meaning ascribed thereto in Section&#160;10.4;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

Legislation Schedule</font>" means the EU Bail-In Legislation Schedule published
by the Loan Market Association (or any successor person), as in effect from time
to time;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Event of 
Default</font>" means any of the events or circumstances specified in 
Section&#160;10.1;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Excluded 
Subsidiary</font>" means a Subsidiary of the Borrower (other than a Material 
Subsidiary) which has a direct ownership interest in a Material 
Subsidiary;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

Taxes</font>" means:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7cf463f5c9f146df8ca4060ada0eb066" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>all Taxes based on, measured by or with respect to the Agent's or a 
Lender's net or gross income, gains, capital, receipts, franchises, excess 
profits or conduct of business (unless such Taxes are in lieu of any Taxes a 
Loan Party would otherwise be required to pay hereunder) that are Taxes imposed 
in a jurisdiction or any political subdivision thereof as a consequence of the 
Agent or applicable Lender carrying on a trade or business or having a permanent
establishment in that jurisdiction or otherwise being organized under the laws 
of or being a resident in that jurisdiction;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zaed018642baa43eb9b8d4e9fdff471a3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>all U.S. federal withholding Taxes imposed under FATCA, and any Taxes or 
penalties arising from a Lender's failure to properly comply with such Lender's 
obligations imposed under the <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times 
New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Canada-United States Enhanced Tax 
Information Exchange Agreement Implementation Act </font>(Canada) or similar 
provisions of legislation of any other jurisdiction that has entered into an

FATCA-based reporting in that jurisdiction; and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

<div>any Taxes imposed on a payment or deemed payment by reason of the recipient
(i) not dealing at arm's length (within the meaning of the <font style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE:

of the <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Income Tax Act</font> (Canada)), or (iii) not dealing
at arm's length (within the meaning of the <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Income Tax 
Act</font> (Canada)) with a "specified shareholder" of the Borrower, in each 
case, at the time of payment or deemed payment;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>

July 21, 2015 and October 27, 2015 among, <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

Sections 1471 through 1474 of the Code, as of the date of this Agreement (or any
amended or successor version that is substantively comparable and not materially
more onerous to comply with), any current or future regulations or official 
interpretations thereof and any agreements entered into pursuant to Section 
1471(b)(1) of the Code, any intergovernmental agreement entered into in 
connection with the implementation of the foregoing and any fiscal, regulatory, 
legislation, rules or practices adopted pursuant to any such intergovernmental 
agreement entered into in connection with Sections 1471 through 1474 of the 
Code;</div>

</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Federal Funds 
Rate</font>" means, on any day, the weighted average (rounded upwards, if 
necessary, to the next 1/100 of 1%) of the annual rates of interest on overnight
Federal funds transactions with members of the Federal Reserve System arranged 
by Federal funds brokers, as published on the next succeeding Business Day by 
the Federal Reserve Bank of New York, or, if such day is not a Business Day, 
such weighted average for the immediately preceding Business Day for which the 
same is published or, if such rate is not so published for any day that is a 
Business Day, the average (rounded upwards, if necessary, to the next 1/100 of 
1%) of the quotations for such day on such transactions received by the Agent 
from three Federal funds brokers of recognized standing selected by the Agent, 
acting reasonably;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Financial 
Calculation</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;1.5(b);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Financial Letter of 
Credit</font>" means any Letter of Credit issued by a Fronting Lender which such
Fronting Lender in accordance with its usual and customary practices determines 
is a "financial letter of credit" for capital adequacy purposes;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fiscal 
Quarter</font>" means the three (3)&#160;month period commencing on the first 
day of each Fiscal Year and each successive three month period thereafter during
such Fiscal Year;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fiscal Year</font>" 
means the Borrower's fiscal year currently commencing on January&#160;1 of each 
year and ending on December&#160;31 of such year;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Foreign 
Jurisdiction</font>" means a jurisdiction other than Canada or the United 
States;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fronted LC 
Commitment</font>" means, with respect to each Fronting Lender, such Fronting 
Lender's obligation to issue Letters of Credit (or, if so specified, certain 
types of Letters of Credit) on behalf of the Lenders for the account of the 
Borrower, subject to the terms of this Agreement, in an aggregate amount not at 
any time in excess of the amount set forth opposite such Lender's name in 
Schedule A hereto as such Lender's Fronted LC Commitment, as such amount may 
hereafter be cancelled, reduced, increased or terminated from time to time 
pursuant to the provisions of this Agreement;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fronted Letter of 
Credit</font>" means a Letter of Credit issued by a Fronting Lender for the 
account of the Lenders;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fronting Fee 
Rate</font>" means the per annum fee to be charged by a Fronting Lender for the 
issuance of a Fronted Letter of Credit by such Fronting Lender as agreed to from
time to time between such Fronting Lender and the Borrower;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fronting 
Lenders</font>" means RBC, CS, Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. and The Bank of Nova 
Scotia or such other Lenders as may be selected by the Agent and the Borrower, 
with the concurrence of such other Lenders, which assume in writing with the 
Borrower and the Agent the obligations of issuing Letters of Credit on behalf of
the Lenders under the Credit Facility to the extent of such Lender's Fronted LC 
Commitment, and "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fronting Lender</font>" means any one of them 
as the context requires;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">GAAP</font>" means 
generally accepted accounting principles which are in effect from time to time 
in Canada;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Governmental 
Action</font>" means an authorization, consent, approval, waiver, order, decree,
licence, exemption, permit, registration, filing, qualification or declaration 
of or with any Governmental Authority or the giving of notice to any 
Governmental Authority or any other action in respect of a Governmental 
Authority;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman',
