</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Governmental 
Authority</font>" means any federal, state, provincial, county, local or 
municipal government; any governmental body, agency, authority, board, bureau, 
department or commission (including any taxing authority); any instrumentality 
or office of any of the foregoing (including any court or tribunal) exercising 
executive, legislative, judicial, regulatory or administrative functions of or 
pertaining to government; or any Person directly or indirectly controlled by any
of the foregoing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">IFRS PP&amp;E 
Adjustment</font>" means the writedown (up to an aggregate amount of Cdn. 
$279,883,000) in respect of property, plant and equipment caused by the 
Borrower's adoption of International Financial Reporting Standards as of January
1, 2011;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Indemnified 
Liabilities</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;11.6;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Indemnified 
Taxes</font>" means Taxes other than Excluded Taxes;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Indemnitee</font>" 
has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;11.6;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Information</font>" 
has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;13.4;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Intangible 
Assets</font>" means assets which would be treated as intangibles under GAAP, 
including, without limitation, such items as goodwill, trade marks, trade names,
service marks, copyrights, patents and licenses, and expense and organization 
expenses;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Intellectual 
Property</font>" means the collective reference to all rights, priorities and 
privileges relating to intellectual property, whether arising under Canadian, 
United States, multinational or foreign laws or otherwise, including copyrights,
copyright licenses, patents, patent licenses, trademarks, trademark licenses, 
technology, know-how and processes, and all rights to sue at law or in equity 
for any infringement or other impairment thereof, including the right to receive
all proceeds and damages therefrom;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Interest 
Date</font>" means the first Business Day of each Fiscal Quarter;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ISDA Master 
Agreement</font>" means:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z73f8ff6ea7374d7e9d39457acc484f62" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the 1992 or 2002 International Swaps and Derivatives Association, Inc. 
Master Agreement (Multi Currency-Cross Border) as from time to time amended, 
restated or replaced by the International Swaps and Derivatives Association, 
Inc.; and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za668f4fed5a34893baabdc254b3f9ace" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>in respect of physically settled commodity swaps, such agreements as are 
usual and customary with respect thereto;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">and, in each case, as used in this 
Agreement in relation to Lender Swaps, means the form of such agreement as 
entered into between a Loan Party and the applicable Swap Lender;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Judgment 
Currency</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;13.2;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Judicial 
Order</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;3.11(l)(ii);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">LC 
Disbursements</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in 
Section&#160;3.11(l);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender BA Suspension
Notice</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;11.4(b)(ii);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

10pt">

<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman',

</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender Distress 
Event</font>" means, in respect of a Lender:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0540cb5963584d63a4539d80ff4c84b8" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent is subject to a forced liquidation, 
merger, sale or other change of control supported in whole or in part by 
guarantees or other support (including the nationalization or assumption of 
ownership or operating control by the Government of the United States, Canada or
any other Governmental Authority); or</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z21cadca0df5043f0aaab784a519a801f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent is otherwise adjudicated as, or determined
to be, insolvent or bankrupt, in each case, by any Governmental Authority having
regulatory authority over such Lender or Lender Parent or their respective 
assets;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">provided that, for certainty, a Lender 
Distress Event shall not have occurred solely by virtue of the ownership or 
acquisition of any equity interest in such Lender or its Lender Parent by any 
Governmental Authority;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender Insolvency 
Event</font>" means, in respect of a Lender:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z37f388567c4b4e07af778e1f2d7c0679" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent is dissolved (other than pursuant to a 
consolidation, amalgamation or merger);</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0d339e2c94714b8dad1dfb78115c1482" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent becomes insolvent, is deemed insolvent by 
Applicable Law or is unable to pay its debts or fails or admits in writing its 
inability generally to pay its debts as they become due;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc027ae9dfede44e88b45b275e8db1da4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent makes a general assignment, arrangement or
composition with or for the benefit of its creditors;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8093c1ae10aa4bae9a97b15ec62cc709" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent (i) institutes, or has instituted against 
it by a regulator, supervisor or any similar Governmental Authority with primary
insolvency, rehabilitative or regulatory jurisdiction over it in the 
jurisdiction of its incorporation or organization or the jurisdiction of its 
head or home office, (A) a proceeding pursuant to which such Governmental 
Authority takes control of such Lender's or Lender Parent's assets, (B)&#160;a 
proceeding seeking a judgment of insolvency or bankruptcy or any other relief 
under any bankruptcy, insolvency or winding-up law or other similar law 
affecting creditors' rights, or (C) a petition is presented for its winding-up 
or liquidation by it or such regulator, supervisor or similar Governmental 
Authority; or (ii)&#160;has instituted against it a proceeding seeking a 
judgment of insolvency or bankruptcy or any other relief under any bankruptcy, 
insolvency or winding-up law or other similar law affecting creditors' rights, 
or a petition is presented for its winding-up or liquidation, and such 
proceeding or petition is instituted or presented by a person or entity not 
described in clause (i) above and either (A) results in a judgment of insolvency
or bankruptcy or the entry of an order for relief or the making of an order for 
its winding-up or liquidation or (B) is not dismissed, discharged, stayed or 
restrained in each case within 15 days of the institution or presentation 
thereof;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0886eae1862f4819a240d03fe1cd61c4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent has a resolution passed for its winding-
up, official management or liquidation (other than pursuant to a consolidation, 
amalgamation or merger);</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd9bde2c21e524478ade4e4b59b2a6810" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(f)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent seeks or becomes subject to the 
appointment of an administrator, provisional liquidator, conservator, receiver, 
trustee, custodian or other similar official for it or for all or a substantial 
portion of all of its assets;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">20</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2ec90b7c3b474ae7a11391578e20f258" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(g)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent has a secured party take possession of all
or a substantial portion of all of its assets or has a distress, execution, 
attachment, sequestration or other legal process levied, enforced or sued on or 
against all or substantially all its assets and such secured party maintains 
possession, or any such process is not dismissed, discharged, stayed or 
restrained, in each case, within fifteen (15) days thereafter;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2ffddcc769104c489df028dbe13d592e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(h)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent causes or is subject to any event with 
respect to it which, under the Applicable Law of any jurisdiction, has an 
analogous effect to any of the events specified in paragraphs (a) to (g) above, 
inclusive; or</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z14a887cd46ae4a6cb6df4f2d124451fc" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Lender or its Lender Parent takes any action in furtherance of, or 
indicating its consent to, approval of, or acquiescence in, any of the 
foregoing;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender Libor 
Suspension Notice</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;11.4(a)
(iii);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender 
Parent</font>" means any Person that directly or indirectly controls a Lender 
and, for the purposes of this definition, "control" shall have the same meaning 
as set forth in the definition of "Affiliate" contained herein;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender Swap</font>" 
means any Swap entered into by any Loan Party where the other party (other than 
such Loan Party), at the time the Transaction was entered into under such Swap, 
is a Lender or an Affiliate of a Lender, whether or not such Lender remains a 
Lender thereafter;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender Transfer 
Agreement</font>" means an agreement substantially in the form attached hereto 
as Schedule H;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender's 
Proportion</font>" means, at any time with respect to each Lender, the 
proportion that such Lender's Commitment bears to the Total Commitment at such 
time and, if such Total Commitment is cancelled or terminated, "<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Lender's Proportion</font>" shall mean the Lender's Proportion of 
such Lender in effect immediately prior to such cancellation or 
termination;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lenders</font>" 
means each of the financial institutions named on the signature pages hereto as 
Lenders, including RBC in its capacity as a Lender but excluding RBC in its 
capacity as the Agent; and any other financial institution which is a Permitted 
Assignee that has executed a Lender Transfer Agreement pursuant to 
Section&#160;13.1 which Lender Transfer Agreement has been executed by the 
assignee and the Agent, and "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times 
New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender</font>" means any one of 
them;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Letter of 
Credit</font>" means a standby or documentary letter of credit or letter of 
guarantee in Cdn. Dollars or U.S. Dollars issued by the Fronting Lender at the 
request of the Borrower pursuant to this Agreement;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Letter of Credit 
Application</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;3.11(i)
(i);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Letter of Credit 
Fee</font>" means a fee based on the applicable Consolidated Total Debt to 
Adjusted EBITDA Ratio from the definition of "Applicable Margin" and expressed 
as a rate per three hundred and sixty-five (365) day period with respect to 
Letters of Credit issued by a Fronting Lender (on behalf of the Lenders) 
hereunder plus, in the case of documentary Letters of Credit, the administrative
costs and expenses incurred by such Fronting Lender in connection with the 
issuance of such Letters of Credit;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Libor</font>" means,
with respect to any Libor Interest Period applicable to a Libor Loan, the per 
annum rate of interest determined by the Agent by reference to the rate set by 
ICE Benchmark Administration for deposits in U.S. Dollars (as set forth by any 
service selected by the Agent that has been nominated by ICE Benchmark 
Administration as an authorized information vendor for the purpose of displaying
such rate which, as of the date hereof, is "LIBOR 01 Page" of Reuters Limited) 
for a period equal to the number of days in the applicable Libor Interest 
Period, at or about 11:00&#160;a.m. (London, England time) two (2) Business Days
prior to a Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover Date, as the case may be,
for such Libor Interest Period.&#160; If such "LIBOR 01 Page" is not available, 
then "Libor" shall mean, with respect to any Libor Interest Period, the rate 
determined by the Agent, based on a three hundred and sixty (360) day year, at 
which the Agent, in accordance with its normal practice, would be prepared to 
offer to leading banks in the London interbank market for delivery by the Agent,
on the first day of the applicable Libor Interest Period for a period equal to 
the number of days in such Libor Interest Period, deposits in U.S. Dollars 
having a term comparable to such Libor Interest Period and in amounts comparable
to the principal amount of such Libor Loan to be outstanding during such Libor 
Interest Period, at or about 11:00&#160;a.m. (London, England time) two (2) 
Business Days prior to a Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover Date, as the
case may be, for such Libor Interest Period; provided that if the rate 
determined above shall ever be less than zero, such rate shall be deemed to be 
zero for the purposes of this Agreement;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

10pt">

</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Libor Interest 
Date</font>" means the date falling on the last day of each Libor Interest 
Period; provided that if the Borrower selects a Libor Interest Period for a 
period longer than three (3) months, the Libor Interest Date shall be each date 
falling every three (3) months after the beginning of such Libor Interest Period
and the date falling on the last day of such Libor Interest Period;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Libor Interest 
Period</font>" means, with respect to each Libor Loan, the period (subject to 
availability) of approximately one (1) month, two (2) months, three (3) months 
or six (6) months (as selected by the Borrower and notified to the Agent 
pursuant to Section&#160;3.7) commencing on and including the Drawdown Date, 
Conversion Date or Rollover Date, as the case may be, applicable to such Libor 
Loan and ending on and including the last day of such period; provided that no 
Libor Interest Period may be selected which, in the case of any Libor Loan made 
by a Lender, ends after such Lender's Maturity Date;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

means the advances or any portion thereof, made available by the Lenders to the 
Borrower pursuant to Sections&#160;3.7, 3.14 or 3.15 and outstanding from time 
to time, which are denominated in U.S. Dollars and on which the Borrower has
agreed to pay interest in accordance with Section&#160;5.3;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

each Bankers' Acceptance, each application and indemnity with respect to a 
Letter of Credit, all other agreements, certificates, instruments and documents 
delivered by or on behalf of any Loan Party in connection herewith or therewith 
from time to time and all future renewals, extensions, or restatements of, or 
amendments, modifications or supplements to, all or any part of the 
foregoing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

Market</font>" means, in respect of any Swap and for any day on which the Mark-
to-Market is calculated, the amount, if any, that would be payable by any Loan 
Party to a counterparty (expressed as a positive number, a "<font style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Positive Mark-to-Market</font>") or by such counterparty to such Loan 
Party (expressed as a negative number, a "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Negative Mark-to-
Market</font>"), estimated by making at mid-market the calculations required by 
the ISDA Master Agreement between such counterparty, on the one hand, and such 
Loan Party, on the other hand, as if such ISDA Master Agreement were being 
terminated as a result of a Termination Event (as defined in the ISDA Master 
Agreement) with two Affected Parties (as defined in the ISDA Master Agreement) 
on that day of calculation;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

consideration by the Borrower and its Subsidiaries in excess of

<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">23</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">North American and 
Acceptable Secured Foreign Assets</font>" means, without duplication:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5a33d52d148949ac903fd18ab1ef7c77" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">
<div>(a)</div>
</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>those assets of the Canadian Loan Parties and the U.S. Loan Parties which 
are located in Canada, the United States or an Acceptable Foreign Jurisdiction; 
and</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zda3b0ac285cc45f99c58c18ec18382b4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">those assets of an 
Acceptable Foreign Material Subsidiary which are located in an Acceptable 
Foreign Jurisdiction where the Security Interest of the Security extends to such
assets, and the Security constitutes a first perfected Security Interest (or 
equivalent security under local law, as determined by the Agent, acting 
reasonably) on such assets, as determined by the Agent, acting reasonably, 
subject only to Permitted Encumbrances;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Obligations</font>" 
means all indebtedness and obligations of the Borrower to the Agent and the 
Lenders under or in respect of the Credit Facility;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">OFAC</font>" means 
the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the United States Treasury 
Department;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">One Month BA 
Rate</font>" means, on any day, the CDOR Rate (determined as of 10&#160;a.m. 
(Toronto time) on such day) which would be applicable in respect of an issuance 
of Bankers' Acceptances with a term to maturity of one month issued on such day,
or if such day is not a Business Day, then on the immediately preceding Business
Day;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Operating 
Facilities</font>" means those bilateral operating credit facilities provided by
a Lender (or its Affiliate) to a Loan Party providing for borrowings, letters of
credit, letters of guarantee or other credit accommodations in an aggregate 
principal amount not exceeding U.S.&#160;$150,000,000 or the Equivalent Amount 
in any other currency, and including without limitation:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5ddced0b60374c309c4412a4653872d1" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the credit facility 
provided by RBC to the Borrower pursuant to a letter agreement dated 
November&#160;17, 2010, as amended June 29, 2011, August 30, 2012 and October 3,
2013, and as further amended or restated from time to time, currently providing 
for Cdn.&#160;$40,000,000 in credit facilities;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Operating Facility 
Agreements</font>" means any agreements providing for Operating Facilities 
between a Loan Party and a Lender or Affiliate thereof;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Operating Facility 
Demand for Repayment</font>" means a demand made by an Operating Facility Lender
pursuant to an Operating Facility Agreement demanding repayment of all 
obligations thereunder;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Operating Facility
Indebtedness</font>" means, as at any time, the aggregate amount owing by the 
Loan Parties under any and all Operating Facility Agreements, the aggregate 
principal amount of which is for certainty not to exceed U.S.&#160;$150,000,000 
or the Equivalent Amount in any other currency;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

Lender</font>" means any Lender (or its Affiliate) providing Operating 
Facilities;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">25</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z61c2d47e49854ddeb822f0f0f3f79d69" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(g)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">easements, rights-of-way,
restrictions and other similar encumbrances incurred in the ordinary course of 
business that, in the aggregate, do not in any case materially detract from the 
value of the property subject thereto or materially interfere with the ordinary 
conduct of the business of the Borrower or any Subsidiary;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb385d6798af541c9b0a59297c9ba8bf6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(h)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Security Interests 
granted on oil and gas properties in the ordinary course of business pursuant to
customary agreements in the oil and gas business including royalties, net
carried interests, net profit interests and operator's liens;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zef94fc8b70fa42b1b17a0ce70cfd379c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">any interest or title of 
a lessor under any lease entered into by the Borrower or any Subsidiary in the 
ordinary course of its business and covering only the assets so leased;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7e5a6778017a4256b1228cb65c61d859" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right"><font style="FONT-

36pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right"><font style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif">(i)</font><font 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 1px; DISPLAY: inline-block; WIDTH: 
36pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Security Interests 
securing Debt assumed in connection with an Acquisition, provided that:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5e5765a9262a4b8cb7909893ad819dcc" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(A)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Debt exists at the time of such Acquisition and was not incurred in 
contemplation of such Acquisition;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6ce1edf22e1445d9855a882b1c7016e4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(B)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">such Security Interests 
exist at the time of such Acquisition and were not created in contemplation of 
or in connection with such Acquisition;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4893bc5979a94c7f98683a4f4fe6990e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(C)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">such Security Interests 
do not extend beyond the assets (including for certainty, shares and other 
ownership interests) acquired in such Acquisition or any proceeds thereof; 
and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z396fcbd614c24017ad10741f2dd542b1" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(D)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the only obligors with 
respect to such Debt are those Persons who were obligors of such Debt prior to 
such Acquisition and their permitted successors;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z19b1a0e3c9ca4f18bddfcc018f504bd9" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Security Interests 
securing Debt (in this subsection, the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Refinancing 
Acquisition Debt</font>") which refinances, refunds, renews or extends any Debt 
described in subparagraph&#160;(i) immediately above (in this subsection, the 
"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Original Acquisition Debt</font>") provided that the 
principal amount of the Refinancing Acquisition Debt does not exceed the 
principal amount then owing under the Original Acquisition Debt plus any premium
required by the terms of the Original Acquisition Debt paid to the holders of 
such Original Acquisition Debt and provided further that such Security Interests
do not extend beyond the assets originally subject to the Security Interests 
described in subparagraph&#160;(i) immediately above or any proceeds 
thereof;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">provided that the 
aggregate principal amount of Debt outstanding at any time secured by all 
Security Interests permitted by this subsection&#160;(j) and subsection&#160;(k)
below shall not exceed U.S.&#160;$600,000,000 or the Equivalent Amount in any 
other currency;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z541a4745ede049af94593ab633b36b88" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right"><font style="FONT-

id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 1px; DISPLAY: inline-block; WIDTH:

<td style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right"><font style="FONT-

id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 1px; DISPLAY: inline-block; WIDTH: 
36pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Security Interests 
securing Debt incurred to finance an Acquisition, provided that such Security 
Interests extend only to the assets acquired or any proceeds thereof (which 
assets may, for certainty, constitute shares or other ownership interests), or 
where a Subsidiary is acquired, to the assets of the Subsidiary so acquired; 
and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8beb11ca167c466894b3b67572633587" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Security Interests

FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Original Acquisition Debt</font>") provided that the

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

subsection&#160;(k) shall not exceed U.S.&#160;$600,000,000 or the Equivalent

financing statements solely as a precautionary measure in connection with

transfers of accounts, in each case to the extent not securing performance of a 
payment or other obligation;</td>
</tr>
</table>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Purchase Money Security 
Interests provided that such Security Interests are granted at the time of 
acquisition, construction, installation or improvement of the property subject
thereto or within 90 days thereafter and are limited to the property so 
acquired, constructed, installed or improved, and Security Interests constituted
by Capital Leases and Sale/Leasebacks, provided that the aggregate amount of 
Debt outstanding at any time secured by all such Purchase Money Security 
Interests, Capital Leases and Sale/Leasebacks shall not exceed the greater of 
U.S.&#160;$75,000,000 (or the Equivalent Amount in any other currency) and an 
amount equal to 2.5% of Consolidated Net Tangible Assets;</td>
</tr>
</table>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

granted by a Loan Party to another Loan Party provided such Security Interests 
are expressly subordinated to the Security;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

favour of the Second Lien Creditors in respect of Second Lien Debt so long as 
such Security Interests shall be subordinated and postponed to the Security 
Interests constituted by the Security in accordance with, and subject to, the 
Second Lien Intercreditor Agreement; and</td>
</tr>
</table>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

otherwise permitted above so long as:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb28864fb587746fb82cffd7399591181" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

amount of Debt outstanding at any time secured thereby does not exceed the 
greater of U.S.&#160;$150,000,000 (or the Equivalent Amount in any other 
currency) and an amount equal to 5% of Consolidated Net Tangible Assets;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc64b15050a8749bba78bfa02bf8b0384" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">such Security Interests 
do not cover all or substantially all of the assets of the Loan Parties as a

</tr>
</table>

<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">27</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf9a5eddd03d94163a13139d7235130f2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Security Interests do not create a lien on any service rigs of the 
Canadian Loan Parties or the U.S. Loan Parties (whether or not constituting 
Certificated Service Rigs) unless the Security granted hereunder, and any
registrations in public registry offices (including registrations against 
specific serial numbers) and/or any deliveries of certificates of title in 
respect thereof, would result in the Security Interests under the Security 
constituting a prior lien on the service rigs affected thereby;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">provided that, notwithstanding anything to
the contrary contained herein, where a maximum amount of Debt may be secured 
pursuant to a subsection above, such maximum amount shall be deemed not to have 
been exceeded where such excess occurs solely as a result of fluctuations in the
exchange rates of currencies;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Permitted 
Reorganization Subsidiary</font>" means any Subsidiary of the Borrower which is 
incorporated or formed under the laws of Canada or the United States (or any 
province, territory or state thereof) and which owns assets having a value not 
in excess of U.S.&#160;$25,000,000 (or the Equivalent Amount in any other 
currency);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Person</font>" means
any individual, firm, partnership, limited partnership, trust, company, 
corporation or other body corporate, government, governmental body, agency, 
instrumentality, unincorporated body of persons or association;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Plan</font>" means 
any employee benefit plan as defined in Section 3(3) of ERISA, including any 
employee welfare benefit plan (as defined in Section 3(1) of ERISA), any 
employee pension benefit plan (as defined in Section 3(2) of ERISA), and any 
plan which is both an employee welfare benefit plan and an employee pension 
benefit plan, and in respect of which the Borrower or any Subsidiary of the 
Borrower or any ERISA Affiliate is&#160; an "employer" as defined in Section 
3(5) of ERISA, but excluding employee benefit plans or arrangements mandated by 
non-U.S. law;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Positive Mark-to-
Market</font>" has the meaning attributed to it in the definition of "Mark-to-
Market";</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Prime Loan</font>" 
means the advances or any portion thereof made available by the Lenders to the 
Borrower pursuant to Section&#160;3.7, 3.11(j), 3.14 or 3.15 and outstanding 
from time to time, which are denominated in Canadian Dollars and on which the 
Borrower has agreed to pay interest in accordance with Section&#160;5.1;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Prime Rate</font>" 
means, with respect to Prime Loans on any day, the greater of:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z48aa56221bb445a0b19f13f448ade4ec" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the annual rate of 
interest announced from time to time by the Agent as being its reference rate 
then in effect for determining interest rates on Canadian Dollar denominated 
commercial loans made by the Agent in Canada; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc3745899d8144a53b28c610816d04413" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the One&#160;Month BA 
Rate in effect on such day plus 100 bps;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Purchase Money 
Security Interest</font>" means:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z19ba728f42ef424fa07a7b6a5a7f0b71" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">a Security Interest taken
or reserved in fixed or capital assets to secure payment of all or part of the 
cost of acquisition, construction, installation or improvement of such assets; 
and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">a Security Interest taken
in fixed or capital assets by a Person who gives value for the purpose of 
enabling a Loan Party to acquire rights in such assets, to the extent that the 
value is applied to acquire those rights;</td>
</tr>

means Regulation T of the Board as in effect from time to time;</div>

means Regulation U of the Board as in effect from time to time;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Regulation X</font>"
means Regulation X of the Board as in effect from time to time;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Release</font>" 
means any release, spill, emission, leaking, pumping, pouring, injection, 
escaping, deposit, disposal, discharge, leeching or migration of any element or 
compound in or into the indoor or outdoor environment (including the abandonment
or disposal of any barrels, tanks, containers or receptacles containing any 
contaminant), or in, into or out of any vessel or facility, including the 
movement of any contaminant through the air, soil, subsoil, surface, water, 
groundwater, rock formation or otherwise;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Release Date</font>"
has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;6.9;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Remaining 
Lenders</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;12.16;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Reorganization 
Transaction</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;9.2(d);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Repayment 
Notice</font>" means a notice to effect a repayment of Borrowings delivered 
under Section&#160;3.12 and substantially in the form of Schedule B with all 
applicable blanks completed;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Requested 
Lender</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;3.3(a);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Request for 
Extension</font>" means a request of the Borrower substantially in the form 
attached as Schedule G;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Rollover</font>" 
means, in respect of a maturing Bankers' Acceptance or Libor Loan, the provision
by a Lender of a further Borrowing by way of a Bankers' Acceptance or Libor 
Loan, as applicable, in the same currency, the proceeds of which are to be 
applied in whole or part to the repayment of the maturing Borrowing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Rollover 
Date</font>" means that date that a Rollover is to be made pursuant to a 
Rollover Notice;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Rollover 
Notice</font>" means a notice to effect a Rollover delivered under 
Section&#160;3.15 and substantially in the form of Schedule C with all 
applicable blanks completed;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">S&amp;P</font>" 
means Standard &amp; Poor's Ratings Services, a division of The McGraw-Hill 
Companies, Inc. and its successors;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Sale/Leaseback</font>" means an arrangement under which title to any 
property or asset, or an interest therein, is transferred by a Person (the 
"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">First-Mentioned Person</font>") to some other Person which 
leases or otherwise gives or grants the right to use such property or asset or 
interest therein to the First-Mentioned Person, whether or not in connection 
therewith the First Mentioned Person also acquires a right or is subject to an 
obligation to re&#8209;acquire the property, asset or interest, and regardless 
of the accounting treatment of such arrangement;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">29</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Sanctioned 
Country</font>" means, at any time, a country or territory which is the subject 
or target of any Sanctions;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Sanctioned 
Person</font>" means, at any time, any Person listed in any Sanctions-related 
list of designated Persons maintained by OFAC, the U.S. Department of State, or 
by the United Nations Security Council, in all cases, to the extent not 
inconsistent with Applicable Law in Canada;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Sanctions</font>" 
means economic or financial sanctions or trade embargoes imposed, administered 
or enforced from time to time by a Sanctions Authority that are applicable to 
the Borrower or its Subsidiaries; provided that, with respect to economic or 
financial sanctions or trade embargoes imposed, administered or enforced from 
time to time by the United Nations Security Council, to the extent such 
sanctions or trade embargoes are not inconsistent with Applicable Law in 
Canada;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Sanctions 
Authority</font>" means any of: (i) the Canadian government; (ii) the United 
States government; (iii) the United Nations Security Council; or (iv) the 
respective governmental institutions, departments and agencies of any of the 
foregoing, including OFAC and the United States Department of State, in each 
case, to the extent not inconsistent with Applicable Law in Canada; and "<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Sanctions Authorities</font>" means all of the foregoing Sanctions
Authorities, collectively;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Schedule&#160;I 
Lender</font>" means a Lender which is a Canadian chartered bank listed on 
Schedule&#160;I to the <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Bank Act</font> (Canada);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Schedule&#160;I 
Reference Lender</font>" means each of RBC and such other Schedule&#160;I Lender
as is agreed to from time to time by the Borrower and the Agent, each acting 
reasonably, provided that there shall be no more than two Schedule&#160;I 
Reference Lenders at any one time;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Schedule&#160;II 
Lender</font>" means a Lender which is a Canadian chartered bank listed on 
Schedule&#160;II or Schedule&#160;III to the <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Bank Act</font> 
(Canada) (other than a Lender that is a Non-Acceptance Lender);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Schedule&#160;II 
Reference Lender</font>" means:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zaa10d8d50da040378e923a22648e2834" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">if there is only one 
Schedule&#160;II Lender, such Schedule&#160;II Lender; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7ff7f5a74f3e406987423a2e01dc819c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">if there is more than one
Schedule&#160;II Lender, such Schedule&#160;II Lenders as are agreed to from 
time to time by the Borrower and the Agent, each acting reasonably;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">provided that there shall be no more than 
two Schedule&#160;II Reference Lenders at any one time;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Second Lien 
Creditors</font>" means, collectively, the lenders (including holders of any 
bonds, debentures, notes or other evidence of indebtedness under any Second Lien
Financing Agreement), and any administrative or collateral agents or trustees 
from time to time under any Second Lien Financing Agreement, and includes any 
replacements thereof in connection with a Second Lien Refinancing;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Second Lien 
Debt</font>" means all Debt created, incurred or issued by the Borrower which is
owing to Second Lien Creditors pursuant to the terms of a Second Lien Financing 
Agreement, which Debt has the following characteristics:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3b78472485624787951990c1844e0c6f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the aggregate principal 
amount thereof outstanding at any time shall not exceed U.S.$400,000,000;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">an initial final maturity
in respect of repayment of principal later than six (6) months after the then 
latest Maturity Date in effect at the time such Second Lien Debt is created, 
incurred, assumed or guaranteed;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">no scheduled cash 
principal payments thereunder prior to the sixth (6) month after the then latest
Maturity Date in effect at time such Second Lien Debt is created, incurred or 
issued;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0ce85eeb593e41e8806cf3a2cb5eae97" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
