<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">no cross-default (as 
opposed to cross-acceleration) to non-payment defaults under other Debt and no 
maintenance financial tests (as opposed to a Debt incurrence test);</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7073037e3ebe4fa2ba74a5b8e75071bf" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">no Default or Event of 
Default shall have occurred and be continuing immediately prior to the 
incurrence of such Second Lien Debt or will occur as a result of the incurrence 
of such Second Lien Debt;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zcc843825b9d8468890a3b5705a8f1168" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">immediately after giving 
effect to the incurrence of such Second Lien Debt, determined on a <font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
STYLE: italic">pro forma</font>&#160; basis (including a <font style="FONT-SIZE:

forma</font> application of the net proceeds therefrom or reduction of the 
Specified Unsecured Debt exchanged therefor) as if such Second Lien Debt had 
been incurred on the first day of the applicable calculation period:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z181774d9c02b4d7caf22cc5db1302aac" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Consolidated Interest
Expense for the four Fiscal Quarters ending on the applicable calculation date 
excluding Consolidated Interest Expense attributable to Debt under the Credit 
Facility and the Operating Facilities (the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated 
Adjusted Interest Expense</font>") is not more than 5% greater than the actual 
Consolidated Adjusted Interest Expense for such period; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zeb43bcbfe71a4a95b178675af08d3601" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Borrower is in 
compliance with the financial covenants set forth in Section 9.3; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zbd70c3e423a34e8ebca14cb9b556781f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such Second Lien Debt is secured and subject to (i) a fall-away of Security
Interests on the same terms as Section 6.9 and (ii) a Second Lien Intercreditor 
Agreement;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Second Lien 
Financing Agreement</font>" means any credit agreement, indenture or other 
principal financing document by and among the Borrower, any of its Subsidiaries,
if applicable, and the Second Lien Creditors governing the terms and conditions 
of the Second Lien Debt as such agreement, indenture or other document may be 
amended, restated, supplemented or replaced from time to time as permitted 
hereunder and under the Second Lien Intercreditor Agreement;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Second Lien 
Intercreditor Agreement</font>" means an intercreditor agreement by and between 
the Borrower, the Material Subsidiaries, the Second Lien Creditors (or a 
representative thereof), and the Agent on behalf of itself, the Lenders, the 
Cash Management Facility Providers and the Swap Lenders, as amended, restated, 
supplemented or replaced from time to time, which intercreditor agreement shall 
incorporate the material terms set forth in Schedule L hereto with such 
amendments and additions thereto as may be agreed to by (i) in the case of
amendments and additions that are solely administrative in nature, the Agent, or
(ii) in all other cases, the Majority Lenders, in their sole discretion, and 
shall otherwise be in form and substance satisfactory to the Agent and the 
Majority Lenders, in their sole discretion;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Second Lien 
Refinancing</font>" means any Debt incurred to refinance, refund, renew or 
extend any existing Second Lien Debt (in this definition, "<font style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Existing Second Lien Debt</font>") provided that:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf5f42c5f0d82419cab7f78d7ecf2efcf" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the principal amount 
thereof does not exceed the principal amount then owing under the Existing 
Second Lien Debt plus any accrued and unpaid interest thereon and any premium 
required by the terms of the Existing Second Lien Debt to be paid to the holders
of such Existing Second Lien Debt; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">31</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z86750d248e954775911040400758df2f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>such permitted refinancing indebtedness otherwise meets the requirements of
the definition of Second Lien Debt;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Secured 
Documents</font>" means collectively, this Agreement, the Lender Swaps, the 
Operating Facility Agreements and the Cash Management Facility Agreements;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Secured 
Lenders</font>" means the Agent, the Lenders, the Swap Lenders, the Operating 
Facility Lenders and the Cash Management Facility Providers, and "<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Secured Lender</font>" means any of them;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Secured 
Obligations</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section<font style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">&#160;</font>6.1;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Security</font>" has
the meaning ascribed thereto in Section&#160;6.1, any amendments thereto and any
indentures or instruments supplemental to or in implementation thereof, and any 
and all other documents, instruments or agreements pursuant to which the Agent 
on behalf of any Secured Lender is granted or receives a Security Interest 
pursuant to the terms hereof or thereof;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Security 
Interest</font>" means any assignment, mortgage, charge, pledge, lien, hypothec,
encumbrance securing or in effect securing an obligation or indebtedness of any 
Person, conditional sale, title retention agreement, control agreement or 
security interest whatsoever, howsoever created or arising, whether absolute or 
contingent, fixed or floating, legal or equitable, perfected or not, and 
includes the rights of a lessor pursuant to a Capital Lease or Sale/Leaseback 
but not under an operating lease, but does not include a right of set-off or a 
set-off;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Significant 
Acquisition</font>" means any Acquisition that involves the payment of 
consideration by the Borrower and its Subsidiaries in excess of an amount equal 
to 5% of Consolidated Net Tangible Assets;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Specified Change of 
Control</font>" means a "Change of Control" (or any other defined term having a 
similar purpose substituted in lieu thereof) as defined in the 2019 Note 
Indenture, 2020 Note Indenture, 2021 Note Indenture or 2024 Note Indenture or a 
"change of control" (or other term having a similar purpose as that used in the 
2019 Note Indenture, 2020 Note Indenture, the 2021 Note Indenture or the 2024 
Note Indenture) under any other note indenture, trust indenture or other 
document under which any unsecured bonds, notes, debentures or other debt 
instruments are issued;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Specified Unsecured 
Debt</font>" means the 2019 Notes, the 2020 Notes, the 2021 Notes, the 2024 
Notes and any other Debt of a Loan Party (other than inter-corporate debt) for 
which security has not been granted&#160; and in respect of which the lender 
does not have a preferential interest by operation of law or otherwise over that
of the Secured Lenders in the assets of such Loan Party, or in the assets 
formerly held by such Loan Party and transferred to such lender as part of such 
Debt transaction;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Standard 
Term</font>" means, in respect of a Bankers' Acceptance, a term of 1 month, 2 
months, 3 months or 6 months;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Standby Fee 
Rate</font>" means, at any time, the rate, expressed as a rate per annum based 
on a year of three hundred sixty-five (365) days, set out in the following table
opposite the applicable Consolidated Total Debt to Adjusted EBITDA Ratio:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">32</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">provided that changes in the Standby Fee 
Rate shall be effective and adjusted in accordance with Section 5.11.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Subject Maturity 
Date</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;3.3(a);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Subsidiary</font>" 
means, as to any Person, a corporation, partnership, limited partnership, 
limited liability company, unlimited liability company, trust or other entity of
which shares of stock or other ownership interests having ordinary voting power 
(other than stock or such other ownership interests having such power only by 
reason of the happening of a contingency) to elect a majority of the board of 
directors or other managers of such corporation, partnership, company, trust or 
other entity are at the time owned, or the management of which is otherwise 
controlled, directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, or both, 
by such Person.&#160; Unless otherwise qualified, all references to a 
"Subsidiary" or to "Subsidiaries" in this Agreement shall refer to a Subsidiary 
or Subsidiaries of&#160; the Borrower;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Successor</font>" 
has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;9.2(d);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Swap</font>" means 
an agreement entered into between a Person and a counterparty on a case by case 
basis, the purpose and effect of which is to mitigate or eliminate such Person's
exposure to fluctuations in exchange rates, interest rates or commodity prices, 
including for certainty forward rate agreements, currency swaps, currency 
exchanges, interest rate swaps, interest rate options, cap transactions, floor 
transactions, collar transactions and other similar transactions;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Swap Demand for 
Payment</font>" means a demand made by a Swap Lender pursuant to an agreement 
evidencing a Lender Swap demanding payment of all obligations relating thereto 
and shall include, without limitation, any notice under any agreement evidencing
a Lender Swap which, when delivered, would require an early termination thereof 
and may require a payment by any Loan Party in settlement of obligations 
thereunder as a result of such early termination;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Swap 
Indebtedness</font>" means, as at any time, the aggregate amount owing by the 
Loan Parties under all Lender Swaps, and when such amount is calculated at any 
time on or after the Adjustment Time, means, for each Swap Lender an amount 
determined by such Swap Lender by calculating for each of its Lender Swaps, the 
Termination Amount, and determining the difference, if positive, of the 
aggregate net amounts payable by any Loan Party to such Swap Lender;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Swap Lender</font>" 
means a Person which, at the time that it entered into any Swap with any Loan 
Party, was a Lender or an Affiliate of a Lender;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Takeover</font>" has
the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;3.6;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Takeover 
Loan</font>" has the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;3.6(c);</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">33</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Target</font>" has 
the meaning ascribed to it in Section&#160;3.6;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Tax Refund</font>" 
has the meaning given to it in Section 7.3;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Tax or Taxes</font>"
means all present and future taxes, rates, levies, imposts, assessments, dues, 
government fees, stamp taxes, deductions, charges or withholdings, and all 
liabilities with respect thereto, and any interest, additions to tax and 
penalties imposed with respect thereto, excluding, with respect to the Agent or 
any Lender, taxes (including sales, use or goods and services tax) imposed on 
its income, purchases or capital and franchise taxes imposed on it by any 
taxation authority;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Termination 
Amount</font>" means, in respect of a Lender Swap on any day, the amount 
(whether positive or negative) determined by the Swap Lender thereunder in 
accordance with its customary practices and acting reasonably as of the close of
business as though such day were an "Early Termination Date" and the Swap was a 
"Terminated Transaction" in accordance with the payment measures provided for in
the ISDA Master Agreement between any Loan Party and such Swap Lender, with any 
such termination amount being expressed in U.S. Dollars and all defined terms 
used in this definition and not otherwise defined in this Agreement having the
meaning ascribed thereto in such ISDA Master Agreement;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Termination 
Event</font>" means:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0572fe91cf9f4ce8a65402852dedc122" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">an automatic acceleration
of the repayment of indebtedness outstanding hereunder without any notice being 
required thereunder from the Agent or any Lender;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc69d023d0e474262a27b92e369827288" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">an automatic early 
termination of obligations relating to a Lender Swap, without any notice being 
required from the Swap Lender; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5fa37ba7237f41f684f668f2d4cfd106" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">an automatic acceleration
of the repayment of indebtedness or other obligations outstanding under an 
Operating Facility or a Cash Management Facility, without any notice being 
required from the applicable Operating Facility Lender or Cash Management 
Facility Provider, as the case may be;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Total 
Commitment</font>" means, at any time, the amount equal to the aggregate of the 
Commitments of each Lender at such time, not to exceed U.S. $550,000,000 except 
in the circumstances provided for in Section&#160;3.4;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Transaction</font>" 
has the meaning ascribed thereto in the applicable ISDA Master Agreement between
any Loan Party and a Swap Lender;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Uniform Commercial 
Code</font>" means the Uniform Commercial Code as from time to time in effect in
the State of New York or any other state of the United States relevant to the 
determination of the issue in question;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">U.S. Base 
Rate</font>" means, with respect to U.S. Base Rate Loans on any day, the highest
of:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="ze09e40e42277443692d941e26bae2b23" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the annual rate of 
interest announced from time to time by the Agent as being its reference rate 
then in effect for determining interest rates on U.S. Dollar denominated 
commercial loans made by the Agent in Canada;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="ze1ab5646369f4ba5b3e3cce2c7d89e8e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Federal Funds Rate 
plus 50 bps; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="ze0e8b23bc3dd41bcb8256dd66a7d9f81" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>Libor for a one (1) month Libor Interest Period plus 75 bps;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">U.S. Base Rate 
Loan</font>" means the advances or any portion thereof made available by the 
Lenders to the Borrower pursuant to Section&#160;3.7, 3.11(j), 3.14 or 3.15 and 
outstanding from time to time, which are denominated in U.S. Dollars and on 
which the Borrower has agreed to pay interest in accordance with 
Section&#160;5.2;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">U.S. Dollars</font>"
and the symbol "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">U.S.&#160;$</font>" each mean lawful money of 
the United States of America;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">U.S. Loan 
Parties</font>" means those Loan Parties which are incorporated or formed under 
the laws of the United States or a state or territory thereof, and "<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">U.S. Loan Party</font>" means any of them;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Voting 
Shares</font>" means:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zfb4db347589a460cbdaeaba2cf3bfddc" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">share capital of any 
class of any corporation or securities of any other Person which carry voting 
rights to elect the board of directors or other body exercising similar 
functions under any circumstances, but shares or other securities which carry 
the right to so vote conditionally upon the happening of an event shall not be 
considered Voting Shares until the occurrence of such event; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z43363194254c47e380f337b9ef37a9a5" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">an interest in a general 
partnership, limited partnership, trust or similar Person which entitles the 
holder of such interest to receive a share of the profits, or on dissolution or

</tr>

</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

Conversion Powers</font>" means with respect to any EEA Resolution Authority, 
the write-down and conversion powers of such EEA Resolution Authority from time 
to time under the Bail-In Legislation for the applicable EEA Member Country, 
which write-down and conversion powers are described in the EU Bail-In 
Legislation Schedule.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

unless otherwise specifically provided,</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the singular includes the

point of reception, including facsimile and "include", "includes" and

limitation";</td>
</tr>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3c8dc1e986bb48af8c0d480bdf4638d6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">references to any 
statute, act or other legislative enactment shall be to such statute, act or 
other legislative enactment as amended from time to time or replaced by a 
statute, act or other legislative enactment dealing with substantially the same 
subject matter as the statute, act or other legislative enactment so 
replaced.</td>
</tr>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zca72c329ce914ecba509bd67b2699493" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">1.5</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Generally Accepted Accounting Principles</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z59ed519a32c6452fbf99ef3a3462fe5f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Accounting Terms</font>:&#160; All financial statements required to be 
furnished by the Borrower to the Agent hereunder shall be prepared in accordance
with GAAP. Each accounting term used in this Agreement, unless otherwise defined
herein, has the meaning assigned to it under GAAP and, except as otherwise 
provided herein, reference to any balance sheet item, statement of income item 
or statement of cash flows item means such item as computed from the applicable 
financial statement prepared in accordance with GAAP.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2ddf18e7f014416a9d2fd02d7b102c07" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%"
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Change in GAAP or 
Accounting Policy:&#160; If:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z12a33c6953b0496d9f9acc07f1023b76" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">there occurs a change in 
GAAP, including as a result of a conversion to International Financial Reporting
Standards; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6e3cf6d912f84998a96b18b14bab3086" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the Borrower or any of the Material Subsidiaries adopts a change in an 
accounting policy in order to more appropriately present events or transactions 
in its financial statements;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">and the above change 
would cause an amount required to be determined for the purposes of any 
financial covenant or any other financial calculation or threshold (each a 
"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Financial Calculation</font>") to be different than the 
amount that would be determined without giving effect to such change, the 
Borrower shall notify the Agent of such change (an "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Accounting Change</font>").&#160; Such notice (an "<font style="FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Accounting Change Notice</font>") shall describe the nature of the 
Accounting Change and state whether the Borrower desires to revise the method of
calculating one or more of the Financial Calculations (including the revision of
any of the defined terms used in the determination of such Financial 
Calculation) in order that amounts determined after giving effect to such 
Accounting Change and the revised method of calculating such Financial 
Calculation will approximate the amount that would be determined without giving 
effect to such Accounting Change and without giving effect to the revised method
of calculating such Financial Calculation.&#160; The Accounting Change Notice 
shall be delivered to the Agent&#160; within forty-five (45) days after the end 
of the Fiscal Quarter in which the Accounting Change is implemented or, if such 
Accounting Change is implemented in the fourth Fiscal Quarter or in respect of 
an entire Fiscal Year, within ninety (90) days after the end of such period, 
provided that, in a situation where an Accounting Change does not have an 
immediate impact on the calculations or thresholds then applicable to the 
Borrower, the Borrower shall be entitled to deliver an additional Accounting 
Change Notice once such change does have an impact (provided that no more than 
one such additional Accounting Change Notice may be delivered in any one Fiscal 
Quarter), and the provisions hereof shall also apply to such additional 
Accounting Change Notice.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z79713d91f3bc4913819699857832e19a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Majority 
Lender Notification</font>:&#160; If, pursuant to the Accounting Change Notice, 
the Borrower does not indicate that it desires to revise the method of 
calculating one or more of the Financial Calculations, the Majority Lenders may 
within thirty (30) days after receipt of the Accounting Change Notice notify the
Borrower that they wish to revise the method of calculating one or more of the 
Financial Calculations in the manner described above.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">36</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5abdb105e2c84a6a9f36a7237a1cb14c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Revised 
Calculations</font>:&#160; If either the Borrower or the Majority Lenders so 
indicate that they wish to revise the method of calculating one or more of the 
Financial Calculations, the Borrower and the Majority Lenders shall in good 
faith attempt to agree on a revised method of calculating such Financial 
Calculations so as to reflect equitably such Accounting Change with the desired 
result that the criteria for evaluating the Borrower's financial condition shall
be substantially the same after such Accounting Change as if such Accounting 
Change had not been made.&#160; Until the Borrower and the Majority Lenders have
reached agreement in writing on such revised method of calculation, all amounts 
to be determined hereunder shall continue to be determined without giving effect
to the Accounting Change.&#160; For greater certainty, if no notice of a desire 
to revise the method of calculating the Financial Calculations in respect of an 
Accounting Change is given by either the Borrower or the Majority Lenders within
the applicable time period described above, then the method of calculating the 
Financial Calculations shall not be revised in response to such Accounting 
Change and all amounts to be determined pursuant to the Financial Calculations 
shall be determined after giving effect to such Accounting Change.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8092d3c8de614435b084d4b02f69fc8c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Revised 
Compliance Certificates</font>:&#160; If a Compliance Certificate is delivered 
in respect of a Fiscal Quarter or Fiscal Year in which an Accounting Change is 
implemented without giving effect to any revised method of calculating any of 
the Financial Calculations, and subsequently, as provided above, the method of 
calculating one or more of the Financial Calculations is revised in response to 
such Accounting Change, or the amounts to be determined pursuant to any of the 
Financial Calculations are to be determined without giving effect to such 
Accounting Change, the Borrower shall deliver a revised Compliance 
Certificate.&#160; Any Event of Default which arises as a result of the 
Accounting Change and which is cured by this Section&#160;1.5 shall be deemed to
have never occurred.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc5f1d436f0c24434b0550cad5c985ba3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">1.6</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>Time</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Unless otherwise 
provided herein, all references to a time in this Agreement shall mean local 
time in the city of Calgary, Alberta.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z65d99bea15774a248cab5f1600d0e9ef" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">1.7</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Payment for Value</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">All payments required 
to be made hereunder shall be made for value on the required day in same day 
immediately available funds.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdc9b988858be474c83802fcf5bcd1aa3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">1.8</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Monetary References</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Whenever an amount of 
money is referred to herein, such amount shall, unless otherwise expressly 
stated, be in U.S. Dollars.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">ARTICLE&#160;2<font
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><br>
</font> REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za1ac6961d9cd4f2683a6f95ff2e753cd" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">2.1</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Representations and Warranties</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower represents
and warrants to each of the Lenders and the Agent (all of which representations 
and warranties the Borrower hereby acknowledges are being relied upon by the 
Lenders and the Agent in entering into this Agreement) that:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">37</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z595c5b1871aa4212bd1a641ee528882f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Existence:</font>&#160; each Loan Party is a duly incorporated, 
amalgamated, formed or created corporation, partnership or trust, as applicable,
is validly existing under its jurisdiction of incorporation, amalgamation, 
formation or creation, as applicable, and is duly registered and qualified as an
extra-provincial corporation, partnership or trust, as applicable, under the 
laws of each jurisdiction in which the nature of any business transacted by it 
or the character of any properties and assets owned or leased by it requires 
such registration and qualification, except where the failure to be so 
registered or qualified would not reasonably be expected to have a Material
Adverse Effect;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc675ba046fb24f2c882c66743b9e3ebe" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Power:</font>&#160; each Loan Party has full corporate, partnership or 
trust, as applicable, capacity, power and authority to own its properties and 
assets, to conduct business as now conducted and as proposed to be conducted, to
execute and deliver each Loan Document to which it is a party and to perform its
obligations thereunder;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb33216c7d37341738b6e5c6fc66abbb3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Authorization:</font>&#160; the execution, delivery and performance by 
each Loan Party of each of the Loan Documents to which it is a party have been 
duly authorized by all necessary corporate, partnership, trust or other 
action;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zef85874ccb5e49e1a3d01bd3340948c3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Execution:</font>&#160; each Loan Document to which any Loan Party is a 
party has been duly executed and delivered by it;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z48b5707b33a04e2c80c419d860d1e885" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Binding 
Obligations:</font>&#160; each Loan Document to which any Loan Party is a party 
is a legal, valid and binding obligation of such Loan Party, enforceable against
such Loan Party in accordance with its terms except as enforceability may be 
limited by general principles of equity and by Applicable Laws regarding 
bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization or similar laws affecting creditors' 
rights generally and by moratorium laws from time to time in effect;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf5c18c2db0324afeb001bd9d0f62b42a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(f)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">No Legal 
Bar or Resultant Lien re: Loan Documents:</font>&#160; the execution, delivery 
and performance by each Loan Party of each Loan Document to which it is a 
party:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">does not and will not 
violate its articles, by-laws, partnership agreement, trust indenture (each as 
applicable) or other governing documents;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

result in a breach of or constitute a default or require any consent under, or 
result in the creation of any Security Interest, other than a Permitted 
Encumbrance, upon any of its property or assets pursuant to any material 
indenture or other material agreement or material instrument to which it is a 
party or by which it or its property or assets may be bound or affected;</td>
</tr>
</table>

pending or, to the best of the knowledge, information and belief of any Loan 
Party, threatened against any Loan Party at law or in equity by or before any

instrumentality, domestic or foreign, or before any arbitrator of any kind which

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Environmental Laws</font>:&#160; each Loan Party:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3e8640fcfdb74de788b312376416c4bd" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">has obtained, made or 
given all Governmental Actions which are required under all applicable 
Environmental Laws except to the extent that failure to obtain, make or give the
same would not reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

</tr>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

expected to have a Material Adverse Effect;</td>

&#8211; <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Continuous Disclosure Obligations</font>, as amended 
from time to time.</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Each request by the 
Borrower for Accommodations on any Drawdown Date shall be deemed to be a 
representation and warranty by the Borrower to the Agent and each Lender that 
the representations and warranties contained in Section&#160;2.1 (other than 
those made as of a specific date) are, as of the date of such request, and will 
be, as of the applicable Drawdown Date, true and correct in all material 
respects and that there exists no Default or Event of Default, and each request 
by the Borrower for a Conversion or Rollover shall be deemed to be a 
representation by the Borrower to the Agent and each Lender that as of the date 
of such request and as of the applicable Conversion Date or Rollover Date, as 
applicable, there exists no Default or Event of Default.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman',

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">ARTICLE&#160;3<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><br>
</font> THE CREDIT FACILITIES</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z552fe65a85e546ed9f2e29fc6272695b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.1</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Amendment and Restatement</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Relying on each of the 
representations and warranties set out in Article 2 and subject to the terms and
conditions of this Agreement, the Lenders, the Agent and the Borrower agree 
that, effective on the Effective Date, the Existing Credit Agreement shall be 
amended and restated in its entirety on the terms and conditions of this 
Agreement and all indebtedness and liability of the Borrower to the Lenders and 
the Agent under (and as defined in) the Existing Credit Agreement including, 
without limitation, "Borrowings" (as defined under the Existing Credit 
Agreement) and accrued and unpaid interest and fees thereon and standby fees 
accrued thereunder, shall be construed as indebtedness and liability of the 
Borrower to the Lenders and the Agent under this Agreement.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z289b8688ca51438296a49d3562b072a9" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.2</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Obligations of Each Lender</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Relying on each of the 
representations and warranties set out in Article&#160;2 and subject to the 
terms and conditions of this Agreement, each Lender agrees to make 
Accommodations available to the Borrower up to the amount of its Commitment 
commencing on the date of this Agreement and ending on the Maturity Date of each
such Lender, by way of:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb6fe2ce3680d43e78daccc5e7e4b8c7b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Loans</font>:&#160; the advance of Prime Loans, U.S. Base Rate Loans or 
Libor Loans by such Lender and the delivery of the proceeds of such advance for 
the account of the Borrower through the Agent at the Agent's Account for 
Payments;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z9bc521f39b2b4542b09fb9c8ea9903bf" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bankers' 
Acceptances</font>:&#160; either</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6be15def8d6b4081b26ceb572db99099" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
