cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the acceptance of 
Bankers' Acceptances (or the making of a BA Equivalent Advance) by such Lender 
and the delivery of the discounted proceeds of sale received by such Lender (or 
the amount of BA Equivalent Advance) (less the applicable fees payable by the 
Borrower to such Lender pursuant to Section 5.4) in respect thereof for the 
account of the Borrower through the Agent at the Agent's Account for Payments; 
or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3b9bede5f2104bbb98038f44bd5ff9bc" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the purchase of Bankers' 
Acceptances (or the making of a BA Equivalent Advance) by such Lender and the 
delivery of the Discount Proceeds in respect of such Bankers' Acceptances (or BA
Equivalent Advance) (less the applicable fees payable by the Borrower to such 
Lender pursuant to Section 5.4) for the account of the Borrower through the 
Agent at the Agent's Account for Payments; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6e60cf4dbd1348b78d4c79fe8d925935" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Letters 
of Credit</font>:&#160; the issuance of Letters of Credit by a Fronting Lender 
on behalf of the Lenders up to the amount of its Fronted LC Commitment; provided
that the Equivalent Amount in U.S. Dollars of all Letters of Credit outstanding 
hereunder shall not, at the time of the issuance of any such Letter of Credit 
and after giving effect to the issuance thereof, exceed 
U.S.&#160;$200,000,000.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">43</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt">The credit facility 
established above (the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Credit Facility</font>") is a revolving
credit facility and the Borrower may increase or decrease Borrowings from each 
such Lender by obtaining Loans, Bankers' Acceptances and BA Equivalent Advances,
as applicable, and Letters of Credit, as applicable, and by making repayments in
respect thereof.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt">A Lender shall not have
any obligation to make any Accommodations available at any time if, after giving
effect thereto, the Equivalent Amount in U.S. Dollars of Borrowings from such 
Lender would exceed the Commitment of such Lender.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc58a0ece91fb491f814f2f0cd5d4ca69" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.3</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Extension of Maturity Date</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z9017d3ad2f314394af5ae529e4ab76d3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Request 
for Extension</font>:&#160; The Borrower may, from time to time, request an 
extension from each Lender (each, a "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Requested Lender</font>") of
the then current Maturity Date of each such Requested Lender (each, a "<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Subject Maturity Date</font>") by sending to the Agent at the 
Agent's Branch of Account a Request for Extension once in each Fiscal Year and 
the Agent shall forthwith notify the Requested Lenders of such request.&#160; 
Any such request must provide that the requested Maturity Date of all Requested 
Lenders be the same and that the requested Maturity Date not exceed five years 
from the date of any such extension request.&#160; Each Requested Lender shall 
advise the Agent as to whether it agrees with such request within thirty (30) 
days of being so notified, provided that in the event such Requested Lender does
not so advise the Agent within such thirty (30) day period, such Requested 
Lender shall be deemed to have advised the Agent that it does not agree with 
such request.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z10d54911fe21478689b294e8827b16fa" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Payment 
or Replacement by Borrower</font>:&#160; Subject to Section&#160;3.3(a), if a 
Requested Lender does not agree to extend the Subject Maturity Date (such 
Requested Lender being a "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Non-Extending Lender</font>" and any 
Requested Lender agreeing to extend the Subject Maturity Date being an "<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Extending</font>&#160;<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lender</font>"), the 
Borrower may, provided that it treats each Non-Extending Lender rateably:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zda0af3bc7def4578b813a153956cd3ae" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">so long as there exists 
no Default or Event of Default and subject to Section&#160;11.5, repay all 
Borrowings and other amounts owing hereunder to all Non-Extending Lenders, on or
prior to the Maturity Date of such Non-Extending&#160; Lenders and upon such 
payment each Non-Extending Lender shall cease to be a Lender hereunder and each 
such Non-Extending Lender's Commitment shall be terminated and the Total 
Commitment reduced accordingly; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z202f448d26f64b9496ce28276b801076" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">arrange for a replacement
lender or lenders (which may be one or more of the Lenders) to replace all Non-
Extending Lenders' Borrowings and Commitments provided that any such replacement
lender or lenders (if it is not a Lender) shall have been approved by the Agent 
and each Fronting Lender (each such approval not to be unreasonably withheld) 
and shall be novated into the Loan Documents in the place and stead of the Non-
Extending Lenders by execution of all necessary documentation on or prior to the
Maturity Date of such Non-Extending Lenders and in respect of which the Lenders 
shall do all things and make all such adjustments as are reasonably necessary to
give effect to any such replacement.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf1b18d8764ac43699c28e17d4641fbe1" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Non-
Extension</font>:&#160; The Subject Maturity Date shall not be extended in 
accordance with Section&#160;3.3(a) if Requested Lenders holding more than 
thirty-three and one third percent (33-1/3%) of the aggregate of the Commitments
of all Requested Lenders do not agree or are deemed not to agree to extend the 
Subject Maturity Date pursuant to the Request for Extension.&#160; In any such 
case, the Subject Maturity Date of each Requested Lender shall not be extended, 
provided, however, the Borrower shall be entitled to request further extensions 
of the Maturity Date as provided for in Section&#160;3.3(a).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">44</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z669b3cb7efed413a84262a1265624e0a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Extension
for all Requested Lenders</font>:&#160; If all Requested Lenders agree to extend
the Subject Maturity Date pursuant to a Request for Extension, then the Subject 
Maturity Date of each Requested Lender shall be extended to the date agreed by 
each such Requested Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc46fbcead12a4b0ba7636edda47bc18f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Partial 
Extension</font>:&#160; If, with respect to any Request for Extension, the 
provisions of Section&#160;3.3(c) or 3.3(d) are not applicable and there are 
Non-Extending Lenders under Section&#160;3.3(b), then:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb595fdde4a2c48be97d29c58702e4fd4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Subject Maturity Date
for all Extending Lenders shall be extended to the date agreed to by each such 
Requested Lender; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd77477e9e7884534afa10809a7f403bb" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Subject Maturity Date
for each such Non-Extending Lender shall not be extended, provided, however, the
Borrower shall be entitled to request further extensions of the Maturity Date 
from such Non-Extending Lenders as provided for in Section&#160;3.3(a).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z47f3881cb6504367bcfe9f923385e9c7" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(f)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Independent Decision</font>:&#160; The Borrower understands that 
consideration of any Request for Extension constitutes an independent credit 
decision which each Requested Lender retains the absolute and unfettered 
discretion to make and that no commitment in this regard is hereby given by any 
Requested Lender and that any extension of the Subject Maturity Date may be on 
such terms and conditions in addition to those set out herein as the Lenders may
stipulate.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf2ede7ed3ed54cf98b882985ee3cfeea" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(g)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Default 
or Event of Default</font>:&#160; If a Default or an Event of Default exists at 
the time the Borrower makes a Request for Extension or on the Subject Maturity 
Date, the Subject Maturity Date of the Extending Lenders will not be
extended.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z78edae459b4c48faa28e936780446830" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.4</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Increase of Total Commitment</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower may at any
time and from time to time add additional financial institutions hereunder as 
Lenders or, with the consent of the applicable Lender, increase the Commitment 
of such Lender and thereby increase the Total Commitment, provided that at the 
time of any such addition:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z1d2cf3e962514529b6ef83c1e0395c0f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">no Default or Event of 
Default has occurred and is continuing;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2ce60b40b8cf4db3beb34eea5cf643ad" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Total Commitment as 
so increased (after taking into account any prior reductions of the Total 
Commitment pursuant to Section&#160;3.3(b)(i) or Section&#160;11.7) does not 
exceed U.S.&#160;$800,000,000;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd2f7bf3ce012422da2d872549d81092a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Agent and each 
Fronting Lender has consented to such financial institution becoming a Lender, 
if it is not already a Lender, each such consent not to be unreasonably 
withheld;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z52ebe3ed39ca46c0bb53cd30b9784be5" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">concurrently with the 
addition of a financial institution as an additional Lender or the increase of a
Lender's Commitment, such financial institution or Lender, as the case may be, 
shall purchase from each Lender such portion of the Borrowings of each such 
Lender as is necessary to ensure that all Borrowings of all Lenders and 
including therein such additional financial institution, are in accordance with 
the Lender's Proportion of all such Lenders (including the new financial 
institution) and such financial institution shall execute such documentation as 
is required by the Agent, acting reasonably, to novate such financial 
institution as a Lender hereunder; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z43f082dcca3b445fb390b1bb3888cf70" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Borrower has provided
to the Agent a certified copy of a directors' resolution of the Borrower 
authorizing any such increase in the Total Commitment (which may be the original
directors' resolution authorizing this Credit Facility) together with a legal 
opinion with respect&#160; thereto in substantially the same form as the 
opinions delivered in connection with the closing of this Agreement.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">45</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="ze9d31f7fd89f46e5a8f667f3d6cb871b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.5</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Purpose</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Borrowings under the 
Credit Facility shall be used by the Borrower for general corporate purposes of 
the Loan Parties.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zbbf9d46047c5459d9c68a1027bfd1293" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.6</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Takeover Notification</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">In the event the 
Borrower wishes to utilize Accommodations to, or to provide funds to any 
Subsidiary to, offer to acquire (which shall include an offer to purchase 
securities, solicitation of an offer to sell securities, an acceptance of an 
offer to sell securities, whether or not the offer to sell was solicited, or any
combination of the foregoing) outstanding securities of any Person (other than a
private issuer as defined under the <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Securities Act</font>
(Alberta) or a corporation whose shares are directly or indirectly held by one 
Person) (the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Target</font>") where, as of the date of the 
offer to acquire, the securities that are subject to the offer to acquire, 
together with the securities of such Person that are beneficially owned, or over
which control or direction is exercised, by the Borrower and its Subsidiaries 
and any Person acting jointly or in concert with any thereof on the date that 
the offer to acquire is made, constitute in the aggregate ten percent (10%) or 
more of all of the outstanding securities of that class of securities of the 
relevant Person (a "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Takeover</font>"), then either:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zecb1158d74304b99a75d66d39d0400a2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Agreement
of the Target Entity</font>:&#160; the Borrower shall provide to the Agent 
evidence satisfactory to the Agent of the agreement of the board of directors or
like body of the Target approving the Takeover; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="ze9e73cb7e2704db9a43763acc7d3777e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consent 
from Lenders</font>:&#160; the following steps shall be followed:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5f8cd13d7d654ce490d78cef12bc9f02" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">at least five (5) 
Business Days prior to the delivery of any notice to the Agent pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.7 requesting Accommodations intended to be utilized for such 
Takeover, a senior officer of the Borrower shall advise the Agent who shall 
promptly ensure that a Vice President of each Lender (or such other senior
officer of such Lender as may be designated by such Lender from time to time) is
advised of the particulars of such Takeover in sufficient detail to enable such 
Lender to determine whether it will consent to Accommodations from such Lender 
being utilized by the Borrower for such Takeover (which consent may be withheld 
in its sole and unfettered discretion);</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2b199cb73df1457a9e27b7f52bdbec19" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">within three (3) Business
Days of being so advised, each Lender shall notify the Agent as to whether it 
will provide its consent, provided that in the event such Lender does not so 
notify the Agent within such three (3) Business Day period, such Lender shall be
deemed to have notified the Agent that it does not provide its consent; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdc89d80259494b428bfa193dafff323c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the Agent shall promptly notify the senior officer of the Borrower of such 
Lender's decision;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">and in the event that 
any Lender does not provide its consent or is deemed to have not provided its 
consent, then upon the Agent so notifying the Borrower, such Lender shall have 
no obligation to provide Accommodations for such Takeover notwithstanding any 
other provision of this Agreement to the contrary; provided, however, that each 
other Lender, as applicable (a "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consenting</font>&#160;<font
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Lender</font>") which has provided its consent shall have an 
obligation, up to the amount of its Commitment, to provide Accommodations for 
such Takeover, and Accommodations for such Takeover shall be provided by each 
Consenting Lender in accordance with the ratio that its Lender's Proportion
bears to the aggregate of the Lender's Proportions of all the Consenting 
Lenders.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">46</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6a42868459ab4350bc3db9ca4e4b6ff7" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Adjustment</font>:&#160; If Accommodations are utilized for the purposes 
of a Takeover (a "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Takeover Loan</font>") and there are Lenders 
other than Consenting Lenders (the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Non-Consenting 
Lenders</font>"), the Lender's Proportion of each Consenting Lender shall be 
temporarily adjusted in accordance with Section&#160;3.13 and subsequent 
Accommodations shall be funded firstly by Non-Consenting Lenders and subsequent 
repayments shall be applied firstly to Consenting Lenders, in each case, until 
such time as the Lender's Proportion of each Consenting Lender and Non-
Consenting Lender is equal to such Lender's Proportion in effect immediately 
prior to the advance of the Takeover Loan.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z968363a10ebb4f6cb054cf97e328d957" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.7</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Borrowings</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Subject to the 
provisions of this Agreement, the Borrower may borrow, repay and reborrow by way
of Accommodations from each Lender pursuant to the Credit Facility up to the 
amount of such Lender's Commitment by:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z9d4bd54ac3ff489ebd567ada6af428d1" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Prime 
Loans:</font>&#160; borrowing Prime Loans from the Lenders, in minimum aggregate
amounts of Cdn.&#160;$1,000,000 and in integral multiples of 
Cdn.&#160;$1,000,000 thereafter, upon at least one (1) Business Day prior 
written notice;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdba18e18b2404fc98b17280a1a8c02ef" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">U.S. Base
Rate Loans:</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">&#160; </font>borrowing U.S. Base Rate Loans 
from the<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">&#160;</font>Lenders in minimum aggregate amounts of 
U.S.&#160;$1,000,000<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>and in integral multiples 
of U.S.&#160;$1,000,000 thereafter, upon at least one (1) Business Day prior 
written notice;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z142f645e105b4ab19f21bd8ae0e8d877" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bankers' 
Acceptances:</font>&#160; issuing Bankers' Acceptances to be accepted by the 
Lenders in minimum aggregate amounts of Cdn.&#160;$1,000,000 and in integral
multiples of Cdn.&#160;$1,000,000 thereafter, upon at least two 
(2)&#160;Business Days' prior written notice;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z77e768e45cb64a898bfe882cc650aaf1" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Libor 
Loans:</font>&#160; borrowing Libor Loans from the Lenders in minimum aggregate 
amounts of U.S.&#160;$1,000,000 and in integral multiples of 
U.S.&#160;$1,000,000 thereafter, upon at least three (3) Business Days' prior 
written notice; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zcf50493cf0984c8c83c3991a044e3171" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Letters 
of Credit</font>:&#160; by way of the issuance by the Fronting Lender of Letters
of Credit in Canadian Dollars or U.S. Dollars upon at least three (3) Business 
Days' prior written notice;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">each such notice to be given to the Agent 
at or prior to noon (Toronto time) on the last day on which such notice can be 
given pursuant to this Section&#160;3.7 and to be substantially in the form of 
Schedule B.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd897d1cc652c42e48026d635803fb3c0" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.8</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Selection of Libor Interest Periods</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">If the Borrower elects 
to borrow by way of a Libor Loan pursuant to Section&#160;3.7, elects to convert
a Borrowing into a Libor Loan pursuant to Section&#160;3.14 or elects to 
Rollover a Libor Loan pursuant to Section&#160;3.15, the Borrower shall, prior 
to the beginning of the Libor Interest Period applicable to such Libor Loan, in 
accordance with the same period of notice required for the initial drawdown of a
Libor Loan as set forth in Section&#160;3.7, select and notify the Agent by 
delivery of a Borrowing Notice, Conversion Notice or Rollover Notice, as the 
case may be, of the Libor Interest Period (which shall begin and end on a 
Business Day) applicable to such Libor Loan.&#160; If the Borrower fails to give
to the Agent a notice as aforesaid prior to the date of maturity of a Libor Loan
in accordance with the same period of notice required for the original 
Borrowing, then the amount of such Libor Loan shall be converted on its maturity
to a U.S. Base Rate Loan from the Lender pursuant to Section&#160;3.14.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">47</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3c9d683d0fcb4aa6acb04010e1a3fadf" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.9</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Conditions Applicable to Bankers' Acceptances</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zfd543c174e5a47e9a7a855024154e538" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT:
bold">Acceptance of Bankers' Acceptances:</font> Subject to the terms and 
conditions of this Agreement, each Lender hereby agrees to accept its Lender's 
Proportion of Bankers' Acceptances issued by the Borrower pursuant to 
Sections&#160;3.7, 3.14 and 3.15.&#160; Each such Lender shall purchase such 
Bankers' Acceptances at the applicable Discount Rate unless the Borrower elects,
pursuant to Section&#160;3.9(i), to market all Bankers' Acceptances accepted by 
such Lenders on its own. Any Lender may at any time and from time to time hold, 
sell, rediscount or otherwise dispose of any or all Bankers' Acceptances 
purchased by it.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z039e6c4e9db84bfa8a8bef813b440716" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Delivery 
of Notice:</font>&#160; If the Borrower has elected to market Bankers' 
Acceptances on its own, the Borrower shall, at or prior to 11 a.m. (Toronto 
time) on the Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover Date relating to any 
Bankers' Acceptances to be issued hereunder, deliver to the Agent at the Agent's
Branch of Account written notice with respect to such Bankers' Acceptances in 
the form of Schedule B hereto.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Payment 
to Borrower:</font> On the Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover Date 
relating to any issue of Bankers' Acceptances:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zfe8ccd523ded441fb01ee6e7c34a40ea" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">on any Drawdown Date, 
each Lender shall:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zad74e1434f60456685117a1140f6a8ba" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

Bankers' Acceptances received by it (less any fees payable to such Lender in 
respect thereof pursuant to Section&#160;5.4), for the account of the Borrower 
through the Agent at the Agent's Account for Payments; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">if subsection&#160;
(A)&#160;above does not apply, deliver the Discount Proceeds of Bankers' 
Acceptances purchased by it (less any fees payable to such Lender in respect 
thereof pursuant to Section&#160;5.4) for the account of the Borrower through 
the Agent at the Agent's Account for Payments;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc9dc5d8e93934039af22c3ac2c70cb8d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">on any Rollover Date 
relating to any Rollover of Bankers' Acceptances, the Borrower shall be liable 
to each Lender for the principal amount of maturing Bankers' Acceptances 
accepted by such Lender; in order to satisfy the continuing liability of the 
Borrower to each such Lender for the principal amount of the maturing Bankers' 
Acceptances, each such Lender shall receive and retain for its own account the
discounted proceeds of sale of such new Bankers' Acceptances or the Discount 
Proceeds from the purchase by such Lender of such Bankers' Acceptances, as 
applicable, and the Borrower shall on the maturity date of the maturing Bankers'
Acceptances pay to each such Lender, through the Agent at the Agent's Account 
for Payments, an amount equal to the difference between the principal amount of 
the maturing Bankers' Acceptances and the discounted proceeds of sale or the 
Discount Proceeds, as applicable, from the new Bankers' Acceptances together 
with the fee to which each such Lender is entitled pursuant to Section&#160;5.4;
and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>

VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">on any Conversion Date 
relating to Bankers' Acceptances:</td>
</tr>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5fc2c9a2031545cfa0469880695bbac2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(A)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">in the case of a 
Conversion from a Loan into a Bankers' Acceptance in the same currency as the 
Loan, in order to satisfy the continuing liability of the Borrower to each 
Lender for the amount of the converted Borrowing, each such Lender shall receive
for its own account the discounted proceeds of sale of the Bankers' Acceptances 
or the Discount Proceeds from the purchase by such Lender of such Bankers' 
Acceptances, as applicable, and the Borrower shall on the Conversion Date pay to
each such Lender, through the Agent at the Agent's Account for Payments, the 
difference between the principal amount of the converted Borrowing and the 
discounted proceeds of sale or the Discount Proceeds, as applicable, from such 
Bankers' Acceptances together with the fee to which each such Lender is entitled
to pursuant to Section&#160;5.4;</td>
</tr>
</table>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6b7f3c91f66843b783693a3f86bad724" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(B)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">in the case of a 
Conversion from a Loan or Bankers' Acceptance in one currency into a Loan or 
Bankers' Acceptance in another currency, the Borrower shall be responsible for 
the payment to each Lender of the Loan or the principal amount of the Bankers' 
Acceptance being converted and may use the discounted proceeds of sale of such 
Bankers' Acceptances or the Discount Proceeds from the purchase by such Lender 
for such Bankers' Acceptances, as applicable, less any acceptance fees to which 
such Lender is entitled, to purchase Cdn. Dollars or U.S.&#160;Dollars, as 
applicable, in order to make such payment; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za352d131df8241748c7ba8e2960be529" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(C)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">in the case of a 
Conversion of Bankers' Acceptances to a Loan in the same currency, in order to 
satisfy the continuing liability of the Borrower to each Lender for an amount 
equal to the face amount of such Bankers' Acceptances, the Agent and each such 
Lender shall record the obligation of the Borrower to each such Lender as a 
Borrowing of the type into which the maturing Bankers' Acceptance has been 
converted.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7fb592802c7b4903b979db35509d3618" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Waiver of
Presentment and Other Conditions:</font>&#160; The Borrower waives presentment 
for payment and, except to the extent of the gross negligence or wilful 
misconduct of a Lender referred to in Section&#160;3.9(h), any other defence to 
payment of any amounts due to a Lender in respect of a Bankers' Acceptance 
accepted and, if applicable, purchased by it pursuant to this Agreement which 
might exist solely by reason of such Bankers' Acceptance being held, at the 
maturity thereof, by such Lender in its own right and the Borrower agrees not to
claim any days of grace if such Lender as holder sues the Borrower on the 
Bankers' Acceptance for payment of the amount payable by the Borrower 
thereunder.&#160; On the specified maturity date of a Bankers' Acceptance, or 
such earlier date as may be required or permitted pursuant to the provisions of 
this Agreement, the Borrower shall, subject to Section&#160;3.9(g), pay the 
Agent on behalf of the Lender that has accepted such Bankers' Acceptance, the 
full face amount of such Bankers' Acceptance either through payment to the Agent
or conversion of such Bankers' Acceptance into a Prime Loan pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.14, and shall make such additional payments, if any, as are 
required pursuant to Section&#160;3.9(c).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc09e787c7f6543f1b8c2d5f8a8c887b3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

Each Bankers' Acceptance</font>:&#160; Each Bankers' Acceptance shall:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z9289d5b0b0994740a2e9db9f63f7f498" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">have a maturity date 
which shall be on a Business Day;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z31a757d63b544319a937c2f5e61f0561" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">have a Standard Term 
(excluding days of grace) or, subject to availability and with the consent of 
each Lender, have a term which is not a Standard Term but which does not exceed 
six (6) months (excluding days of grace);</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5172800a0e3746b6ae0669fb9e2ad022" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">be denominated in whole 
multiples of&#160;$100,000;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z649ca43ad1e54e9eac9204f51076b943" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">have a term which does 
not extend beyond the Maturity Date; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
