</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">49</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8dc279e53afd442d91ac6bd9e0db23ff" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(v)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>be in the standard form of each Lender.</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">It is the intention of 
the parties that, pursuant to the <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">Depository Bills and Notes 
Act</font> ("<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">DBNA</font>"), all Bankers' Acceptances 
accepted by the Lenders under this Agreement shall be issued in the form of a 
"depository bill" (as defined in the DBNA), deposited with, and made payable to 
a "clearing house" (as defined in the DBNA) including, without limitation, The 
Canadian Depository for Securities Limited or its nominee, CDS &amp; Co. ("<font
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">CDS</font>").&#160; The Agent and the Lenders shall, <font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
STYLE: italic">inter alia</font>, effect the following and, subject to the 
approval of the Borrower, establish and notify the Borrower and the Lenders of 
any additional procedures, consistent with the terms of this Agreement and the 
requirements of the DBNA, as are reasonably necessary to accomplish such 
intention including:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0047203dbf0a4960895d3d9d39486e6f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(A)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the instruments or drafts
held by the Agent for the purposes of effecting Bankers' Acceptances will 
include a notation to the effect that they are issued pursuant to the DBNA;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za3e6606aba4348a6be5e4776a0245387" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(B)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">any reference to 
authentication of the Bankers' Acceptance will be removed; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z42ed21d339e74c8e93cee7f2f5a604d5" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(C)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">any reference to "bearer"
will be removed.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zfe8cf796b7294b0f91984923709d01c4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(f)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Power of 
Attorney &#8209; Bankers' Acceptances:</font>&#160; As a condition precedent to 
each Lender's obligation to accept and, if applicable, purchase Bankers' 
Acceptances hereunder and, subject to the DBNA compliance requirements set forth
in Section&#160;3.9(e), the Borrower agrees to the Power of Attorney 
Terms&#160;&#8209; Bankers' Acceptances set out in Schedule I and hereby grants 
to each Lender a power of attorney on the terms set out in Schedule I, provided 
that if the Borrower revokes such power of attorney, a Lender shall not be 
obliged to accept and purchase Bankers' Acceptances (and a Non-Acceptance Lender
shall not be obligated to provide BA Equivalent Advances) unless the Borrower, 
the Agent and all of the Lenders (other than any Non-Acceptance Lenders) have 
agreed on amendments to this Agreement which the Lenders may require to again 
accept and, if applicable,&#160; purchase Bankers' Acceptances.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3d74d7829125413c83b9223e03b2c340" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(g)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Failure 
to Give Notice of Repayment</font>:&#160; If the Borrower fails to give notice 
to the Agent of the method of repayment of a Bankers' Acceptance prior to the 
date of maturity of such Bankers' Acceptance in accordance with the same period
of notice required for the original acceptance of such Bankers' Acceptance as 
set forth in Section&#160;3.7, the face amount of such Bankers' Acceptance shall
be converted on its maturity to a Prime Loan from the Lender pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.14.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4e5a06bbaecd4707a3232a2d769bd461" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(h)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Unlawful 
Issue or Use:</font>&#160; The Borrower shall pay on demand to the Agent on 
behalf of each Lender the face amount of any bankers' acceptance form presented 
to such Lender for payment and paid by such Lender that has been unlawfully 
issued or used or put into circulation fraudulently or without authority, and 
shall indemnify such Lender against any loss, cost, damage, expense or claim 
regardless of by whomsoever made that such Lender may suffer or incur by reason 
of any fraudulent, unauthorized or unlawful issue or use of any such bankers' 
acceptance form, other than as is caused by the gross negligence or wilful act 
or omission of such Lender or any of its officers, employees, agents or 
representatives failing to use the same standard of care in the custody of such 
bankers' acceptance forms as it uses in the custody of its own property of a 
similar nature.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z47d547cd88bc40f6b9c51001b6e8b50c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Marketing
of Bankers' Acceptances:</font>&#160; The Borrower shall be entitled to elect to
market all Bankers' Acceptances accepted by the Lenders and forming a part of 
the same issue of Bankers' Acceptances on any Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or 
Rollover Date by advising the Lenders of such election in any Borrowing Notice, 
Conversion Notice or Rollover Notice.&#160; If the Borrower fails to advise the 
Lenders of any such election in any such notice, it shall be deemed to have 
required to have such Lenders purchase such Bankers' Acceptances.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">50</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2e06e7118e0447d5af19fd243bf49dc8" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(j)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">BA Equivalent Advances</font>:&#160; Notwithstanding 
Section&#160;3.7(c), the foregoing provisions of this Section&#160;3.9, and any 
other provision hereof to the contrary, a Non-Acceptance Lender shall, in lieu 
of accepting and, if applicable, purchasing Bankers' Acceptances, make a BA 
Equivalent Advance. The amount of each BA Equivalent Advance shall be equal to 
the Discount Proceeds which would be realized from a hypothetical sale of those 
Bankers' Acceptances which, but for this Section&#160;3.9(j), such Lender would 
otherwise be required to accept as part of such a Borrowing by way of Bankers' 
Acceptances. To determine the amount of such Discount Proceeds, the hypothetical
sale shall be deemed to take place at the Discount Rate.&#160; Any BA Equivalent
Advance shall be made on the relevant Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover
Date, as the case may be, and shall remain outstanding for the term of the 
Bankers' Acceptances issued concurrently therewith. Concurrently with the making
of a BA Equivalent Advance, a Non-Acceptance Lender shall be entitled to deduct 
therefrom an amount equal to the BA Acceptance Fee which, but for this 
Section&#160;3.9(j), such Lender would otherwise be entitled to receive as part 
of such issue of Bankers' Acceptances.&#160; The BA Equivalent Advance shall 
accrue interest at a rate per annum equal to the Discount Rate for such Bankers'
Acceptance for the term of such BA Equivalent Advance. Upon the maturity date 
for such Bankers' Acceptances, the Borrower shall pay to each Non-Acceptance 
Lender, in satisfaction of the BA Equivalent Advance and interest accrued 
thereon, an amount equal to the face amount of the Bankers' Acceptance which, 
but for this Section&#160;3.9(j), such Lender would otherwise have been required
to accept as part of such Borrowing by way of Bankers' Acceptance, failing which
such amount shall be converted to a Prime Loan.</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">All BA Equivalent 
Advances made by a Non-Acceptance Lender shall, if requested by such Lender, be 
evidenced by promissory notes of the Borrower in form and substance satisfactory
to such Lender, acting reasonably.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">All references herein
to "Bankers' Acceptances" shall, unless otherwise expressly provided herein or 
unless the context otherwise requires, be deemed to include BA Equivalent 
Advances made by a Non-Acceptance Lender as part of a Borrowing by way of 
Bankers' Acceptances.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">As a condition 
precedent to each Non-Acceptance Lender's obligation to make a BA Equivalent 
Advance hereunder, the Borrower agrees to the Power of Attorney Terms &#8211; BA
Equivalent Advances set out in Schedule J and hereby grants to each Non-
Acceptance Lender a power of attorney on the terms set out in Schedule J, 
provided that if the Borrower revokes such power of attorney, it shall not be 
entitled to obtain BA Equivalent Advances (or issue Bankers' Acceptances) unless
the Borrower, the Agent and all of the Non-Acceptance Lenders have agreed on 
amendments to this Agreement which would again allow the Borrower to obtain BA 
Equivalent Advances.</div>
</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za2bdd91b38d842bcb177b5b00cd3cf9d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.10</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Agent's Duties Regarding Bankers' Acceptances</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za828e7bcdfea4ddea2842cf58bc95720" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Advice to
the Lenders</font>:&#160; The Agent, promptly following receipt of a Borrowing 
Notice for an Accommodation by way of Bankers' Acceptances, of a Conversion 
Notice for Conversion of a Borrowing to a Bankers' Acceptance or of a Rollover 
Notice for a Rollover of a Bankers' Acceptance, shall:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">51</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zee5960465bc94946992c51a0d67ecdd6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">advise each Lender of the
face amount of each Bankers' Acceptance to be purchased by it and the term 
thereof which term shall be identical for all Lenders.&#160; By no later than 
10:30 a.m. (Toronto time), on each Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover 
Date on which the Lenders are required to purchase Bankers' Acceptances 
hereunder, each Reference Lender shall notify the Agent of the applicable rate 
(as contemplated in the definition of Discount Rate) to be used by the Agent in 
the calculation of the Discount Rate in respect of the issuance and purchase of 
such Bankers' Acceptances by the Lenders, as applicable; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z114b73b872024026b4af3bcc2c94a2a4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">if the Borrower has 
elected to market Bankers' Acceptances on its own, advise the Borrower of the 
allocation of Bankers' Acceptances and, if applicable, BA Equivalent Advances to
each Lender such that the aggregate amount of Bankers' Acceptances required to 
be accepted or BA Equivalent Advances required to be made by such Lender 
hereunder is in a whole multiple of Cdn.&#160;$100,000.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z9c9a1d7542f54db993470d621c3801fd" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bankers'
Acceptances Being Purchased:</font>&#160; If the Lenders are required to 
purchase Bankers' Acceptances accepted by it pursuant to Section&#160;3.9(a), 
then at or prior to 11 a.m. (Toronto time) on the Drawdown Date, Conversion Date
or Rollover Date relating to all Bankers' Acceptances to be purchased by the 
Lenders on such date, the Agent shall provide written advice to the Borrower and
each Lender confirming the particulars with respect to such Bankers' Acceptances
and related BA Equivalent Advances.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4da31870fc214d90abcd78c6cb98a002" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bankers' 
Acceptances Not Being Purchased:</font>&#160; If the Borrower has elected to 
market Bankers' Acceptances on its own, the Agent, promptly following receipt of
a Borrowing Notice by way of Bankers' Acceptance in the form of Schedule E, 
shall provide written advice to each applicable Lender of the amount of each 
issue of Bankers' Acceptances to be accepted by it or BA Equivalent Advance to 
be made by it, the face amount of each Bankers' Acceptance, the discounted 
proceeds of sale deliverable in respect thereof or the amount of the BA 
Equivalent Advance, the person to whom the Bankers' Acceptances have been sold 
and from whom the discounted proceeds of sale in respect thereof should be 
received, and the term thereof, which term shall be identical for all such 
Lenders.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z408461baa85b43948e17fe9e098f107c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Completion of Bankers' Acceptance When Being Purchased:</font>&#160; Upon 
receipt of the written advice pursuant to Section&#160;3.10(b), each Lender 
shall complete and sign Bankers' Acceptances on behalf of the Borrower in 
accordance with the Power of Attorney Terms and the particulars advised by the 
Agent.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z72d8655937a441798c049bcb0de30bdd" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%"
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Completion of Bankers' Acceptance When Not Being Purchased:</font>&#160; 
Upon receipt of the written advice pursuant to Section&#160;3.10(c), each 
applicable Lender is thereupon authorized to complete Bankers' Acceptances on 
behalf of the Borrower in accordance with the Power of Attorney Terms and the 
particulars advised by the Agent.&#160; Such Lenders shall then deliver such 
Bankers' Acceptances to the person designated to receive such Bankers' 
Acceptances upon receipt by such Lender of the discounted proceeds of sale 
payable in respect thereof, in accordance with the particulars so advised by the
Agent.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb5cf6c8b49044a55ba7b28fa06ab4bfb" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.11</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Letters of Credit</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7afd6665247c41dd94c6ac90ec7d1b00" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Aggregate
Amount:</font>&#160; The aggregate face amount of Letters of Credit issued and 
outstanding under the Credit Facility at any one time shall not exceed 
U.S.&#160;$200,000,000 or the Equivalent Amount in Cdn. Dollars.&#160; The 
aggregate face amount of Fronted Letters of Credit (determined in U.S. Dollars 
with the face amount of any Letter of Credit issued in Cdn. Dollars being 
converted to the Equivalent Amount thereof in U.S. Dollars) issued by a Fronting
Lender shall not exceed its Fronted LC Commitment.&#160; Any Letter of Credit 
issued under the Credit Facility shall be issued by a Fronting Lender (to the 
extent it has a Fronted LC Commitment for the type of Letter of Credit being 
issued) on behalf of the Lenders, and the Borrower shall have the right to 
select which Fronting Lender shall issue any particular Letter of Credit.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">52</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zba3275211c4646508acde47a91641606" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Term</font>:&#160; No Letter of Credit shall be issued for which any 
Lender has liability where the expiry date of any such requested Letter of 
Credit extends past the Maturity Date of such Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7d6d70db00fa4940a6dd545d8aeb8274" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Issuance:&#160; </font>Subject to the terms and conditions hereof, each 
Fronting Lender, on behalf of the Lenders and in reliance on the agreements of 
the Lenders set forth in Section&#160;3.11(d), agrees to issue Letters of Credit
for the account of the Borrower in Canadian Dollars or U.S. Dollars from time to
time on any Business Day.&#160; The Borrower and Lenders acknowledge that it may
be necessary when issuing Letters of Credit for a correspondent bank or an 
affiliate of a Fronting Lender to issue such Letters of Credit and agree that, 
in any such circumstance, such Fronting Lender (and not the correspondent bank 
or the affiliate) shall continue to be entitled to all the rights and remedies 
hereunder of a Fronting Lender and continue to be liable for all obligations of 
a Fronting Lender, in each case in respect of any such Letter of Credit 
notwithstanding it did not issue such Letter of Credit.&#160; Letters of Credit 
issued by a Fronting Lender hereunder shall be in a form satisfactory to such 
Fronting Lender acting reasonably and in accordance with its usual and customary
practices and shall, in all cases with respect to letters of credit, be issued 
subject to Uniform Customs &amp; Practice for Documentary Credits, International
Chamber of Commerce, Publication No.&#160;600 or International Standby Practices
(ISP98), International Chamber of Commerce, Publication No. 590, as applicable, 
and shall, in all cases with respect to letters of guarantee, be issued subject 
to Uniform Customs&#160;&amp; Practice of Demand Guarantees, International 
Chamber of Commerce, Publication No.&#160;758.&#160; A Letter of Credit shall
not be issued by a Fronting Lender if any Lender would be prohibited, if it were
issuing such Letter of Credit, from issuing such Letter of Credit by any 
applicable law, regulation, treaty, official directive or regulatory requirement
now or hereafter in effect (whether or not having the force of law).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdde25ba5d693434f9f3d07ed65285d1a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Letter of
Credit Participations:&#160; </font>Each Fronting Lender irrevocably grants, and
in order to induce such Fronting Lender to issue its Letters of Credit 
hereunder, each Lender irrevocably accepts and hereby purchases from such 
Fronting Lender on the terms and conditions hereinafter stated, for its own 
account and risk, an undivided interest equal to such Lender's Proportion in 
such Fronting Lender's obligations and rights under each Letter of Credit issued
by it hereunder and the amount of each draft paid by such Fronting Lender 
thereunder.&#160; Each Lender unconditionally and irrevocably agrees with each 
Fronting Lender that, on or before the close of business of such Fronting Lender
on each day on which a draft is paid under a Letter of Credit for which such 
Fronting Lender is not reimbursed in full by the Borrower in accordance with the
terms of this Agreement, including, without limitation, pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.11(j) (a "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Participation Date</font>"), such 
Lender will pay to the Agent for the account of such Fronting Lender at the 
Agent's Branch of Account such Lender's Proportion of any such unpaid 
amount.&#160; Such Fronting Lender shall notify the Agent who shall notify each 
Lender of the occurrence of a Participation Date, and the amount payable by it 
to the Agent based on such Lender's Lender's Proportion.&#160; If any Lender 
fails to make any such payment on or prior to the first Business Day after such 
Lender receives notice as provided above, then interest shall accrue on such 
Lender's obligation to make such payment during the period from such Business 
Day to the day such Lender makes such payment (or, if earlier, the date on which
the Borrower reimburses such Fronting Lender as required pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.11(j)), at the rate specified in Section&#160;5.6.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">53</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3d48640c47d9428f837d3370a7f9f5d2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Repayment
of Lenders:&#160; </font>Upon and only upon receipt by a Fronting Lender of 
funds from the Borrower in full or partial reimbursement of any draft paid under
a Letter of Credit issued by such Fronting Lender with respect to which any 
Lender has theretofore paid the Agent for the account of such Fronting Lender in
full for such Lender's participation pursuant to Section&#160;3.11(d) and in 
full or partial payment of interest, commissions or fees on such draft paid 
under such Letter of Credit, such Fronting Lender will pay to such Lender, in 
the same funds as those received by such Fronting Lender or net against any then
due obligation of such Lender under Section&#160;3.11(d) to make any payment to 
such Fronting Lender such Lender's Proportion of such funds.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0926d6c9f20843809517c13281b898e3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(f)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Role of 
each Fronting Lender:&#160; </font>Each Fronting Lender shall endeavour to 
ensure that any drawing under a Letter of Credit complies with the terms of such
Letter of Credit, and in doing so, and in connection with all of its other 
activities regarding a Letter of Credit, will exercise and give the same care 
and attention to each Letter of Credit issued by it as it gives to its other 
letters of credit and similar obligations.&#160; A Fronting Lender's sole 
liability to each Lender shall be to promptly return to the Agent for the 
account of the Lenders the Lender's Proportion of each Lender of any payments 
made to such Fronting Lender by the Borrower, as applicable, pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.11(d) where the Borrower has made a payment to such Fronting 
Lender pursuant to Section&#160;3.11(e).&#160; Each Lender agrees that, in 
paying any drawing under a Letter of Credit issued by a Fronting Lender, such 
Fronting Lender shall not have any responsibility to obtain any document (other 
than as required by such Letter of Credit) or to ascertain or inquire as to the 
validity or accuracy of any such document or the authority of any person 
delivering any such document.&#160; No Fronting Lender nor any of its 
representatives, officers, employees or agents shall be liable to any Lender 
for:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4332312dacf34be9801fc4de5871557f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">any action taken or 
omitted to be taken in connection herewith at the request or with the approval 
of the Majority Lenders;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6e240bf0f11c4dff937c034d5d6aa886" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">any action taken or 
omitted to be taken in connection with any Letter of Credit in the absence of 
gross negligence or wilful misconduct; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zebe7099c04d64a78ad7ba8dc5016aa98" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the execution, effectiveness, genuineness, validity, or enforceability of 
any Letter of Credit, or any other document contemplated thereby.</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">A Fronting Lender shall
not incur any liability by acting in reliance upon any notice, consent, 
certificate, statement or other writing (which may be a bank wire or similar 
writing) believed by it to be genuine or to be signed by the proper party or 
parties.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z771a0235a0164bc28f66006245517b16" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(g)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Lenders' 
Obligations Absolute:&#160; </font>Each Lender acknowledges that its obligations
to a Fronting Lender under this Section&#160;3.11, including the obligation to 
purchase and fund a participation in the obligations and rights of such Fronting
Lender under each Letter of Credit issued by it and any drafts paid by it for 
which it has not been fully reimbursed by the Borrower, are absolute and 
unconditional and shall not be affected by any circumstance whatsoever, 
including, without limitation:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zbe8c5890a8094e47bb788663218d86bb" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the occurrence and 
continuance of a Default or an Event of Default;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zff2ca301a85d4fcaba3d64e8335b10a3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">any failure or inability 
of any other Lender to purchase or fund such a participation hereunder; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="ze078cc64cddf492094575cef4e46896e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>any other failure by any other Lender to fulfil its obligations
hereunder.</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">54</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">Each payment by a 
Lender to a Fronting Lender for its own account shall be made without any 
offset, compensation, abatement, withholding or reduction whatsoever.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc6d4cb85220c4097ae3a87179d943b5d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(h)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Reinstatement and Survival:&#160; </font>Notwithstanding anything herein 
to the contrary, if a Fronting Lender is required at any time whether before or 
after the Maturity Date to make any payment under a Letter of Credit which was 
outstanding on or before the Maturity Date, each Lender shall pay over to the 
Agent in accordance with the provisions of this Section&#160;3.11 and for the 
account of such Fronting Lender the amount of such Lender's Lender's Proportion 
of such amount.&#160; If such Fronting Lender is required at any time (whether 
before or after the Maturity Date) to return to the Borrower or to a trustee, 
receiver, liquidator, custodian or other similar official any portion of the 
payments made by or on behalf of the Borrower to such Fronting Lender in 
reimbursement of the Borrower's obligations in respect of such Letter of Credit 
and interest thereon, each Lender shall, on demand of such Fronting Lender 
forthwith pay over to the Agent for the account of such Fronting Lender such 
Lender's Lender's Proportion of such amount, plus interest thereon from the day 
such demand is made to the day such amount is returned by such Lender to such 
Fronting Lender at the rate specified in Section&#160;5.6.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2c80b4801c504af780adbfdc455b175e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%"
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Procedure for Issuance 
and Renewal of Letters of Credit:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5f0bdcd9692044ec815c2f2b40660849" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">The Borrower may request 
that a Fronting Lender issue a Letter of Credit by delivering a notice to the 
Agent pursuant to Section&#160;3.7(e) and by delivering to such Fronting Lender 
at such Fronting Lender's Branch of Account a letter of credit application on 
such Fronting Lender's then customary form with appropriate changes to be 
consistent with the terms of this Agreement (as such form may be modified from 
time to time, the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman',
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Letter of Credit Application</font>"), 
completed to the satisfaction of such Fronting Lender, acting reasonably, 
together with the proposed form of such Letter of Credit (which shall comply 
with the applicable requirements set forth herein) and such other certificates, 
documents and other papers and information as such Fronting Lender may 
reasonably request; provided that in the event of a conflict between this 
Agreement and the Letter of Credit Application, this Agreement shall govern with
respect to such conflict.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7034e6f68acf46a08fa63d512db390df" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Within three (3) Business
Days following the date on which the Agent shall have received the notice 
pursuant to Section&#160;3.7(e) and a Fronting Lender shall have received the 
Letter of Credit Application including the proposed form of the Letter of Credit
and such additional certificates, documents and other papers and information as 
such Fronting Lender may have reasonably requested in satisfaction of all 
conditions to the issuance thereof, such Fronting Lender shall, provided the 
conditions precedent in Section&#160;8.2 have been complied with, issue such 
Letter of Credit.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z1dc3365a394946dbadf43e97b70485bb" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">The Borrower may request 
the extension or renewal of a Letter of Credit issued hereunder by giving 
written notice to the Agent at least two (2) Business Days prior to the then 
current expiry date of such Letter of Credit (provided that a Fronting Lender 
may accommodate notices on shorter notice in its sole discretion).&#160; If the 
conditions precedent in Section&#160;8.2 shall have been fulfilled as required 
thereby, the applicable Fronting Lender shall promptly issue such extension or 
renewal.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf9861d054b904589a43c3905f784648a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(j)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Reimbursement of a Fronting Lender:</font>&#160; In the event that any 
drawing shall be made under any Letter of Credit issued by a Fronting 
Lender:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdd3b0c678ad446edaa4ad7fe4dcc2853" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">such Fronting Lender 
shall promptly notify the Agent who shall promptly notify the Borrower of such 
payment and of the amount thereof;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4991b17868774d7186dd17cd57dc94e0" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Borrower shall pay to
such Fronting Lender the amount of any such drawing, failing which:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3c798d2d569f4561bd815776154acdf8" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the payment by such 
Fronting Lender of such drawing shall, if the Letter of Credit was in U.S. 
Dollars, constitute the making of a U.S. Base Rate Loan to the Borrower by each 
Lender according to its Lender's Proportion; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zef39b4ce6fcf4b5eabb2266e7c4667d5" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the payment by such 
Fronting Lender of such drawing shall, if the Letter of Credit was in Cdn. 
Dollars, constitute the making of a Prime Loan to the Borrower by each Lender 
according to its Lender's Proportion;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z49c7b0f902cf4bfc91610e216e32e0b6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">such Fronting Lender 
shall notify the Agent who shall notify each Lender by telecopier, by email or 
by telephone (confirmed by telecopier or by email) of such drawing; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za7f0d3cd5dd546799468b02f77050c83" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iv)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">immediately upon receipt 
of such notice, each Lender shall make its Lender's Proportion, in U.S. Dollars 
or Cdn. Dollars, as applicable, available to the Agent for the account of such 
Fronting Lender by wire transfer of immediately available funds to the Agent's 
Account for Payments for the account of such Fronting Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdf126c7c4ea448748ee8b590706ac663" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(k)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Designation and 
Termination of Fronting Lenders:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z501acca87e41478484f7234d2a89d2e0" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">The term of the Fronted 
LC Commitment of each Fronting Lender shall expire on June 3, 2019<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>and shall be subject to extension pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.11(k)(ii).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2ae6a3315d9841f0880d95096849af1f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
