VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">In connection with its 
response to any Request for Extension, a Fronting Lender shall either:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb788971f21304fe3a35a4913fe3fcb9d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(A)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">extend its Fronted LC 
Commitment for a further one (1) year period (or such other period as may be 
acceptable to such Fronting Lender in its sole discretion) at the same amount, a
lower amount or, with the consent of the Agent and the Borrower, a higher 
amount; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf03bbf27e2014d61849c04662fcfb4c9" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(B)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">terminate its Fronted LC 
Commitment effective on the expiration of its then current term.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z462f3de1520f4c8eb92bd2a8546fb05c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">The Borrower shall be 
entitled from time to time to:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z08b46b6da6ff429aaea68487be3d697a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(A)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">with the consent of the 
Agent, such consent not to be unreasonably withheld, designate a Lender as a 
Fronting Lender by providing a written notice to the Agent designating such 
Lender to be a Fronting Lender and which notice shall include the consent to 
such designation of such Lender; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd18be58dd20c48b2b7db34d5141e21c6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(B)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>subject to Section&#160;3.11(k)(iv), terminate a Fronting Lender as a 
Fronting Lender by providing a written notice of such termination to the Agent 
and such Fronting Lender;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">provided that at any 
one time there shall be no more than four (4) Fronting Lenders without the
consent of the Agent, which consent will not be unreasonably withheld.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdd76809e667e420c84b70d2fb7a33864" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iv)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">In the event that the 
Borrower exercises its right to terminate a Fronting Lender as a Fronting Lender
pursuant to Section&#160;3.11(k)(iii)(B) or a Fronting Lender elects to 
terminate its Fronted LC Commitment pursuant to Section&#160;3.11(k)(ii)(B) and 
there are Letters of Credit outstanding which were issued by such Fronting 
Lender, the Borrower shall use its reasonable commercial efforts to replace all 
such Letters of Credit with Letters of Credit issued by another Fronting Lender 
and, upon such replacement, such Fronting Lender shall cease to be a Fronting 
Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">56</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za5f3f5d3c0884b77bffbeba1e56afef7" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(v)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">In the event that a 
Fronting Lender has notified the Borrower in writing that, pursuant to 
Section&#160;11.3, it is no longer able to issue Letters of Credit on behalf of 
the Lenders, then such Fronting Lender shall not be required to issue additional
Letters of Credit except for any Letter of Credit which specifically replaces 
(which shall for the purposes hereof include the automatic renewal of a Letter 
of Credit which by its terms is automatically renewed unless the beneficiary 
thereof is advised otherwise) in whole or in part a Letter of Credit which has a
maturity date less than ninety (90) days after any such notice is given and 
provided that in any such case such issue would not contravene any applicable 
law, statutory regulation or treaty and if such Fronting Lender requests in 
writing, the Borrower shall use its reasonable commercial efforts to replace any
such Letters of Credit issued by such Fronting Lender as soon as practicable
with a Letter of Credit issued by another Fronting Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z78e9d1bf94e14352b83bfaf9b4e16ca1" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(vi)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Without limiting its 
obligations under Section&#160;3.11(k)(iv)&#160; and Section&#160;3.11(k)(v), 
the Borrower shall be entitled to replace any Letter of Credit issued by a 
Fronting Lender which has terminated its Fronted LC Commitment under 
Section&#160;3.11(k)(ii)(B) or provided a notice pursuant to Section&#160;11.3, 
with a Letter of Credit issued by another Fronting Lender who agrees to issue 
such replacement Letter of Credit and, upon the replacement of all Letters of 
Credit issued by such Fronting Lender, such Fronting Lender shall cease to be a 
Fronting Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z10135974f959497c845a0aa9f5d58b06" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(vii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Where, pursuant to 
Section&#160;3.11(k)(iii)(B), the Borrower terminates a Fronting Lender as a 
Fronting Lender or, pursuant to Section&#160;3.11(k)(ii)(B), a Fronting Lender 
terminates its Fronted LC Commitment, or, pursuant to Section&#160;11.3, a 
Fronting Lender provides a notice to the Borrower that it is no longer able to 
issue Letters of Credit on behalf of the Lenders, such Fronting Lender shall 
remain a Fronting Lender under all Letters of Credit issued by it until all such
Letters of Credit have been either replaced, expired or been presented for 
payment and all payments required to be made to such Fronting Lender by the 
Borrower and/or the applicable Lenders pursuant to this Section&#160;3.11 as a 
result of any payment made under any Letter of Credit issued by such Fronting 
Lender have been made. Upon the replacement, expiry, termination or presentment 
for payment (and all payments required to be made to such Fronting Lender having
been paid), of any outstanding Letters of Credit issued by such Fronting Lender,
such Fronting Lender's Fronted LC Commitment shall be terminated.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3649463f504842a8a2ade2c6a92ddb5b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%"
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(l)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Cash-Collateralization of
Letters of Credit:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">If:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0a0b2d07168a4e5080877f5626339ba3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div>&#160;</div>
</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">the Agent delivers an 
Acceleration Notice or an Event of Default occurs under Section&#160;10.1(f) or 
10.1(g);</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7c36c193810e4c61b78f7c8653cc57cd" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">any Letter of Credit is 
the subject matter of any order, judgement, injunction or other such 
determination (a "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Judicial Order</font>") restricting payment 
under and in accordance with such Letter of Credit or extending a Fronting 
Lender's liability beyond the expiration date stated in such Letter of Credit; 
or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">57</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zaa0c29782fcb484ca37b1e65fd46e17d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(iii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>the Borrower shall repay Borrowings to a Lender pursuant to 
Section&#160;4.1 or Section&#160;4.2;</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">then the Borrower shall
pay to the Agent an amount, in the currency in which the Letter of Credit is 
denominated, equal to (A) the maximum amount available to be drawn under all 
unexpired Letters of Credit in the case of paragraph (i); (B) the maximum amount
available to be drawn under the Letter of Credit subject to the Judicial Order 
in the case of paragraph (ii); and (C) an amount equal to the applicable 
Lender's Proportion of the maximum amount available to be drawn under any 
unexpired Letters of Credit in respect of each Lender whose Borrowings are 
required to be repaid in the case of paragraph (iii).&#160; Any such amounts 
paid by the Borrower to the Agent shall be held by the Agent in a Cash 
Collateral Account as continuing collateral security for the obligations of the 
Borrower to reimburse the Lenders for amounts paid by a Fronting Lender (and, if
applicable, by a Lender in respect of its obligations under Section&#160;3.11(d)
(collectively, the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">LC Disbursements</font>") in respect of
any such Letter of Credit.&#160; Such cash collateral shall be applied to 
satisfy the obligations of the Borrower for such Letters of Credit as LC 
Disbursements are made thereunder.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">Unless an Event of 
Default shall then have occurred and be continuing, the Agent shall release to 
the Borrower any amount remaining in the Cash Collateral Accounts (after 
applying the amounts necessary to discharge all obligations of the Borrower 
relating to such Letters of Credit) on the date on which either the original 
Letter of Credit has been returned for cancellation or the Letter of Credit has 
expired, provided in either case such Fronting Lender is released to the 
reasonable satisfaction of such Fronting Lender by the beneficiary thereof from 
any other obligation in respect of such Letter of Credit, or, in the case of a 
Judicial Order, the date on which any final and non-appealable order, judgement 
or other determination has been rendered or issued either terminating such
Judicial Order or permanently enjoining the applicable Fronting Lender from 
paying under such Letter of Credit.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7dd860a9af984550bf587433cb24365b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.12</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Notice
of Repayment</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower shall give
the Agent prior written notice substantially in the form of Schedule B of each 
repayment of Borrowings in accordance with the same period of notice required 
pursuant to Section&#160;3.7 for the initial drawdown of the basis of Borrowing 
being repaid. Notwithstanding the foregoing, a Bankers' Acceptance shall only be
repaid on its maturity date and a Libor Loan may only be repaid prior to the 
last day of the Libor Interest Period applicable to such Libor Loan upon payment
by the Borrower of amounts payable in respect thereof pursuant to 
Section&#160;11.5.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z36c5eabede0243eaa0681a28f27f8ad4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.13</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Pro&#8209;Rata Treatment of Borrowings</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z40ef472bd7e44ea9be215a9fb6d40bee" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Pro-Rata 
Borrowings:</font>&#160; Subject to Section&#160;3.13(c), each Borrowing and 
each basis of Borrowing shall be made available by each Lender and all 
repayments and reductions in respect thereof shall be made and applied in a
manner so that the Borrowings and each basis of Borrowing outstanding hereunder 
to each Lender will, to the extent possible, thereafter be in the same 
proportion as the Lender's Proportion of such Lender. The Agent is authorized by
the Borrower and each Lender to determine, in its sole and unfettered 
discretion, the amount of Borrowings and each basis of Borrowing to be made 
available by each Lender and the application of repayments and reductions of 
Borrowings to give effect to the provisions of this Section&#160;3.13(a) and 
Section&#160;7.2; provided that, subject to Section&#160;3.13(c), no Lender 
shall, as a result of any such determination, have Borrowings outstanding in an 
amount which is in excess of the amount of its Commitment.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">58</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0c7f6ad90881466cb5b69724f81e939b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">
<div>(b)</div>
</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Where 
Different Maturity Dates</font>:&#160; If, at any time there are Lenders with 
different Maturity Dates, all Lenders will share in Accommodations based on 
their Lender's Proportion except to the extent the particular Accommodation 
requested has a maturity date after the Maturity Date of a Lender, in which case
only those Lenders with a Maturity Date later than the maturity date of the 
requested Accommodation will be required to participate in providing such 
Accommodation and the Borrower may request a similar Accommodation, to the 
extent permitted hereunder, from the other Lenders with a maturity date 
occurring on or before the Maturity Date of such Lenders.&#160; Each 
determination by the Agent of a Lender's Lender's Proportion shall be <font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
STYLE: italic">prima facie</font> evidence thereof.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd2b6f9e2a4ba4c7e9df3c7aebf5eb059" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Agent's 
Discretion on Allocation:</font>&#160; If it is not practicable to allocate 
Bankers' Acceptances to each Lender such that the aggregate amount of Bankers' 
Acceptances required to be purchased by such Lender hereunder is in a whole 
multiple of Cdn.&#160;$100,000, the Agent is authorized by the Borrower and each
Lender to make such allocation as the Agent determines in its sole and 
unfettered discretion may be equitable in the circumstances.&#160; In no event 
shall the outstanding Borrowings of a Lender exceed its Lender's Proportion by 
more than Cdn.&#160;$100,000 as a result of such exercise of discretion by the 
Agent.&#160; In the event it is not practicable to allocate each basis of 
Borrowing in accordance with Section&#160;3.13(a) by reason of the occurrence of
circumstances described in Sections&#160;11.2, 11.3 or 11.4, the Agent is 
authorized by the Borrower and each Lender to make such allocation as the Agent 
determines in its sole and unfettered discretion may be equitable in the 
circumstances, but no Lender shall, as a result of any such allocation, have any
Borrowings outstanding in an amount which is in excess of the amount of its 
Commitment.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3c785de79f204b2d95557e5be2aa7474" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Further 
Assurances by Borrower:</font>&#160; To the extent reasonably possible, the 
Borrower and each Lender agrees to be bound by and to do all things necessary or
appropriate to give effect to the provisions of this Section&#160;3.13.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zaae3970a430e434ab39576c9f7f6d537" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.14</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div>Conversion Option</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower may, 
during the term of this Agreement, convert any basis of Borrowing (other than a 
Letter of Credit) to another basis of Borrowing (other than a Letter of Credit) 
upon giving the Agent a Conversion Notice in accordance with the period of 
notice and other requirements set out in Section&#160;3.7 applicable to the 
basis of Borrowing to which any Borrowing is being converted<font style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">&#160;</font>(other than delivery of a Borrowing Notice), provided 
that:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z318258bee1b840b59d8d82b0848d722a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bankers' 
Acceptances:</font>&#160; a Bankers' Acceptance may only be converted on its 
maturity date; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc3df82ebe827434cb8a9ca4a1c9918d4" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Libor Loans:</font>&#160; a Libor Loan may be converted on 
the last day of the Libor Interest Period applicable to such Libor Loan or on 
any other day if the Borrower pays all amounts payable in respect thereof 
pursuant to Section&#160;11.5.</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">On each Conversion 
Date, the Borrower shall be required to repay to the Agent for the account of 
the Lenders the basis of Borrowing which is being converted and, subject to the 
provisions of this Agreement, the Lenders shall be required to make available to
the Borrower the Borrowings into which such basis of Borrowing is being 
converted; provided that the Borrower shall be entitled to direct the Agent to 
use the proceeds of all or any part of a new Borrowing to repay the Borrowing 
being converted.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">59</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3b29a7baa5cc40b686ebdf3cbae2462b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.15</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Rollovers</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower may effect
a Rollover of all or, subject to the minimum aggregate amount specified in 
Section&#160;3.7, a part of a Borrowing outstanding by way of a Libor Loan or 
Bankers' Acceptance upon giving the Agent a Rollover Notice in accordance with 
the period of notice and other requirements set out in Section&#160;3.7 
applicable to a Borrowing of the same type unless immediately prior to the 
commencement of any subsequent Libor Interest Period or the term of any 
subsequent Bankers' Acceptance, a Default (in respect of which the Agent has 
advised the Borrower that no Rollovers will be permitted) or Event of Default 
shall have occurred and be continuing, in which event the Borrower shall be 
deemed to have converted, in the case of a Libor Loan, to a U.S. Base Rate Loan 
pursuant to Section&#160;3.14 or, in the case of a Bankers' Acceptance, to a 
Prime Loan pursuant to Section&#160;3.14 and the Borrower shall not be entitled 
to continue such Libor Loan subsequent to the existing Libor Interest Period or,
in the case of a Bankers' Acceptance, subsequent to its maturity date. In the 
event notice of a Rollover of an existing Libor Loan is not given pursuant to 
this Section&#160;3.15 or notice of a conversion of such existing Libor Loan is 
not given pursuant to Section&#160;3.14, such Libor Loan shall be converted to a
U.S. Base Rate Loan on the last day of the Libor Interest Period applicable to 
such existing Libor Loan.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z06b21d42b7e041a891b745abc355cdbb" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.16</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Notices Irrevocable</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">All notices delivered 
or deemed to be delivered by the Borrower pursuant to this Article&#160;3 shall 
be irrevocable and shall oblige the Borrower to take the action contemplated on 
the date specified therein.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zbba175e4d0e34c2e8b83b976e5eaf63d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.17</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Lender
Swaps</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Each of the Lenders (or
an Affiliate of such Lender) may from time to time enter into Swaps with any 
Loan Party during the term of this Agreement. The parties agree that all Swap 
Indebtedness shall be guaranteed under the Loan Party Guarantee and secured by 
the Security and shall, as to the Security, rank <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">pari 
passu</font> with the Obligations, the Cash Management Facility Indebtedness and
the Operating Facility Indebtedness.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z16c0aead8857423d91011da580c8e21f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.18</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Cash 
Management Facilities</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The parties acknowledge
that all Cash Management Facility Indebtedness under all Cash Management 
Facilities shall be guaranteed under the Loan Party Guarantee and secured by the
Security and shall, as to the Security, rank <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">pari passu</font> 
with the Obligations, the Swap Indebtedness and the Operating Facility
Indebtedness.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0711ce1c46a34702a6dcc3ec16981fe1" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">3.19</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Operating Facilities</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The parties agree that 
all Operating Facility Indebtedness under all Operating Facilities shall be 
guaranteed under the Loan Party Guarantee and secured by the Security and shall,
as to the Security, rank <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">pari passu</font> with the 
Obligations, the Swap Indebtedness and the Cash Management Facility 
Indebtedness.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">60</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">ARTICLE&#160;4<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><br>
</font> REPAYMENT AND PREPAYMENT</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd2437948bc954d85b9a176875442115a" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">4.1</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Repayment of Borrowings</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">On the Maturity Date of
each Lender, the Borrower shall repay all Borrowings and other Obligations then 
outstanding to such Lender, and such Lender's Commitment shall be reduced to 
zero and the Total Commitment shall be reduced by a corresponding amount.&#160; 
The Borrower shall ensure that Libor Loans, Bankers' Acceptances and Letters of 
Credit made by or accepted by each Lender either mature or expire on or before 
the Maturity Date of such Lender.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z9cf3ef9d9fa5449bac1dc4fbad773321" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">4.2</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Repayment of Borrowings In Excess of Commitments</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">If, due to exchange 
rate fluctuations, Borrowings (determined in U.S. Dollars with all Borrowings 
denominated in Cdn. Dollars being converted to the Equivalent Amount of U.S. 
Dollars) to any Lender are:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0e2a780b931c4c94b0bcae573a9ad133" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">in excess of its 
Commitment by any amount on a Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover Date, 
the Borrower shall, as part of such Drawdown, Conversion or Rollover reduce or 
eliminate such excess on such date; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z09aeb0b1c487488dba9f119b6995c40e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">in a situation where 
subsection (a)&#160;above does not apply, in excess of its Commitment by more 
than five percent (5%) for more than two (2) consecutive Business Days, the 
Borrower shall within five (5) Business Days thereafter (if such excess is still
continuing) repay, provide funds to the Agent for deposit into a Cash Collateral
Account in accordance with Section 10.4 or Section 3.11(l), as applicable or 
otherwise reduce a portion of such Borrowings to the extent of the amount of any
excess so remaining.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z1224bd55047d4d9598c0c00b66efb455" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">4.3</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Breakage Costs</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">If, on any day on which
payments or prepayments are required to be made under Section&#160;4.1 or 
Section&#160;4.2, the Borrowings then outstanding include Libor Loans, Bankers' 
Acceptances or Letters of Credit in an amount such that the prepayment would 
require the Borrower to be liable under the funding indemnity contained in 
Section&#160;11.5 or to pay a Bankers' Acceptance prior to its maturity date, or
to pay a Letter of Credit prior to its expiry date, that portion of the 
prepayment which would otherwise be applied against any such Libor Loan, 
Bankers' Acceptance or Letter of Credit may, at the option of the Borrower, be 
paid to the Agent for deposit into a Cash Collateral Account in accordance with 
Section&#160;10.4 or Section 3.11(l), as applicable and be applied against such 
Libor Loan on the expiration of the Libor Interest Period applicable thereto, to
such Bankers' Acceptance on its maturity date or to such Letter of Credit on its
expiry date or the date of drawing thereunder.&#160; Interest earned on such 
amounts while on deposit in a Cash Collateral Account shall be paid to the 
Borrower if no Default or Event of Default has occurred and is continuing after 
the payment of any other amounts then due and owing by the Borrower 
hereunder.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf79027999b524e3893032002418ed5b9" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">4.4</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Cancellation of Total Commitment</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower may, 
without penalty or premium, at any time during the term of this Agreement, upon 
at least three (3) Business Days' prior written notice to the Agent, cancel all 
of the Total Commitment or any portion thereof in minimum amounts of 
U.S.&#160;$5,000,000 and whole multiples of U.S.&#160;$1,000,000 thereafter by 
cancelling the Commitment of each Lender in an amount equal to such Lender's 
Lender's Proportion of the amount of the Total Commitment being so cancelled; 
provided that on or prior to the last day of such notice period the Borrower 
has:</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">61</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6cf0008c22c947f1aff1696ba1d9b9a7" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Prepaid 
Borrowings:</font>&#160; prepaid or otherwise reduced Borrowings outstanding to 
each Lender in an amount equal to the amount by which Borrowings outstanding to 
such Lender would otherwise be in excess of its Lender's Proportion immediately 
after the reduction of the Commitments provided for in such notice; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc01040e7784143b19a77994c3d698dfa" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Paid Interest:</font>&#160; paid all accrued interest and 
other charges and fees in respect of the Borrowings being repaid or reduced as 
aforesaid.</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Any such notice of 
cancellation is irrevocable and the amount of the Commitment of each Lender so 
cancelled and reduced may not be reinstated hereunder.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdda10f37ee9b4aec81cb00fd5598bd3c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">4.5</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Early 
Repayment of Libor Loans, Letters of Credit and Bankers' Acceptances</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower shall not 
cancel all or any portion of the Commitment of any Lender pursuant to 
Section&#160;4.4 if the Borrowings required to be repaid to such Lender as a 
result thereof include Letters of Credit with an expiry date falling subsequent 
to the date of such cancellation, Libor Loans with a Libor Interest Period 
falling subsequent to the date of such cancellation or Bankers' Acceptances 
accepted by such Lender with a maturity date falling subsequent to the date of 
such cancellation unless, on the date of such cancellation, the Borrower has 
paid to the Agent at the Agent's Account for Payments, for the account of such 
Lender: (i)&#160;in respect of Libor Loans, the amount required to be paid 
pursuant to Section&#160;11.5, (ii)&#160;in respect of Letters of Credit, the 
undrawn amount thereof, and (iii)&#160; in respect of Bankers' Acceptances, the 
face amount thereof, in each case to be held in a Cash Collateral Account.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb31dd55537af4bcc9ebf23f13347965d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">4.6</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Evidence of Indebtedness</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Agent shall open 
and maintain accounts and records on its books at the Agent's Branch of Account 
evidencing the Borrowings and other amounts owing by the Borrower to the Lenders
under this Agreement.&#160; The Agent shall debit therefrom the amount of such 
Borrowings and shall enter therein each payment of principal of and interest on 
the Borrowings and fees and other amounts payable pursuant to this Agreement and
shall record the Bankers' Acceptances accepted, and if applicable, purchased by 
the Lenders and the Letters of Credit issued by the Fronting Lender and all 
other amounts becoming due to the Agent and each Lender under this 
Agreement.&#160; The accounts and records of the Agent so kept shall constitute,
in the absence of manifest error, <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-STYLE: italic">prima facie</font> evidence
of the indebtedness of the Borrower to the Agent and each Lender pursuant to 
this Agreement, the date each such Lender made each Borrowing available to the 
Borrower and the amounts the Borrower has paid from time to time on account of 
the principal and interest on the Borrowings, fees payable pursuant to this 
Agreement and other amounts owing hereunder.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">ARTICLE&#160;5<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><br>
</font> PAYMENT OF INTEREST AND FEES</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0c755d3cb5a746d78a7befb751b3f45d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">5.1</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Interest on Prime Loans</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower shall pay 
interest in Canadian Dollars on each Prime Loan made by each Lender at the 
Agent's Account for Payments at a rate per three hundred and sixty-five (365) 
days equal to the Prime Rate plus the Applicable Margin applicable to such Prime
Loan. A change in the Prime Rate or the Applicable Margin will simultaneously 
cause a corresponding change in the interest payable on each Prime Loan.&#160; 
Such interest shall accrue daily based on the Prime Rate and Applicable Margin 
in effect on each day and is payable quarterly in arrears on each Interest Date 
for the period commencing on and including the immediately prior Interest Date 
up to but not including the Interest Date on which such interest is to be paid
and shall be calculated on a daily basis and on the basis of the actual number 
of days elapsed in a year of three hundred sixty-five (365) days. The annual 
rates of interest to which the rates determined in accordance with the foregoing
provisions of this Section&#160;5.1 are equivalent are the rates so determined 
multiplied by the actual number of days in the relevant calendar year and 
divided by three hundred sixty-five (365).</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">62</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z210fd8793c1c4b008235f44538954ffb" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">5.2</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Interest on U.S. Base Rate Loans</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower shall pay 
interest in U.S. Dollars on each U.S. Base Rate Loan made by each Lender at the 
Agent's Account for Payments at a rate per three hundred sixty-five (365) day 
period equal to the U.S. Base Rate plus the Applicable Margin applicable to such
U.S. Base Rate Loan.&#160; A change in the U.S. Base Rate or the Applicable 
Margin will simultaneously cause a corresponding change in the interest payable 
on each U.S. Base Rate Loan.&#160; Such interest shall accrue daily based on the
U.S. Base Rate and Applicable Margin in effect on each day and is payable 
quarterly in arrears on each Interest Date for the period commencing on and 
including the immediately prior Interest Date up to but not including the 
Interest Date on which such interest is to be paid and shall be calculated on a 
daily basis and on the basis of the actual number of days elapsed in a year of 
three hundred sixty-five (365) days.&#160; The annual rates of interest to which
the rates determined in accordance with the foregoing provisions of this 
Section&#160;5.2 are equivalent are the rates so determined multiplied by the 
actual number of days in the relevant calendar year and divided by three hundred
sixty-five (365).</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zda8861c967f04e9f8ab074fdf7930f88" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">5.3</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Interest on Libor Loans</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower shall pay 
interest in U.S. Dollars on each Libor Loan made by each Lender at the Agent's 
Account for Payments for the period commencing on and including the first day of
the Libor Interest Period applicable to such Libor Loan up to but not including 
the last day of such Libor Interest Period at a rate equal to the sum of Libor 
plus the Applicable Margin applicable to such Libor Loan and which is in effect 
on the first day of the Libor Interest Period applicable to such Libor Loan. A 
change in the Applicable Margin will simultaneously cause a corresponding change
in the interest payable on each Libor Loan. Such interest shall accrue daily 
based on Libor and the Applicable Margin in effect on each day and is payable on
each Libor Interest Date applicable to such Libor Interest Period and shall be 
calculated on a daily basis and on the basis of the actual number of days 
elapsed in the period for which such interest is payable (including the first 
day of such period but excluding the date on which such interest is payable) 
divided by three hundred sixty (360). The annual rates of interest to which the 
rates determined in accordance with the foregoing provisions of this 
Section&#160;5.3 are equivalent are the rates so determined multiplied by the 
actual number of days in the relevant calendar year and divided by three hundred
sixty (360).</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3ceb4e3b964448ce936538397c49c516" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">5.4</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Bankers' Acceptance Fees</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower shall pay 
acceptance fees in Canadian Dollars at the Agent's Account for Payments 
forthwith upon the acceptance by each Lender of each Bankers' Acceptance issued 
by the Borrower at a rate per three hundred sixty-five (365) day period equal to
the BA Acceptance Fee applicable to and in effect on the date of acceptance of 
such Bankers' Acceptance calculated on the face amount of such Bankers' 
Acceptance and on the basis of the number of days in the term of such Bankers' 
Acceptance divided by three hundred sixty-five (365).&#160; Acceptance fees 
payable to the Agent pursuant to this Section&#160;5.4 shall be paid in the 
manner specified in Section&#160;3.9.&#160; All fees payable pursuant to this
Section&#160;5.4 on any date in respect of any issuance of Bankers' Acceptances 
shall be calculated by the Agent and payable by the Borrower based on the 
BA&#160;Acceptance Fee in effect on such date, provided that if during the term 
of any such Bankers' Acceptance a change in the BA&#160;Acceptance Fee occurs, 
the fees paid by the Borrower in respect of such Bankers' Acceptance shall be 
adjusted, effective upon the change in the BA&#160;Acceptance Fee occurring, to 
reflect the BA&#160;Acceptance Fee for the remaining term (if any) of the 
Bankers' Acceptance, and the Borrower, in the case of an increase in the 
BA&#160;Acceptance Fee, shall no later than three (3) Business Days after 
receipt of a notice from the Agent make such payments to the Agent at the 
Agent's Account for Payments for the account of each Lender as are necessary to 
reflect such change, and each Lender, in the case of a decrease in the 
BA&#160;Acceptance Fee, shall credit any amount which would otherwise be 
refundable to the Borrower against amounts in respect of interest or fees 
accruing hereunder in relation to the Borrower.&#160; The annual rates of fees 
to which the rates determined in accordance with the foregoing provisions of 
this Section 5.4 are equivalent, are the rates so determined multiplied by the 
actual number of days in a period of one year commencing on the first day of the
period for which such interest is payable and divided by three hundred and 
sixty-five (365).</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">63</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8a384f4b1ae64cbe8e29e8e06c98031b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">5.5</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Letter
of Credit Fees</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z28fb544a7e4d4eeda1028fd61cdcaf2d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Issue 
Fee</font>:&#160; The Borrower shall pay to the Agent for the benefit of each 
Lender an issue fee in the same currency as the Letter of Credit is denominated,
such fee to be equal to the Letter of Credit Fee.&#160; Such issue fee shall be 
payable by the Borrower quarterly in arrears on the first Business Day of each 
calendar quarter for the immediately preceding calendar quarter, and shall, for 
each Lender, be calculated daily based on the Letter of Credit Fee in effect, 
the face amount of such Letter of Credit and a year of three hundred sixty-five 
(365) days.&#160; A change in the Applicable Margin will simultaneously cause a 
corresponding change in the Letter of Credit Fee payable under any outstanding 
Letter of Credit.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7137c67e10844658a02a6e54fc5bac90" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;

10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fronting 
Fee</font>:&#160; The Borrower shall pay to the Agent (solely for the account of
any Fronting Lender):</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6775991107514e53baff1f7e4453e036" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

as are charged by such Fronting Lender and agreed to by the Borrower at or prior
to the time of issuing any Letter of Credit.</td>
</tr>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="ze97aec9ebee54c8e948266a4ef00abf9" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Other 
Costs</font>:&#160; The Borrower shall pay to the Agent, each Fronting Lender 
and each Lender its:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z06a3ea3be2534ff2985542ce1cd111c6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>

and each drawing made thereunder; and</td>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zadab4aa1d9754021b65920638eb88498" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

<tr>
