WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">98</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zdf9a5904fe014aef9dce910cd86ca110" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Letters 
of Credit:&#160; </font>If any Letters of Credit are outstanding (with the 
Equivalent Amount in U.S. Dollars of the undrawn amount of such Letters of 
Credit being referred to as the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Defaulting Lender 
Exposure</font>") at the time a Lender becomes a Defaulting Lender, then:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0df88a79aeed4767b91c8019e736e15f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">to the extent the 
Defaulting Lender has not provided cash collateral for its Defaulting Lender
Exposure pursuant to Section&#160;11.8(c) above, such Defaulting Lender Exposure
shall be reallocated among the non-Defaulting Lenders for the purposes of 
Section&#160;3.11(d) in accordance with their respective Lender's Proportions 
(disregarding any Defaulting Lender's Commitment) but only to the extent that 
the sum of (A) the aggregate Equivalent Amount in U.S. Dollars of the Borrowings
made by any non-Defaulting Lender and outstanding at such time, plus (B) such 
non-Defaulting Lender's rateable share (after giving effect to the reallocation 
contemplated herein) of the Defaulting Lender Exposure, does not exceed such 
non-Defaulting Lender's Commitment; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd681534757b345a6864728ca55c25ad5" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">if the reallocation 
described in Section&#160;11.8(d)(i) above cannot, or can only partially, be 
effected, the Borrower shall within one Business Day following notice by any 
Fronting Lender provide cash collateral in accordance with Section&#160;3.11(l) 
for any portion for which the reallocation could not be effected, and the 
provisions of such Section shall apply thereto as if a demand has been made 
pursuant thereto by each Fronting Lender in respect of each outstanding Letter 
of Credit.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z49e1b5a7cd674e7cbaf791fe188c424e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(e)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fronting 
Lender Exposure:&#160; </font>So long as any Lender is a Defaulting Lender, a 
Fronting Lender shall not be required to issue any Letters of Credit unless it 
is satisfied that the related exposure will be 100% covered by the Commitment of
non-Defaulting Lenders in accordance with Section&#160;11.8(d) and participating
interests in any such newly issued Letter of Credit shall be allocated among 
non-Defaulting Lenders in a manner consistent with Section&#160;11.8(d)(i).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z07f52e1a144d4cf49b817e274b92b30e" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(f)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Ceasing 
to be Defaulting Lender:&#160; </font>If any Lender shall cease to be a 
Defaulting Lender, then, upon becoming aware of the same, the Agent shall notify
the other Lenders and (in accordance with the written direction of the Agent) 
such Lender (which has ceased to be a Defaulting Lender) shall purchase, and the
other Lenders shall on a rateable basis sell and assign to such Lender, portions
of such Obligations equal in total to such Lender's Lender's Proportion thereof 
without regard to Section&#160;11.8(b).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">ARTICLE&#160;12<font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><br>
</font> THE AGENT AND THE LENDERS</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z922881e72dab49c6bf438d27270e022b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.1</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Authorization of Agent</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Each Secured Lender 
irrevocably appoints and authorizes the Agent to exercise such powers, perform 
such duties, take such actions, make such decisions and determinations and give 
such consents under the Loan Documents as are required to be exercised, 
performed, taken, made, given or otherwise carried out by the Agent hereunder or
under any other agreement between the Lenders (including, if applicable, other 
Secured Lenders), together with all powers reasonably incidental thereto. As to 
any matters not expressly required by this Agreement, the other Loan Documents 
or by any other agreement between the Lenders (including, if applicable, other 
Secured Lenders) to be carried out by the Agent, the Agent is not required to 
exercise any discretion or take or to refrain from taking any action except upon
the written instructions of the Majority Lenders.&#160; Notwithstanding anything
to the contrary in this Agreement, the Agent shall not be required to exercise 
any discretion or to take or to refrain from taking any action in any manner 
which is contrary to the Loan Documents, to any other agreement between the 
Lenders (including, if applicable, other Secured Lenders) or to Applicable 
Law.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">99</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8303e629f3c84324bbc95e167c7b6a23" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.2</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Responsibility of Agent</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Agent makes no 
representation or warranty and accepts no responsibility with respect to the due
execution, legality, validity, sufficiency, enforceability or priority of any of
the Loan Documents or any other Secured Document nor with respect to the due 
execution, legality, validity, sufficiency, enforceability, accuracy or 
authenticity of any documents, papers, materials or other information furnished 
by the Borrower (or any other Person, including the Agent or any Loan Party) in 
connection with the Loan Documents or any other Secured Document, whether 
provided before or after the date of this Agreement. The Agent shall incur no 
liability to the Secured Lenders under or in respect of the Loan Documents or 
any other Secured Document with respect to anything which it may do or refrain 
from doing in the reasonable exercise of its judgment or which may seem to it to
be necessary or desirable in the circumstances, except for its gross negligence 
or wilful misconduct.&#160; The Agent assumes no responsibility for the payment 
of any of the Obligations or other Secured Obligations by any Loan Party.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2461ff7ea0b1436f845fead9f46dcd06" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.3</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH:
auto">Acknowledgment of Secured Lenders</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Each Secured Lender 
acknowledges to the Agent that it has been, and will continue to be, solely 
responsible for making its own independent appraisal of and investigation into 
the financial condition, creditworthiness, environmental soundness, affairs, 
status and nature of the Loan Parties and accordingly each Secured Lender 
confirms to the Agent that it has not relied, and will not hereafter rely on the
Agent:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb45de3d03eea46e0b911e0a46b09c586" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Information:</font>&#160; to check or inquire on its behalf into the 
adequacy, accuracy or completeness of any information provided by any Loan Party
or provided in connection with the Loan Documents or any other Secured Document 
(whether or not such information has been or is hereafter circulated to such 
Secured Lender by the Agent);</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd95484a89cc949f59ff7402bc75488f7" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Performance:</font>&#160; to inquire as to the performance by any Loan 
Party of its obligations under the Loan Documents or any other Secured Document;
or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3f7985b1dbef4d3690f2c918c48f7cb0" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Credit 
Review:</font>&#160; to assess or keep under review on its behalf the financial 
condition, creditworthiness, environmental soundness, affairs, status or nature 
of any Loan Party.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z69275aa5c3e648c29f173268c4552ba6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.4</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Rights
and Obligations of Each Secured Lender</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The rights and 
obligations of each Secured Lender under this Agreement are several and no 
Lender shall be obligated to make Borrowings available to the Borrower in excess
of the amount of such Lender's Commitment. The failure of a Secured Lender to 
perform its obligations under this Agreement shall neither:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0b9f767821e8403ea102f8d75d3930d7" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">No 
Liability to Other Secured Lenders:</font>&#160; result in any other Secured 
Lender incurring any liability whatsoever, provided however that a Lender shall 
remain liable at all times for the performance of the obligations hereunder of 
its Affiliate that is a Secured Lender; nor</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z21dbde9c1e7c431f93442a3081530e63" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">No Relief
from Obligations:</font>&#160; relieve any Loan Party or any other Secured 
Lender from its respective obligations under any Loan Document or other Secured 
Document.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">100</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Nothing contained 
herein or in any other Loan Document or Secured Document nor any action taken 
pursuant hereto or thereto shall be deemed to constitute the Secured Lenders a 
partnership, joint venture or any other similar entity.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Each of the Secured 
Lenders hereby acknowledge that, to the extent permitted by Applicable Law, the 
remedies provided hereunder to the Secured Lenders are for their benefit 
collectively and acting together and not severally, and further acknowledge that
its rights hereunder are to be exercised not severally but collectively by the 
Agent upon the decision of the Majority Lenders regardless of whether an 
Acceleration Notice has been delivered or an Event of Default under 
Sections&#160;10.1(f) or 10.1(g) has occurred.&#160; Notwithstanding any of the 
provisions contained herein each of the Secured Lenders hereby covenants and 
agrees that it shall not be entitled to individually take any action with 
respect to the Loan Documents including, without limitation, taking (including 
in respect of its Commitment or any indebtedness or liability owed to it) any 
action contemplated in Sections&#160;10.2 and 10.5, but that any such action 
shall be taken only by the Agent with the prior written agreement or 
instructions of the Majority Lenders; provided that notwithstanding the 
foregoing, if the Agent, having been adequately indemnified against costs and 
expenses of doing so by the Lenders, shall fail to carry out any such 
instructions of the Majority Lenders, any Secured Lender may do so on behalf of 
all Secured Lenders and shall, in so doing, be entitled to the benefit of all 
protection give the Agent hereunder or elsewhere.&#160; If it becomes illegal 
for any Lender to hold or benefit from the Security over the assets or shares of
the Borrower or a Material Subsidiary pursuant to any law of the United States 
of America, such Lender shall notify the Agent and disclaim any benefit of such 
Security over the assets or shares of such Borrower or Material Subsidiary to
the extent of such illegality, but such illegality shall not invalidate or 
render unenforceable such Security or the Security Interest granted thereunder 
for the benefit of each of the other Lenders.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z3bb58563416141618b6a00c47667c588" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.5</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Notice
to Secured Lenders</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Unless otherwise 
specifically dealt with in this Agreement, in the event the Agent delivers a 
written notice to a Secured Lender requesting advice from such Secured Lender as
to whether it consents or objects to any matter in connection with the Loan 
Documents, then, except as otherwise expressly provided herein, if such Secured 
Lender does not deliver to the Agent its written consent or objection to such 
matter:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="za733c24ac63d4626b38f88e2312dcd1d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">where a time period is 
specified hereunder for the Agent or the Majority Lenders to provide any 
response, notice or other communication prior to the end of such period; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z90db0d27b0ac422bb565b96128577538" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">where no such time period
is specified hereunder, then within fifteen (15) Business Days of the delivery 
of such written notice by the Agent to such Secured Lender;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">such Secured Lender 
shall be deemed not to have consented thereto.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z937bf7e2a2d844e29a34b26be295e358" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.6</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Notices between the Secured Lenders, the Agent and the Borrower</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">All notices by the 
Secured Lenders to the Agent shall be through the Agent's Branch of Account and 
all notices by the Agent to a Secured Lender shall be through such Secured 
Lender's Branch of Account.&#160; All notices or communications between the 
Borrower and the Secured Lenders which are required or contemplated pursuant to 
the Loan Documents shall be given or made through the Agent at the Agent's 
Branch of Account.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">101</font></div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8aa186d69a544b838b05203c91994fc5" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.7</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Agent's Duty to Deliver Documents Obtained from the Borrower</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Agent shall 
promptly, and in any event within five (5) Business Days, deliver to each 
Lender, at its Branch of Account in hard copy or electronic form, such 
documents, papers, materials and other information as are furnished by the 
Borrower to the Agent on behalf of such Lender pursuant to this Agreement, and 
the Borrower shall provide the Agent with sufficient copies of all such 
information for such purpose.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z721ee18ce79343c5a3d0b9e307b8f83c" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.8</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Arrangements for Borrowings</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Agent shall 
promptly give written notice to each Lender at its Branch of Account upon 
receipt by the Agent of any notice given pursuant to Article&#160;3 or 
Section&#160;4.3.&#160; The Agent shall advise each Lender of the amount, date 
and details of each Borrowing and of such Lender's share in each 
Borrowing.&#160; At or before 1&#160;p.m. (Toronto time) on each Drawdown Date, 
Conversion Date or Rollover Date:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc912f20b74254e8792823208ecf6649d" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Loans:</font>&#160; each Lender will make available to the 
Borrower its share of Borrowings by way of Loans by forwarding to the Agent at 
the Agent's Account for Payments the amount of Loans required to be made 
available by such Lender; and</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zcd9f6263300f4d51a217edddd299b301" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bankers' 
Acceptances:</font>&#160; each Lender will make available to the Borrower its 
share of Borrowings by way of Bankers' Acceptances by forwarding to the Agent at
the Agent's Account for Payments:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z86cfd906ad104f9e8efdaf0334088352" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">if such Lender is to 
purchase its Bankers' Acceptances, the amount of the Discount Proceeds in 
respect of such Bankers' Acceptances (less the amount of applicable fees payable
by the Borrower to such Lender pursuant to Section&#160;5.4); or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd34c9218ff4f419196a8d6ecf80b274f" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">if such Lender is not to 
purchase its Bankers' Acceptances, the discounted proceeds of sale of such 
Bankers' Acceptances received by such Lender (less the amount of applicable fees
payable by the Borrower to such Lender pursuant to Section&#160;5.4).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zec38fad631b3461cbb33bc8fd5ab36e9" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.9</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Arrangements for Repayment of Borrowings</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0d895fc0cc0049dab2d9ea9e0b30a663" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Prior to 
Demand or Acceleration:</font>&#160; Prior to the delivery of an Acceleration 
Notice or the occurrence of an Event of Default specified in 
Section&#160;10.1(f) or 10.1(g), upon receipt by the Agent of payments from the 
Borrower on account of principal, interest, fees or any other payment made to 
the Agent on behalf of the Lenders hereunder, the Agent shall pay over to each 
Lender at its Branch of Account the amount to which it is entitled under this 
Agreement and shall use its best efforts to make such payment to such Lender on 
the same Business Day on which such payment is received by the Agent.&#160; If 
the Agent does not remit any such payment to a Lender on the same Business Day 
as such payment is received by the Agent, the Agent shall pay interest thereon 
to such Lender until the date of payment at a rate determined by the Agent (such
rate to be conclusive and binding on such Lender) in accordance with the Agent's
usual banking practice in respect of deposits of amounts comparable to the 
amount of such payment which are received by the Agent at a time similar to the 
time at which such payment is received by the Agent.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zcda0b4225a5c4b87b1b1d0b92cc76836" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Subsequent to Acceleration:</font>&#160; Following delivery of an 
Acceleration Notice or the occurrence of an Event of Default specified in 
Section&#160;10.1(f) or 10.1(g), the Secured Lenders shall share any payments 
subsequently received in accordance with Section&#160;10.7.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">102</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0e62c34a8d454e82a49c0b5d624dabce" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.10</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Repayment by Lenders to Agent</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z732582eb3ad8401e87025b87ab3cc326" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Where the
Borrower Fails to Pay:</font>&#160; Unless the Agent has been notified in 
writing by the Borrower at least one (1) Business Day prior to the date on which
any payment to be made by such Borrower hereunder is due that such Borrower does
not intend to remit such payment, the Agent may (but shall not be obligated to),
in its discretion, assume that the Borrower has remitted such payment when so 
due and the Agent may, in its discretion and in reliance upon such assumption, 
make available to each Lender on such payment date an amount equal to the amount
of such payment which is due to such Lender pursuant to this Agreement.&#160; If
the Borrower does not in fact remit such payment to the Agent, the Agent shall 
promptly notify each Lender and each such Lender shall forthwith on demand repay
to the Agent the amount of such assumed payment made available to such Lender, 
together with interest thereon until the date of repayment thereof at a rate 
determined by the Agent (such rate to be conclusive and binding on such Lender) 
in accordance with the Agent's usual banking practice for similar advances to 
financial institutions of like standing to such Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z365ea39e1ff14b678e44da4c5e8e9074" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Where a 
Lender Fails to Pay:</font>&#160; Unless the Agent has been notified in writing 
by a Lender at least one (1) Business Day prior to a Drawdown Date, Conversion 
Date or Rollover Date that such Lender does not intend to make available the 
amount required to be made available by such Lender pursuant to this Agreement 
on such Drawdown Date, Conversion Date or Rollover Date, the Agent may, in its 
discretion, assume that such Lender has remitted funds to the Agent in an amount
equal to the amount required to be made available by such Lender pursuant to 
this Agreement and the Agent may, in its discretion and in reliance upon such 
assumption, make available to the Borrower on such Drawdown Date, Conversion 
Date or Rollover Date an amount equal to the amount required to be made 
available by such Lender pursuant to this Agreement.&#160; If a Lender does not 
in fact remit such funds to the Agent and, if the Agent has provided funds to 
the Borrower on behalf of such Lender, the Agent shall promptly notify such 
Lender and such Lender shall forthwith remit such funds to the Agent, failing 
which the Borrower shall within two (2) Business Days repay to the Agent 
(without prejudice to the Borrower' rights against such Lender) the amount made 
available by the Agent on behalf of such Lender, in each case together with 
interest thereon until the date of repayment thereof at a rate determined by the
Agent (such rate to be conclusive and binding on such Lender or the Borrower, as
the case may be) in accordance with the Agent's usual banking practice for 
similar advances to financial institutions of like standing to such Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6d1912afdeb14d8b9c8c9820419a1e17" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.11</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Adjustments Among Lenders</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z664e6a29af1f478bba67b38045056313" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT:
bold">Adjustments to Outstanding Borrowings:</font>&#160; Each Lender agrees 
that, on and after the Adjustment Time, it will at any time and from time to 
time upon the request of the Agent as required by any other Lender purchase 
portions of the Borrowings and make any other adjustments which may be necessary
or appropriate, in order that amounts which remain outstanding under this 
Agreement to each Lender are thereafter outstanding, as adjusted pursuant to 
this Section&#160;12.11, in the same proportion as the Lender's Proportion of 
the Total Commitment.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z122cf75039f740e1b8a5730f0e8b5ffc" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Application of Payments:</font>&#160; The Secured Lenders agree that, on 
and after the Adjustment Time, the amount of any repayment made by the Borrower 
under, and the amount of any proceeds from the exercise of any rights or 
remedies of the Agent and the Secured Lenders under the Loan Documents or any 
other Secured Document will, subject to Section&#160;10.7, be applied in a 
manner so that to the extent possible the amount of Secured Obligations of each 
Secured Lender which remain outstanding after giving effect to such application 
will be in the same proportion as its Lender's Proportion of the aggregate 
Secured Obligations of all Secured Lenders.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">103</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z463c893b9ca14c5095b1c15d63910528" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Receipt
of Payments other than Secured Obligations:</font>&#160; Notwithstanding 
anything contained in this Section&#160;12.11, there shall not be taken into 
account for the purposes of computing any amount payable to a Secured Lender 
pursuant to this Section&#160;12.11, any amount which such Secured Lender 
receives as a result of any payment (whether voluntary, involuntary, through the
exercise of any right of set-off, or otherwise) on account of any monies owing 
by a Loan Party to such Secured Lender other than on account of Secured 
Obligations; provided that, if at any time a Secured Lender receives any payment
(whether voluntary, involuntary, through the exercise of any right of set-off, 
or otherwise) on account of monies owing or payable to it by a Loan Party on 
account of Secured Obligations, such payments will be applied in accordance with
Section&#160;10.7; and provided further that the provisions of this 
Section&#160;12.11(c) shall not apply to a Swap Lender which sets off amounts 
owing by a Loan Party to such Swap Lender under a Lender Swap against amounts 
owing by such Swap Lender (including, for clarity, its Affiliates) to a Loan 
Party under any Lender Swap entered into between such parties.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">To the extent that a 
Secured Document is entered into by an Affiliate of a Lender, that Lender shall 
cause such Affiliate to comply with the provisions of this Section&#160;12.11, 
and such obligation shall survive such Lender ceasing to be a Lender 
hereunder.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z22e9d9907ee64be690c80f2150701407" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr style="HEIGHT: 42px">
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(d)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Further 
Assurances:</font>&#160; The Borrower agrees to be bound by and, at the request 
of the Agent, to do all things necessary or appropriate to give effect to any 
and all purchases and other adjustments made by and between the Secured Lenders 
pursuant to this Section&#160;12.11 but shall incur no increased indebtedness, 
in aggregate, by reason thereof.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">shall bind the Secured 
Lenders if such waiver or amendment is agreed to in writing by all of the 
Lenders.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zc0512f6542e540a6bf84377c866e43dd" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Majority 
Consent:</font>&#160; Subject to Section&#160;12.12(a), Section&#160;12.12(c) 
and Section 12.12(d) and except as otherwise provided in the Loan Documents, any
waiver, consent to or amendment to any provision of the Loan Documents and any 
action, consent or other determination in connection with the Loan Documents 
shall bind all of the Secured Lenders if such waiver, amendment, action, consent
or other determination is agreed to in writing by the Majority Lenders.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zd5cff5127c82428793b2c59e82dc3cb6" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

the Loan Documents which relates to the rights or obligations of the Agent shall
require the agreement of the Agent thereto.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">

provision of the Loan Documents which relates to the rights or obligations of a 
Fronting Lender shall require the agreement of such Fronting Lender 
thereto.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf1d5131b5f874e43b0d883a78ad8f6f3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.13</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Reimbursement of Agent's Expenses or Lender's Costs</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Each Secured Lender 
agrees that it will indemnify the Agent for its Lender's Proportion of any and 
all costs, expenses and disbursements (including, without limitation, those
costs and expenses referred to in Section&#160;11.1) which may be incurred or 
made by the Agent in good faith in connection with the Loan Documents, and 
agrees that it will, on written demand detailing such costs, expenses and 
disbursements, reimburse the Agent for any such costs, expenses or disbursements
for which the Agent is not promptly reimbursed at any time by the Borrower. The 
Agent may refrain from exercising any right, power or discretion or taking any 
action to protect or enforce the rights of any Secured Lender under the Loan 
Documents or any other Secured Document until it has been so reimbursed.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z1253b4f5132d44088c82816a4bb17254" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.14</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Reliance by Agent on Notices, etc.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Agent shall be 
entitled:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z1de0a07c48dd41a1bf41601b73564880" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Reliance 
on Written Documents:</font>&#160; to rely upon any writing, letter, written 
notice, certificate, telex, facsimile copy, cable, statement, order or other 
document believed by the Agent to be genuine and correct and to have been 
signed, sent or made by the proper Person or Persons; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zbdec34cadcb6401b872c3f9e58efcff2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Reliance 
on Legal Advice:</font>&#160; with respect to legal matters, to act upon advice 
of legal advisors selected by the Agent concerning all matters pertaining to the
Loan Documents and any other Secured Document and the Agent's duties 
thereunder;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">and the Agent shall assume no 
responsibility and shall incur no liability to the Borrower or any Secured 
Lender by reason of relying on any such document or acting on any such 
advice.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8aa1b3f516d9491c89460d3ab9e804d9" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.15</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Relations with Borrower</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Except for the 
transactions provided for in this Agreement, each Secured Lender may deal with 
the Borrower and any other Loan Party in all transactions and generally do any 
banking business with or provide any financial services to the Borrower and any 
other Loan Party without having any liability to account to the other Secured 
Lenders therefor.&#160; Where any Secured Lender is the Agent, with respect to 
its Commitment and Lender's Proportion, such Lender shall have the same rights 
and powers under this Agreement as any other Lender and may exercise the same as
though it were not the Agent.</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">105</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z84edd361a9974cbc9160c325dc573149" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.16</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Successor Agent</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Agent shall resign 
if at any time it is no longer a Lender hereunder by reason of an assignment of 
its rights and obligations under this Agreement and the Loan Documents pursuant 
to Section&#160;13.1 and, in such event, it shall provide thirty (30) days prior
written notice of any such intended assignment to each of the Lenders and the 
Borrower.&#160; The Agent may resign at any time by giving thirty (30) days 
prior written notice thereof to each of the Lenders and the Borrower.&#160; Upon
any such resignation, the remaining Lenders, or other Secured Lenders if there 
are then no Lenders (the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Remaining Lenders</font>"), shall have 
the right to appoint a successor agent, subject to the approval of the Borrower,
such approval not to be unreasonably withheld.&#160; Any successor agent 
appointed under this Section&#160;12.16 shall be a Lender which has offices in 
Calgary, Alberta or Toronto, Ontario.&#160; If no successor agent shall have 
been appointed by the Remaining Lenders and shall have accepted such appointment
within thirty (30) days after the retiring agent's giving of notice of 
resignation, then the retiring agent may, on behalf of the Lenders, or other 
Secured Lenders if there are then no Lenders, appoint a successor agent, subject
to the approval of the Borrower, such approval not to be unreasonably 
withheld.&#160; Upon the acceptance of any appointment as Agent by a successor 
agent, such successor agent shall thereupon succeed to and become vested with 
all the rights, powers, privileges and duties of the retiring agent as Agent, 
and the retiring agent shall be discharged from its duties and obligations under
this Agreement as Agent.&#160; After any retiring agent's resignation or removal
hereunder as the Agent, the provisions of this Agreement shall continue in 
effect for its benefit and for the benefit of the Lenders, or other Secured 
Lenders if there are then no Lenders, in respect of any actions taken or omitted
to be taken by the retiring agent while it was acting as the Agent.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0fa413ecbdd24cf6b62f576708dcb765" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.17</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Indemnity of Agent</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Each Secured Lender 
hereby agrees to indemnify the Agent (to the extent not reimbursed by the 
Borrower) as to its Lender's Proportion from and against any and all 
liabilities, obligations, losses, damages, penalties, actions, judgments, costs,
expenses or disbursements of any kind or nature whatsoever which may be imposed 
on, incurred by, or asserted against the Agent in any way relating to or arising
out of the Loan Documents or the other Secured Documents or any action taken or 
omitted by the Agent under or in respect thereof; provided that the Secured 
Lenders shall not be liable for any portion of such liabilities, obligations, 
losses, damages, penalties, actions, judgments, suits, costs, expenses or 
disbursements resulting from the Agent's gross negligence or wilful 
misconduct.&#160; Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, each Secured
Lender agrees to reimburse the Agent promptly upon demand for its Lender's 
Proportion of any out-of-pocket expenses (including counsel fees) incurred by 
the Agent in connection with the preservation of any rights of the Agent or the 
Secured Lenders under, or the enforcement of, or legal advice in respect of 
rights or responsibilities under, the Loan Documents and other Secured 
Documents, but only to the extent that the Agent is not reimbursed for such 
expenses by the Borrower.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8f385504fdd74238af508f1283a87343" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.18</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Sharing of Information</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower authorizes
the Agent and each other Secured Lender to share among each other and with any 
successor, assignee, or any potential assignee, any information possessed by it 
regarding a Loan Party or the Loan Documents or the other Secured 
Documents.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">106</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z4a859436709e4af2b25baca53e4ffcfc" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.19</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: 
auto">Amendment to this Article&#160;12</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">Save and except for the
provisions of Sections&#160;12.16 and 12.17, the provisions of this 
Article&#160;12 may be amended or added to, from time to time, without the 
agreement of the Borrower provided such amendment or addition does not adversely
affect the rights of the Borrower hereunder or increase, in the aggregate, the 
liabilities of the Borrower hereunder.&#160; A copy of the instrument evidencing
such amendment or addition shall be forwarded by the Agent to the Borrower as 
soon as practicable following the execution thereof; provided that after an 
Event of Default a failure to do so by the Agent shall not render it liable in 
damages to the Borrower.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z8de833a55ae247b880204f0f8a459174" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; WIDTH: 72pt; align: right">12.20</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">The 
Agent and Defaulting Lenders</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf069fbb27b2a480f9f1f9f95d3ebf688" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash 
Collateral:&#160; </font>Each Defaulting Lender shall be required to provide to 
the Agent cash in an amount, as shall be determined from time to time by the 
Agent in its discretion, equal to all obligations of such Defaulting Lender to
the Agent that are owing or may become owing pursuant to this Agreement, 
including such Defaulting Lender's obligation to pay its Lender's Proportion of 
any indemnification, reimbursement or expense reimbursement amounts not paid by 
the Borrower. Such cash shall be held by the Agent in one or more cash 
collateral accounts, which accounts shall be in the name of the Agent and shall 
not be required to be interest bearing.&#160; The Agent shall be entitled to 
apply the foregoing cash in accordance with Section&#160;12.17, in the case of 
amounts owing to the Agent.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf0aad2c9242d420f959e90a1d38d51a2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Indemnity:&#160; </font>In addition to the indemnity and reimbursement 
obligations noted in Section&#160;12.17, the Lenders agree to indemnify the 
Agent (to the extent not reimbursed by the Borrower and without limiting the 
obligations of the Borrower hereunder) rateably according to their respective 
Lender's Proportion (and in calculating the Lender's Proportion of a Lender, 
ignoring the Commitments of Defaulting Lenders) any amount that a Defaulting 
Lender fails to pay the Agent and which is due and owing to the Agent pursuant 
to Section&#160;12.17.&#160; Each Defaulting Lender agrees to indemnify each 
other Lender for any amounts paid by such Lender and which would otherwise be 
payable by the Defaulting Lender.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z28fc2118840a4c10a9e7ad101d34baff" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(c)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Set 
Off:&#160; </font>The Agent shall be entitled to set off any Defaulting Lender's
Proportion of all payments received from the Borrower against such Defaulting 
Lender's obligations to make payments and fund Accommodations required to be 
made by it and to purchase participations required to be purchased by it in each
case under this Agreement and the other Loan Documents.&#160; To the extent 
permitted by law, the Agent shall be entitled to withhold and deposit in one or 
more non-interest bearing cash collateral accounts in the name of the Agent all 
amounts (whether principal, interest, fees or otherwise) received by the Agent 
and due to a Defaulting Lender pursuant to this Agreement, for so long as such 
Lender is a Defaulting Lender, which amounts shall be used by the Agent:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z58901d89f3984428a00fea5f05b7a946" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(i)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">first, to reimburse the 
Agent for any amounts owing to it, in its capacity as Agent, by such Defaulting 
Lender pursuant to any Loan Document;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z6af8f69a978942d696755240ff1d7fc2" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(ii)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">second, to repay on a 
<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
FONT-STYLE: italic">pro rata</font> basis the incremental portion of any 
Accommodations made by a Lender pursuant to Section 11.8 in order to fund a 
shortfall created by a Defaulting Lender and, upon receipt of such repayment, 
each such Lender shall be deemed to have assigned to the Defaulting Lender such 
incremental portion of such Accommodations;</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font 
id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', 
Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal">107</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zf16744c69db1431d8e60e32ff6f2904b" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
