<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-

Bank relating to the execution, completion, endorsement, discount, purchase 
and/or delivery by the Bank on behalf of the Borrower of Notes which the 
Borrower wishes to issue to the Bank shall be communicated by the Agent in 
writing to the Attorney at the Bank's Branch of Account concurrently with 
delivery by the Borrower, pursuant to the provisions of:&#160; 
(i)&#160;Section&#160;3.7<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New 
Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>of the Credit Agreement, a
Borrowing Notice by way of Bankers' Acceptances in the form of Schedule B to the
Credit Agreement; (ii) Section&#160;3.15 of the Credit Agreement, a Rollover 
Notice in the form of Schedule C to the Credit Agreement; or 
(iii)&#160;Section&#160;3.14 of the Credit Agreement, a Conversion Notice in the
form of Schedule D to the Credit Agreement.&#160; The instructions to the Bank 
shall specify the following information:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5cc96053e0b341d99d2eae50e7e3bd42" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">a Canadian Dollar amount,
which shall be the aggregate face amount of the Notes in respect of a particular
Borrowing, Conversion or Rollover; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z941982e8093a4385becf39c3c62e59d9" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">a specified period of 
time, as provided in the Credit Agreement, which shall be the number of months 
after the date of such Notes that such Notes are to be payable, and the dates of
issue and maturity of such Notes.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The communication in 
writing to the Bank of the instructions referred to above shall constitute the 
authorization and instruction of the Borrower to the Bank to complete and, if 
applicable, endorse Notes in accordance with such information as set out 
above.&#160; The Borrower acknowledges that the Bank shall not be obligated to 
make any BA Equivalent Advance and thereafter complete and execute, and if 
applicable, endorse any such Notes except in accordance with the provisions of 
the Credit Agreement.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Bank shall be and 
it is hereby authorized to act on behalf of the Borrower upon and in compliance 
with instructions communicated to the Bank as provided herein if the Bank 
reasonably believes them to be genuine.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">The Borrower agrees to 
indemnify the Bank and its directors, officers, employees, affiliates and agents
and to hold it and them harmless from and against any loss, liability, expense 
or claim of any kind or nature whatsoever incurred by any of them as a result of
any action or inaction in any way relating to or arising out of this power of 
attorney or the acts contemplated hereby; provided that this indemnity shall not
apply to any such loss, liability, expense or claim which results from the gross
negligence or wilful misconduct of the Bank or any of its directors, officers, 
employees, affiliates or agents.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">This power of attorney 
may be revoked at any time upon not less than fifteen (15) Business Days' 
written notice served in accordance with Section&#160;14.5 of the Credit 
Agreement upon the Bank at its Branch of Account, provided that:&#160; 
(i)&#160;it may be replaced with another power of attorney forthwith on terms 
satisfactory to the Bank; and (ii)&#160;no such revocation shall reduce, limit 
or otherwise affect the obligations of the Borrower in respect of any Notes 
executed, completed, endorsed, discounted and/or delivered in accordance 
herewith prior to the time at which such revocation becomes effective.&#160; 
This power of attorney may be terminated by the Bank at any time upon not less 
than fifteen (15) Business Days written notice to the Borrower in accordance 
with Section&#160;14.5 of the Credit Agreement.&#160; Any revocation or 
termination of this power of attorney shall not affect the rights of the Bank 
and the obligations of the Borrower with respect to the indemnities of the 
Borrower above stated with respect to all matters arising prior in time to any 
such revocation or termination.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">This power of attorney 
is in addition to and not in substitution for any agreement to which the Bank 
and the Borrower are parties.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">This power of attorney 
shall be governed in all respects by the laws of the Province of Alberta and the
laws of Canada applicable therein and each of the Borrower and the Bank hereby 
irrevocably attorns to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of such 
jurisdiction in respect of all matters arising out of this power of 
attorney.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">In the event of a 
conflict between the provisions of this Power of Attorney and the Credit 
Agreement, the Credit Agreement shall prevail.&#160; Capitalized terms used and 
not defined herein shall have the meanings given to them in the Credit 
Agreement.</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">

</div>

Corporation, as Borrower, and a syndicate of Lenders with Royal Bank of Canada,

<div style="PADDING-TOP: 1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
12.55pt">
 &#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">MATERIAL TERMS OF SECOND
LIEN INTERCREDITOR AGREEMENT</div>
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt"><br style="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">For the purposes hereof:</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Collateral</font>" 
means any kind of property, asset, undertakings, rights and interests, whether 
real, personal, mixed or profits a prendre, or tangible or intangible, of the 
Borrower and the Material Subsidiaries, whether real, personal or mixed, now or 
at any time hereafter subject to any Security Interests securing the First Lien 
Obligations or the Second Lien Obligations;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">First Lien 
Debt</font>" means (a) all Secured Obligations, (b) any reimbursement or 
indemnity obligations of the Loan Parties arising under any Loan Document and 
(c) all expenses and charges, legal and otherwise, incurred by the First Lien 
Secured Parties in collecting or enforcing any of the Secured Obligations or in 
realizing on or protecting any security therefor (including without limitation 
the security granted pursuant to any Loan Document) to the extent required to be
reimbursed by a Loan Party under a Loan Document;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">First Lien
Obligations</font>" means the First Lien Debt and all other indebtedness, 
liabilities and obligations (present or future, absolute or contingent, matured 
or not) of the Borrower and the Material Subsidiaries to or in favour of the 
First Lien Secured Parties under, pursuant or relating to the Credit Agreement, 
the Loan Documents, the Cash Management Facility Agreements and the Lender 
Swaps;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">First Lien Secured 
Parties</font>" means, collectively, the Agent, the Lenders, the Cash Management
Facility Providers and the Swap Lenders; and</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">"<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Second Lien 
Obligations</font>" means the Second Lien Debt and all other indebtedness, 
liabilities and obligations (present or future, absolute or contingent, matured 
or not) of the Borrower and the Material Subsidiaries to or in favour of the 
Second Lien Creditors under, pursuant or relating the Second Lien Financing 
Agreement and the other documents which create, evidence, establish or relate to
Second Lien Debt.</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z84c4cd564c0a4e3e9abd7af37b3c5b47" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">1.</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Any Security Interest now
or hereafter held by or for the benefit of the First Lien Secured Parties (or 
any of them) shall be senior in right, priority, operation, effect and all other
respects to any and all Security Interests now or hereafter held by or for the 
benefit of the Second Lien Creditors (or any of them).</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z0f9d3e44154345ba95252d7ce2682574" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">2.</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Additional Security 
Interests:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-

</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z5b86b4ac769e4d0e8156e770a5e1ffe7" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-

cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Until such time as the 
First Lien Obligations have been unconditionally and irrevocably repaid in full 
in cash and the commitments under the Credit Facilities have been terminated and
cancelled, no Borrower or any Material Subsidiary shall grant or permit any 
additional Security Interests on any of its property, assets or undertaking to 
secure any Second Lien Obligations unless it has granted, or concurrently 
therewith grants, a senior Security Interest on such assets, property or 
undertaking to secure the First Lien Obligations.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zb0bc3f3c600b426aaf8a14089f4ffeb3" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Unless the First Lien 
Secured Parties have previously or are concurrently taking action to effect a 
registration of a fixed charge and the Second Lien Creditors are permitted to do
so under the Second Lien Financing Agreement, the Second Lien Creditors shall 
not register any fixed charge against any assets of the Borrower or any of the 
Material Subsidiaries in respect of or as security for the Second Lien 
Obligations until 30 days after they have given to the First Lien Secured 
Parties written notice of their intention to register such fixed charge 
security.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z891faac3e8e343e9b1ee6874eee8e3ce" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">3.</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">In the event of any 
insolvency proceedings the First Lien Secured Parties shall first be entitled to
receive from the proceeds of the Collateral indefeasible payment in full of the 
First Lien Obligations in cash or otherwise before the Second Lien Creditors 
shall be entitled to receive and retain any payment or distribution on account 
of the Second Lien Obligations or Second Lien Rights from proceeds of the 
Collateral.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z2ce8cf95974949f2aadd4daeff11ef51" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">4.</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">A period of at least 180 
days (the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, 
serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Standstill Period</font>") during which no Second Lien
Creditor may (the following in paragraph 4(a) and (b) below, inclusive, are 
collectively referred to as the "<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 
'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Restricted 
Rights</font>"):</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z74e2b6af0e3d4f53bcc56b1574c3d022" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">enforce or exercise, or 
seek to enforce or exercise or to have the Collateral Agent enforce or exercise 
any Security Interest granted to the Collateral Agent under any security 
document over any property of a Material Subsidiary to secure the Second Lien 
Obligations or any other Security or any rights or remedies relating to such 
Second Lien or any other such Security Interest or take any proceedings in 
connection therewith; or</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="zffbf0d1cb6164c09a3a94752199d16db" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">in the event that any 
Second Lien Creditor becomes a judgment lien creditor in respect of any 
Collateral as a result of its enforcement of its rights as an unsecured creditor
with respect to the Second Lien Debt, enforce or exercise, or seek to enforce or
exercise, any such judgment lien,</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">and provided that, notwithstanding 
anything to the contrary, in no event shall any Second Lien Creditor be entitled
to enforce or exercise any Restricted Rights with respect to the Collateral if, 
notwithstanding the expiration of the Standstill Period, the holders of the 
Secured Obligations: (i) shall have commenced and be diligently pursuing the 
exercise of their rights or remedies with respect to all or any material portion
of the Collateral; or (ii) are stayed or otherwise precluded from pursuing such 
rights or remedies pursuant to applicable laws or Insolvency Proceedings 
(including pursuant to any order made in connection therewith).</div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-
ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP:
10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-
BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-
WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z854df0dc3f284dce8ca40502ac1a9523" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">5.</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">Notwithstanding paragraph
4(a) above, the Second Lien Creditors may file any pleadings, objections, 
motions or agreements which assert rights or interests available to unsecured 
creditors of the Loan Parties arising under any insolvency law or other 
applicable law, so long as (a) no Restricted Rights are commenced or exercised 
and (b) no action or proceeding for enforcement, realization, foreclosure, 
collection, seizure, garnishment or execution (in any case in respect of the 
Collateral and, for certainty, whether as a secured or an unsecured creditor) is
instituted or commenced, in each case, to the extent, but only to the extent, 
that any of the foregoing:</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z42a6d2e4c3174beb959d4a66fdd176d5" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(a)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">is in compliance with, is
not inconsistent with and does not contravene, the other provisions of the 
Second Lien Intercreditor Agreement; and</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt">
<table id="z7a65af3ae1b04c2aa7ac4f279dbcc5cd" class="DSPFListTable" style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tr>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt"></td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; WIDTH: 36pt; align: right">(b)</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; WIDTH: auto">is not adverse to, or 
does not adversely affect, the Security Interests securing the Secured 
Obligations or the priority thereof.</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
